la// yab cig gshin rje 'dod rgyal gnas// gshin rje ral gcig gis gsigs pa dang// ral gcig de la bka' bsgo ba// pho mor gyur pa 'u cag gnyis// 'dod chags spya pa'i dus la bab// ral gcig 'dod pa'i rgyal mos gsol// mi sman 'u cag gnyis las ni// srig gsum phung byed gdug byed ma// 'khrung phyir de skad ma gsung zhig/ de skad zhus pas ma gnang ste// chags pa'i rgyud cig spyad pa'i tshe// phyi dus bstan pa bsrungs pa'i ched// bdag kyang de ru sprul phyir bzhugs// zla ba bdun gyi nam phyed na// ma yi lhums nas 'thon pa ni// kha med mig med dpung bug po// ma nyid yi chad 'phongs su por// gnyid log rmi nas sngags te sad// bdag gi mtshan nyid mas mthong ba// mig ni nyi ma'i zer bas tsha// mche ba zla tshes 'dra bas gtams// lag na gsod pa'i mtshon cha thogs// de tshe bdag gis ma la brjod// kye bdag ni tshe srog bdag mo lags// ma ma zas skom ci la bgyi// ma yis lan blan 'chis pa yis// kha nas ngan sngags char du sgrogs// gzugs med sod chod zer ba yi// sems can zhon pa cig tu mthong// bred nas ma yis bdag la smras// bu yi lus su srog gcod gyis// bu yi zas du dam nyams sgrol// bu yi skom du srid khrag 'thung// de skad zer ba khums pa'i tshe// bdag gis slar la gsol ba ni// nub re srod dang nam gung la// dam nyams brgya yi sha khrag bza'o// bdag gi cha lugs mthong ba yis// rogs mo bred nas srog kyang smras// bdud sprul bred nas srog smras pa// phyi dus rnal 'byor don chen du// mngon rdzogs yab la de rnams dbul// ru ru shad shad khaM khaM// ma ma truM truM// sha sha ma ma kha thaM// tsit+ta tsit+ta rbad rbad// ril

ril thuM ri li li sod sod// du nashag pa tsi khrag kha nas phud// dun shag pa tsi khrag nad du dril ni ri ti du na ya tshar bu gser// chu dril thuM b+h+yo// sha thun kha kha// kha thun mugs// srog thun rbad// tsa thun rag thun a shug yaM// rak+mo rak+mo ru ru hU~M// tiSh+ta rbad yaM// shaM shaM bdud phrug srog lus phrol// dza hU~M baM ho raM raM dza thun rag thun a shug yaM// rak+mo ru ru hU~M// ti sta rbad yaM// shaM shaM nag mo srog lus khrol// dud thun ma dang b+h+yo kun ma b+h+yo// ra ma bu b+h+yo// shaM shaM ma b+h+yo// mA ma khrag du mA ma khrag tu// ni sha yaM// mi khrag thun// shi mA ra ya b+h+yo// kha rag rak+sho ru khrag nyog/ pa tsa shig pa tsa pa tsa shig/ chings sdoms sa ma ya// thuM thuM ril khug daM daM rig du thuM ril ma ma rig du thuM ri la// yang cig bdag gi sprul pa ni// 'dzam gling pa ra g.yu lung na// nal gyi sdong chen bya ba'i shing// rtsa ba 'dod chags mtsho ru khol// rtse mo zhe sdang me ru 'bar// lo ma gti mug mun pa gtibs// shu nang rgyal brag tu btags// khong na phrag dog tshub mar 'tshub// nag po bkrag med zhe sdang can// kha 'dar mgo dgu 'dod chags mtsho// gnas pa zha sdang can gyis mthong// chags skyes 'dod chags can la smras// bskal pa brgya ru 'dod pas phrad// chags pa spyad pa'i dus la bab// zhe sdang bdag la slar smras pa// kha rag nag po ci zer na// 'dod chags zhe sdang 'dul ba las// srid gsum phung byed bu 'ong na// 'dzer la khros chags yid kyis sbyar// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// de dus sbrul phyir bdag kyang bzhugs// nyon mongs 'dus pa'i bu spun gsum// zla ba gsum na nges par skye// sol ba'i sgong chags med dang// khrag gi grod pa kha med dang// dug gi rkyal pa srubs med gsum// rang bzhin gcig pa'i spun gsum yin// srid gsum dbang du sdud pa'i phyir// sol ba'i sgo nga gnam du spar// dug gi rkyal pa sa la 'dzul// khrag gi grod pa bar snang 'phyo// pha dang ma yang bzang pa dang// btsa' pa'i skabs kyang ma rnyed de// steng 'og bar snang gsum du phung// pha ma gnyis kyang zos la khad// pha ma gnyis kyis dmod pa bor// bu skyes dgra ru song ba 'di// gzung du ma btub btsar ma btub// mthu chen dbang ni btsam pa gcig/ bar snang mkha' nas yas shog la// 'di gsum gnyen por nges par shog/ sngon du thugs kyis dam stsal pa'i// mngon rdzogs yab ni khyod nyid gshags// 'dul pa'i dbang du dgongs nas kyang// snod gsum rdul bas spun gsum byung// pho mo sol ba'i bud med ni// nag mo mgo dgu sol sbrul gyis// rkang lag sol ba'i gshog pa can// yab kyi ban+d+ha g.yon pa nas// bdud rtsi g.yang du blugs nas kyang// sug pa g.yas par rdo rje

gnang// gsang sngags smod pa'i sems can la// gnam gyi ye bdud dbang yang bskur// ming dbang gnas kyi ye bdar mo// 'bring ma 'dod chags khrag gi mi// khrag gi ral pa gting zab can// zangs kyi kye le'u gdong drug nyon// de la dbang gsum bskur nas kyang// gying dbang bar snang glog ma srin// tha chung dug gi bud med la// dug sbrul mgo bdun gshog pa can// sder mo lcags kyi sder mo la// kha nas dug gi skyags pa skyug/ lcags kyi rkang ka mgo 'phyangs zhon// dbang gsum bskur nas ming btags pa// sa yi phung byed ma zhes btags// rang bzhin gcig pa'i spun gsum gyis// snying po mdongs gsol phul ba ni// du ni du ni ting da la ya dza// da ru dza la ni ha na dz+wa// du ma ra ha te b+h+yo dza// da ra tsa sa ma ya dz+wa dz+wa// e sa la ma du laM dz+wa dz+wa// dza ra ya pra ti du ba ya dzA dzA/ hU~M du ri pra pa ya shag/ hU~M mA ra ya thuM ril shag shag/ ma hA ri du na shag/ du ba ling tshal sa dzA/ hU~M ru hU~M ru shag/ tshal pa dz+wa dz+wa pra ma ku ti pra ma ku ti pra ma mu ting// hed ni shag/ krang ka ni// dur ni mi tsi gi phaT// sha tsi ri na// tsa ha ri ni// tsa ha ri hed// ma du ri du shag her ni shag/ ku la du// ma her ma her// her ma thuM ril// mug+ta shag mug ta shag/ du na du na// mug ta mug ta// tshal pa tshal pa// oM tser ma ma hUr bu hUr bu// bu pra ma ku ting hed hed// shig tshal pa b+h+yo// tshal pa b+h+yo// her ni ku la ma dun yang// du n+ti dun ting// du na du na// mag+ta shag/ 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma'i rgyud las// lha mo chen mo nyid sna tshogs su sprul te// gdug pa can gyi don mdzad pa dang// phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa'i don du gsang sngags snying gi snying po dang// dmod mo du ma bcom ldan 'das la phul pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma la gzigs te// 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha mo chen mo legs so legs// bstan pa bsrung pa'i don ched du// snying po du ma smras pa legs// phyis 'byung gshin rje bdud dang ni// pho yi 'khor gyi snying po smros// de nas lha mo chen mo 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug mas// bcom ldan 'das la lan du mar bskor pa byas te 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag la 'khor na ma mo ni// nag mo dmar mo ser mo'i tshogs// dkar mo'i tshogs dang smug mo'i tshogs// de la gyig yang rnam pa lnga// ya bdud yaM shud dmar po dang// khu le lag dgu shel ging dang// yar ya shod kyi skye to re// de yi snying po dril pa 'di// mngon rdzogs yab kyi spyan sngar brjod// bdud tri na ra zung// ya tri ni ra zung// chuM shig ya ni ra zung// dan tri sho ma tri dan dz+wa dz+wa// re'u tri re'u tri dz+wa dz+wa// ma ti dza dza/ ya ya thib thib// yab cig gshin

rje'i rgyal por sbrul// de yi dus kyi btsun mo bdag/ bdag la skyes pa'i gshin rje ste// de rnams snying po brjod par bya// oM a kro te ka shrI many+dzu ya mAn ta ka dza dza// ya ma radzas twa me snying la thig/ ya ma rA dza mug to me yaM snying la stig ya ma rA dza snying to me yaM dbugs la thuM// ya ma rA dza phung to me yaM lus thuM// nag mo re ma ti dgra bo la dza dza// yag+sha nag po tsab tsab// ma b+h+yo ru ru snying rbad// thuM ril kha thuM ma b+h+yo// srog mA ra ya rbad// thuM kha thun rbad// ril ril yaM yaM snying la yaM// sha pa ri khaM khaM// tri ma kha thun yaM// gaM pu pu rna shag/ dgra la yaM// gug thuM b+h+yo// long sod// dgra bo ma ra ya sod b+h+yo long// snying la mi ti ru ru ti sta rbad// sod ril yaM// ra te ru te ya shi ti b+h+yo// ra ti ru ti khram pa ti b+h+yo// shar pa shar pa tsig tsig yaM yaM// du tri pa tri skor ba khaM rbad// ya ti bskor pa rbad// 'dzam gling phung phung nag po na// bdud ni nag po ral gcig dang// bdag nyid nag mo ral gcig sprul// de gnyis sbyor bas bu gsum skyes// khal rgyal dang ni gdug byed dang// gsod byed nag po bdud phrug gsum// shan ti rA dza ra ma 'jam nas// sbrul gsum ngan sngags gsum bgyid pa// bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyan sngar brjod// sha la thun cig/ khrag la thun cig/ snying la thun cig/ srog la thun cig/ sha la gug thuM rbad// thuM ril yaM rbad b+h+yo// snying la thuM tsit+ta baM log/ thuM ril baM rbad b+h+yo// srog la thuM rbad// kha ril yaM rbad mA ra ya b+h+yo// 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma'i rgyud las// lha mo chen mo nyid kyi 'khor bdud dang// gshin rje dang// bdud kyi ngan sngags bcom ldan 'das la dngos su phul ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// de nas yum 'dod pa khamasakyi dbang phyug mas// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te// yag+sha kro d+hi shwa ri'i cha lugs bzung nas// g.yon phyogs su gnas te// gar byed cing dam du 'khyud pa dang// 'tshir ba dang// 'o byed pa dang// ling ka la rol par byed cig chad du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e e ma'o thugs rje'i bdag/ bdag dang bsod nams skal bar ldan// snyoms 'jug dbang gis mya ngan 'das// phyi dus bstan pa bsrung pa'i phyir// 'das dag ma 'das tshul bzung nas// lha srin sde brgyad dbang bsdus te// srid gsum nyam chung bde sbyin zhing// bstan pa 'jig pa bsgral par bgyi'o// zhes brjod de// bde ba dang ldan nas// rang gis mthong ba'i don la ma yengs par rtog go// de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru kas// rdo rje gsang las hU~M dkar gcig/ dgyes pa 'phro 'dus b+ha gar thim// gsang pa rgyas pas 'jig rten khams// rak+ta chags pa g.yos par 'gyur// dbang gi rdo rjer gyur pa rnams// rtsa pa

bteg ste yid g.yos nas// kun nas g.yung drung gnas su 'dus// thams cad spyi dpal yab yum la// nag mo la sogs 'dod khams kyis// lha srin sde brgyad yag shar 'dus// yum chen spyan bsdangs yab la skul// yab kyis gnod 'dul lha la gzigs// gnod 'dul stan las rab langs nas// bskor ba brgya phrag stong du byas// gus pa'i tshul gyis rab btud de// mdun du pus btsugs thal sbyar nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// yab kyi dgongs pa ji lta bu// nyon cig yab kyi bka' stsal 'tshal// ma mo kun gyigatso mo ste// rdo rje las kyi rgyal mtsho ma// dur khrod bdag la gdog rings che// gshin rje las la rdzogs pa mo// bdud kyi lcam cig gshin rje'i yum// nad kyi bdag mo rims kyi rkyen// 'di bsgrub dang po lha nyid de// bar du klu gnod gshin rje nye// tha ma bdud dang ma mo nye// mchog tu grub na 'phags pa 'ang dges// ra sa ya'i bdag mo ste// ma mo'i nang na bsgrub par sla// de phyir 'di yi sgrub pa'i thabs// 'jig rten mi la sman glad du// nyag gcig yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// nyag gcig yab kyis bka' stsal pa// dben la gnyan zhing nyams dga' bar// gtor ma rdzas dang ldan pa la// rak+ta ra sa ya nar ldan// gu gul dud pa rgyun mi gcad// dmar gyi gtor ma mnyes par sbyin// dang por nye bar byas nas ni// de nas bsgrub pa rab tu bya'o// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa ru// tsit+ta dang ni rak+ka dang// btsan dug rnams ni blugs par bya// bod pa rbad pa gsad pa'i sngags// bdun 'bum grangs ni tshang 'gyur na// khrag ni gnod pa del gtong// gdung dbyangs snyan pas bskul pa ni// ma mo ma cig yak+sha dam can mo// stong gsum rgyu zhing sprul pas 'gengs pa mo// srid gsum sbyor bas sdud pas ma cig khyod kyi mthu// khams gsum thams cad sgrol ba ma cig khyod kyi mthu/ snang srid g.yo zhing bskyod pa ma cig khyod kyi mthu// nad kyi skal pa gtong ba ma cig khyod kyi mthu// snyigs ma lnga yi rtags 'byin ma cig khyod kyi mthu// tshub nag stong du 'khyil ba ma cig khyod kyi mthu// dred mo stong du rdzu ba ma cig khyod kyi mthu// mon mo stong du rdzu ba ma cig khyod kyi mthu// gang du rbad nas zung zhig byas pa de yi// mgo chod phor par bya yis khyer la shog/ tsit+ta zhal khaM bya yis khyer la shog/ pags bshus gos su bgo yis khyer la shog/ mtshal pa'i snod du bya yi sa la mar bskus// nag mo chen mo smra 'bar na// 'bar ma gshin rje srog byed ma// mthing nag chen mo sre sprin mdog/ sku stong nyi ma 'bum gyis brgyan// sku smad zla ba 'bum gyis brgyan// sku stod glang chen ko rlon gsol// sku smad re lde nag pos bres// nyams pa sgrol ba'i shan pa

mo// rag ra khro mo kun gyi rje// thod pas 'bru mar 'dril zhing rgyug/ lcags kyi dre dgod shar rar// nag mo 'bum gyi dbus na 'gying// snying zan tsit+ta'i klong na bzhugs// tsit+ta'i klong na me 'bar ma// 'thor byed rlung gi rgyal mo ste// nag mo rlung zhon yid kyi 'gro// 'thor byed rlung gi go cog can// rak+sha gtum po be con bsnams// dmar gyi gtor ma 'do long la// bdag gis las bcol grub par gyis// zhes bya ba ni nag mo be con gyi bsgrub pa'o// brag dmar chol zangs 'dra ba'am// rang nyid nyal kha dben par bsgrub// snying po dmar dang 'chi skyen rnams// nri shun thig ler sbyar te bcang/ thig le dkar nag rdzas rnams la// snying po thig le stong dang ni// tshom bu stong du rab ti bzlas// maM sa rnam lnga rak+ta dang// mi dbang rnam 'bras bu sogs// sbyar pa'i gtor ma arga dang// a mr-i ta ru sbyar ba bsham// snying thig rbad tig srog tig rnams// tshom bu stong dang thig le stong// stong gi thig chad thig le'u nang// bkug ste dbang bsdu bse bsgo bya// tad+ya thA// trag rak+sha ru ru ro ru ba do si tsa pa la a shu g+me b+h+yo dza hU~M baM ho ru lu ru lu b+h+yo// a ti tha yo gi nan// sa ma ya a ti Sh+tha ba ling b+hun dzanu// sa ma ya pa la yanu// ma ma rak+shun// sha tu b+ha k+Sha ya nu// ri puM ma ra yanu// hU~M dza hri hU~M phaT// ba lin rgyun dang tshom bur sbyin// de nas nye bar gyur ba dang// sha du gsad pa'i las bya ste// ma mo srog thig nag mo 'dis// khrag gi nad mda' 'phang 'dod pas// 'bras bu med pa'i snod nang du// ni shun thig le de ru blugs// snying po khu ba 'chi rkyen gyis// blugs te de nyid spel bar bya'o// thig le dkar nag rdzas chen dang// snying thig srog tig gsad thig rnams// tsho ma bu thig le'i tshul gyis ni// bdun 'bum grangs ni tshang bar bya'o// gnyen po las byed lha yang bsgom// tra'i rdzas gtor ma gtang// bsten dbyangs bskul ba ni// hU~M// ma mo kun gyi rje mo khyod// bong ge ring ste gnam la cug ma reg/ rkang pa ring ste mtsho'i gting yang 'khrug/ khyod kyi spyi bo'i gtsug rum na// 'phags pa 'jam dpal dgongs pa mdzad// rang pa dmar po'i rtse nas lcags kyi ser pa 'bebs// dpral ba'i dbyes nas skar ma smin drug 'char// ca cig smin ma g.yas g.yon la// nad kyi grong khyer lnga brgya yod// mig ni nyi ma zla bar 'khyil// kha nas khrag dang zhag 'dzag ma// khrag gi de ni dri tshor na// dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong snyog/ mche ba gtsigs pas dpag tshad slebs// khyod kyi lag pa g.yas pa la// srin po brgya yi mtshan rtags can// khyod kyi dpung pa g.yon pa la/ ma mo 'bum gyi mtshan rtags can// ma cig khyod kyi rked pa la// rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad

'char// khyod kyi rkang ba'i mthe bong la// nyi ma la sogs gza' brgyad 'char// khyod kyi rkang pa g.yas pa yis// dgra bgegs rked rus brgya tsam gnon// khyod kyi rkang pa g.yon pa yis// mi mgo de ni stong tsam gnon// ma mo kun gyi rje mo khyod// nub gcig zas su mi rta brgya za ma// nub gnyis zas su mi bu stong za ma// nub gsum zas su mi bu khri za ma// nub bzhi zas su mi bu 'bum za ma// sngags pas pa gdungs nas rbad pa'i tshe// don ma 'grub par slar ma ldog/ ma cig lha mo re ma te// sngags pas gdungs nas rbad pa'i tshe// ma mo kun gyi yang rje ste// ma mo kun gyi phyag brnyan mdzad// bstan pa kun gyi yang rje mo// sku la na bza' ci gsol na// sku la re lde nag po gsol// dbu la re ba'i go cog gsol// khyed kyi lag pa g.yas pa na// bdud kyi khram shing rim dgu thogs// dgra bgegs khram la da thob cing// khyod kyi lag pa g.yon pa na// nad kyi de ni rkyal pa bkal// dgra la mi nad sna dgu thong// ma cig dam las ma 'da' bar// da ma nyams 'di la rtags phyung zhig/ bdun 'bum grangs ni tshangs gyur na// bdun nam dgu nas len te 'chi zhes bya ba ni// dpal ldan re ma ti'i snying thig srog thig gi bsgrub pa'o// 'dod khams kyi dbang phyug ma'i rgyud las// lha dang ldan pa'i srog thig nag po dang// srin por ldan pa'i snying thig srog thig nag po bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// ta na bsgral pa'i dus kyis kyang// ma mo'i thugs dam bskar bar bya// 'ga' na sbyor pa'i lung gis kyang// gnyis med ma mo'i don rtogs bya// lta ba'i don ni rtogs byas nas// 'phrin las dgongs spyod tshang par sbyar// thun grub rtags kyi tshad phyin pa// nyin cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// dmar la dkar pa chags pa na// gnyis su med pa'i dngos grub thob// 'od dkar dri zhim 'od byung na// lha dang bcas pa grub pa yin// 'od dmar sbrul du chags pa na// klu dang bcas pa mngon du gyur// 'od gnag dri ma mi zhim na// gnod sbyin 'khor gyis bskor bar 'grub// 'od 'khrug snying ni 'phangs mtho na// gshin rje'i 'khor dang ldan pa yin// 'od ldan nus med spu zing na// bar chad byed pa bzlog par bya'o// thun khrag po na sgrib yod bshags// 'gul zhing ldeg na pho nya ste// khol zhing rlangs byung drag por 'gyur// nag po gting nag 'dug pa na// chos kyi dbyings kyi dngos grub thob// dkar na zhi ste ser na rgyas// dmar po dbang ste gnag na drag/ gar grub kha dog 'byung ba zhig/ 'jam pa che na lha yi skad// rtsub la ring na klu yi sgra// mtho la rtsub na bdud kyi sgra// thung la rtsub na gshin rje yin// rtse thub thub na gnod spyin nyid// 'jam zhing snyan na ma mo dngos// dri

yi bye brag bshad pa ni// dri zhim 'phro ba lha dang ldan// dri zhim dang ldan ma mo ste// dri mi zhi la ngad ldan na// klu la sogs pa yin par bshad// bse dri dri la spu zing na// bar chad byed pa yin par bshad// 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma'i rgyud las/ ta na dang ga na dang// thun gyi bsgrub pa la rtags bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yag sha nag mo'i bsgrub pa bshad par byas te// dben la gnyen zhing nyams dga' bar// brag nag 'tshal gyi thig bcas su// sa bdag la sogs gtor ma sbyin/ bar chad byed pa bskrad par bya// dpal gyi dkyil 'khor ldan pa yis// mon mo skye rings thod pa'i nang// mi dang rta la sogs pa ste// sna tshogs sha dang shi ka'i tshal// gal khyi khyung dang mi dbang tshogs// de nasagator ma rab tu bya/ rtsa ba med pa'i thams cad nang du khrag mkhris dug dang shing thog dang// sna tshogs khrag ni 'byor tshad blugs// chu dang myos byed dug sna gsum// de yang gnod pa'i rdzas su sbyar// 'chi ka'i mtshal tig byur zad 'tshal// khrag sna stong du sbyar ba ste// bcu drug lon pa'i phor pa ru// ra sa myos byed sbyar ba yang// bco brgyad lon pa'i kham phor blugs// tshes dgu bdun la bsgrub pa gzugs// bcu gcig nub mo gtor ma gtang// bco lnga'i gnyan po 'am dur khrod dam// shing lo rlung khyer ma lhung ba// mtshan byang tshil chen rwa ru ra gzhug/ byang shar mtshams kyi me nyid la// bsreg cing nyungs kar nyungs nag gis// me la gtor zhing gnas gsum bzlas// gtor ma bsngo zhing bstan klus bskul// shar phyogs lha mo nag mo ni// mahA de ba'i btsun mo ste// sku mdog mthig nag 'bar ba la// sna yang glang chen 'gying ba 'dra// mche ba dkar po zla tshes 'dra// bud med dkar mo 'bar ba la// g.yu yi smin ma lams se lams// g.yu yi thod tshugs gyen du 'khyil// phyag na lcags kyi phur pa 'dril// lha yi btsun mo re ma ti// khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab// lho phyogs gshin rje re ma ti// gshin rje nag po'i chung ma ste// dar nag ber chen pu ru ru// lcags kyi ral pa sil li li// mi lpags g.yang gzhi thod pas brgyan// gser gyi mche ba lcags kyi so// bse yi smin bzangs lam sa se lams// lag na mi ro'i g.yab 'dor la// mchog gi phur bu sil li li// 'khor yang gshin rje nag pos bskor// gsod byed tshogs kyi dus la bab// nub phyogs bdud mo re ma ti// dmar mo ral pa gyen du brjes// g.yu yi smin ma lams se lams// mi bzad g.yu yi mche bas gtams// bse yi phur bu sil li li// 'khor ni bdud kyi shan pas bskor// mi bzad chen mo gshegs su gsol// byang gi phyogs nas spyan 'dren na// gnod spyin A

r+ya re ma ti// nag mo rma bya'i ral pa can// na bza' rma bya'i thul pa la// 'ja' tshon sngon dmar lams se lams// tsha ba nad kyi kha rlangs can// rma bya'i mdos kyi smin ma can// g.yu yi mche ba thams se thams// lag na lcags kyi phur 'dril ma// 'khor yang gnod spyin shan pas bskor// ling 'debs chen mo'i dus la bab// byang gi phyogs nas gshegs su gsol// byang shar mtshams kyi spyan 'dren pa// sa bdag chen mo re ma ti// sku ni sngo nag 'gying ba mo// lcags kyi ral sa gtsug nag 'khyil// lcags kyi mche ba zur gsum ni// rtse mo rno la phur bu'i dbal// dreg thul nag po sku la gsol// lcags kyi khur bu sil li li// had 'khor ni 'byung po stong gis bskor// mtshams kyi 'byung po'i chung ma ste// byang shar mtshams nas gshegs su gsol// shar lho'i mtshams nas spyan 'dren na// rak+sha dpal ldan re ma ti// sku ni mtsho mdog ser mo la// sku ni ral pa thog gis brgyan// thig gi zar pu sku la gsol// glog gi smin bzang lams se lams// gnam lcags mche ba 'thab cing 'phro// kha nas 'brum bu'i nad gtong ma// phyag na thog gi phur ba 'dril// thog gi sgra chen rab tu grags// chem chem 'ur 'ur g.yo zhing spyon// sprul pa gdug cing mi bzad pa// chu srin 'bar ba'i 'khor gyis bskor// mi bzad chen mo lings lag gshegs// shar lho mtshams nas gshegs su gsol// lho nub mtshams nas spyan 'dren no/ 'brog srin khro mo re ma ti// sku ni khro mo chen mo la// dbu yi ral pa gzi yis brgyan// gzi spyan khra mo rig rig lta// gzi yi smin bzang lams se lams// gzi yi so 'dra khrigs se khrigs// na bza' stag thul khro bo gsol// phyag na ral gri phur bu 'dril// srin po lag rings chung ma ste// 'khor yang srin po srin mos bskor// mi bzad chen mo'i dus la bab// byang gi phyogs nas spyan 'dren no// gnod spyin ar+ya re ma ti// ku be ra'i chung ma ste// nag mo rma bya'i ral pa can na bza' rma bya'i thul pa la// 'ja' tshon sngon po lams se lams// tsha ba nad kyi kha rlangs can// rma bya'i gdog gi smin ma la// g.yu yi mche ba thams se thams// lag na lcags kyi phur pa 'dril// 'khor yang gnod spyin shan pas bskor// lings 'debs chen mo'i dus la bab// lho nub mtshams nas gshegs su gsol// nub byang mtshams nas spyan 'dren no// lang kha mgrin bcu'i chung ma ste// rak+mo dpal ldan re ma ti// sku ni dmar smug chen mo la// mchod dang byi ru'i ral pa gtams// byi ru'i smin bzangs lams se lams// byi ru'i spyan dmar lams se lams// byi ru'i mche bas rtsad gcod ma// khrag gi thul pa zhag gis

brgyan// phyag na dung gi phur 'dril ma// nyams pa'i snying la 'debs byed ma// kha nas rgyu gzer nad gtong ma// 'khor yang btsan sde 'bum gyis bskor// che zhe ral pa sprugs pa'i tshe// bse tshub zangs tshul khyil li li// mi bzad chen mo da tshur spyon// nub byang mtshams nas gshegs su gsol// phyogs mtshams brgyad kyi ling 'debs ma// dam nyams dgra la ling 'debs ma// sngon tshe rgyal pa'i spyan lam du// khas blangs dam bcas ji bzhin du// bstan pa 'jig par byed pa la// da lta nyid du rtags phyung zhig/ ces bya ba ni// srin mo'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i sgrub thabs so// 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma'i// klu yi 'khor gyis bskor ba yi// rang byung rgyal mo'i sgrub thabs bshad// dur khrod chu gsum 'dus pa 'am// brag nag ri nag rtse la bsgrub// gtor ma gtang zhing bgegs bskrad la// gru bzhi gru gsum zlum po dang// gru gsum sum brtseg de steng du// ka pa lo ma yod pa'i nang// ra sa ya na rak+ta dang// g+ti wang ga pur sha chen dang// tshil chen rak+ta sna tshogs sbyar// bag phye zla gam gyen kha ling// bcu drug kham par lon par ldan// yang snying kha spub bsgrub brten gzhag/ bcug ste de la bstim ste bsgrub// zla ma slebs pa'i kham phor du// ra khyi rta phag bzhi yi khrag/ de stengs lcags byas 'debs pa bdun// spyang dug khrag byug kha gyen bstan// bdag gi sprul pa ya sha nyid// he ru ka 'khor bcas pa dmigs// rab bskyed spyan drangs mchod byas te// he rus ma mo sa yi dkyil mas drangs// zhag bdun bsgrub pa rdzogs pa dang// phur pa'i rtse la 'ber nas// dpal gyi brtsad de bkug nas bstim// drag pos mgo 'jug kun du gdab// dan khrag tsa dur mar+ya li// mahA ma sa mur zheng bdag/ gtor yar bskang ste gtang rag gtang// gzugs phung ling gar gtubs te bstab// de nas zhag gsum bsgrub pa dang// ral pas nam mkha'i khams su 'thibs// zangs kyi gtsug phug nag pos bskang// de nas zhag lnga bsgrubs pa dang// gyen du rang ltas lha mor 'gyur// ma dang bu ru dam bcas bzhin// dam rdzas gnyan pos tha tshig bsre// dngos grub gang 'dod de la blangs// bsten dbyangs bsnyen pas bskul ba ni// hU~M// bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i dur khros nas// nag mo'i ral pa 'bebs pa srin mo'i tshogs// sa 'du ba ga la ni za byed chen mo ste// rdo rje dra ba ma dang glog 'gyur ma// srin mo'i tshogs rnams gdungs nas bos pa'i tshe// ru lu ru lu'i sgra skad drag po dang// rak+mo kro d+hi shwa ri bos pa'i tshe// sgrol byed chen mo khyod kyi dus la bab// yun gyi dpal dang mgon du khyed brten na// btang snyoms yal par ma btang yal dam can// ma g.yel

ma g.yel dam can re ma ti// ma sring chung ma bi mo shan pa'i tshogs// ci bgyis las byed tshogs rnams kyis// dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par gsol// khyed kyi mtshan nas bod pa'i tshe// nyi ma byang shar ma ki na// brag dang chu 'thab mar 'das na// mtsho mu le 'things kyi nang shed na// mthing sun sngon mo'i sbra phub nas ma mo yongs kyi nad shed na// gcig pur bzhugs kyi 'gying bag can// mi ro rta ro gcal du bkram// bam chen gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// bar snang mkha' la gshegs pa'i tshe// gser gyi rnge'u chung ldi ri ri// gser gyi rnge'u chung brdungs pa'i tshe// nag mo 'khor bcas shar ra ra// nag mo 'khor bcas shar tsam na// gu ya nag po rak+ta'i mdzod// dmar chen khrag gi lce ril can/ sho na rag+ti'i 'brengs se brengs// nag mo ral pa shar ra ra// nag mo ral pa shar tsam na// bdud kyi lcam la gshin rje'i yum// chibs su dre'u rta rkang gsum chibs// g.yu mthur sngon mo brengs se brengs// bse sga dmar po wangs se wangs// sbrul nag stong gi gong rmed can// mchog gi glo nan khyugs se khyugs// zla bal gcig la 'or gsum du// stong khams ma lus khyab par mdzad// dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yang// thang tsam cig la yud kyis khyab// sku ni mthing nag 'jigs tshul can// dbu skra ral pa'i thor tshugs can// ral pa cod pan re re la// gser dang mi tig chun 'phyangs can// g.yas kyi dang po'i phyag mtshan ni// kha T+wAM kha'i phyag rtse gsum bsnams// dgra bgegs ma lus rdul du rlog/ g.yon gyi dang po'i phyag mtshan ni// 'phrul gyi me long phyis shing lta// srid pa gsum cir sal le gzigs// g.yas kyi 'og ma'i phyag mtshan ni// lcags kyi phur bu 'dril zhing 'phen// dgra bgegs klad pa'i rgyas su rgyob// g.yon gyi 'og ma'i phyag mtshan ni// sbrul nag stong gi zhag pa 'phen// dam nyams klu rnams kun gyis bcings// dre'u rta chibasakyi sga gong na// nad kyi rkyal pa sngo dmar bkal// dre'u rta cibs kyi phyi long la/ mtshon gyi gru gu sngon dmar bkal// nad dang rims kyi skos 'debs ma// mdun na shod rde'u dkar nag 'grems// rgyab na bdud kyi khram baM bsnams// skye 'gro yongs kyi kyeg rtsi ma// legs nyes gnyis kyi ltang rtsi ma// dus b zhi'i ma mo sku la shar// dpyid kyi rgyal mor byon pa'i tshe// shrI dur khrod gnas nyul ma// rlung dang tshub ma'i sna 'dren ma// 'khyag pa'i ming tu sa 'debs ma// ming po rdo rje las 'chol na// sring mo rdo rje las mdzod cig/ khro thob shed rje nad kha thong// mtshon gyi g+r+ya gu der skyong la/ nges sa 'debs su ma btang zhig/ dbyar gyi rgyal mor byon pa'i tshe// b+ha ga d+hi ti mkha' la gnas nyul ma// 'brug dang glog gi sgra

sgrogs ma// sad dang ser ba'i sna 'dren ma// ming po rdo rje las 'chol na// sring mo rdo rje las mdzod cig/ ston ka'i rgyal mo byon pa'i tshe// ma hA shi na du rgyu lugs// ri rab kyi ni zom na gnas// ming po rdo rje las bcol ma// sring mo rdo rje las mdzod cig/ dgun gyi rgyal mor byon pa'i tshe// ral gcig rgya mtsho'i klong nas dpal gyi bka' sdod ma// dpag tshad brgyad khri gnas nas khrag gi dri snom ma// klu rnams kun la mnga' mdzad ma// ming po rdo rje las 'chol gyis// sring mo rdo rje las mdzod cig/ khyod kyi spyi bo'i gtsug rum na// nyi ma zla ba'i 'od zer 'phro// nag mo mi bzad cho 'phrul can// thugs dam dus la bab bo da tshur spyon// khyod kyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// 'dod khams ma mo stong stong 'gyed// khyod kyi gsang ba'i b+ha ga las// las kyi ma mo stong stong 'gyed// khyod kyi zhabs kyi g.yas g.yon las// pho nya stong phrag drug cu 'gyed// dam tshig ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa// bdud dang lha 'dre ngan sems can// sdang bo'i dgra bo rdul du rlogs// dpal ldan nag mo gshegs su gsol// ma ma b+h+yo b+h+yo// e ha ya hi dzA dzA// e A r+ya la hring hring// dus gsum kun tu ma bsgribs ye shes nas// ma sring chung ma bu mo bran mo'i tshogs// ye shes mngon shes ldan pa'i thugs brtse ma// mthu rtsa la rmad byung phan pa'i dgongs pa can// sngon tshe dam bcas nyid kyis zhal 'ches pa// bstan pa bsrung bar rtag tu grogs mdzod cig/ dzAHhU~MbaM ho// ma ma tra k+Sha mu tra ru lu ru lu b+h+yo// dpal ldan nag mo re ma ti// lha mo chen mo nam gru ma// rdzong mo chen mo bka' bzlog ma// nag mo chen mo kha 'bar ma// byis pa kun gyi dur byed ma// dur khrod 'bar ba'i bdag mo ste// rak+sha chen mo rtsa mun tri// nam mkha' khams kyi mthu mo che// bar snang khams kyi glog ma srin// kha nas me 'bar rgya mtsho skems// lag na rdo 'phen ri rab snyil// ral pa nag pos stong gsum khengs// kha nas zhing khrag rgya mtshor 'khyil// nyin gyi dus su rtog byed cing// mtshan gyi dus su rgyug byed ma// nag mo 'khor bcas thugs dam bskongs// sha chen tshogs ni ri ltar spungs// tsit+ta'i tshogs ni 'od du 'bar// rak+ta'i tshogs ni mtsho ltar bkram// nag mo 'khor bcas thugs dam 'dis bskongs la// bdag gis las bcol grub par mdzod// 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma'i rgyud las// srin po'i 'khor dang ldan pa'i yak+sha nag mo'i sgrub thabs dang// klu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i dpal ldan lha mo nag mo phyag bzhi ma'i srog gi sgrub thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// 'khor dang rnam par ldan pa yi// sgrub thabs rab tu bshad par bya// dben la gnyan pa'i gnas su

ni// bcu drug lon pa'i bam chen gtsang// ma sa gtor ma 'brub sogs bya// shun phyed stan du bting byas te// shun phyed pi dang mtshan dza na// stod smad gnam nag las bya ba// b+ha ga e ka 'bun dza bzhi// ka pA la rak+tas gang ba dang// kyo ba dang ni g.yon pa na// g.yas na thod dbyug rgyu zhags 'dzin// rjes dang bag phye rak+ta sbrus// khru gang tshad du rU pa bya// shun gyi ming rus snying kar gzhug/ tsher ma can dang rnam ldan sku// byang shar mtshams su snying kar gzugs// skyes nas skud btags lag tu gtad// de dus rnal 'byor nga ru sgom// tsit+ta'i dkyil nas srog thig drang// gu gul dud pa rgyun mi gcad// shun chen slag pa de bzhin bgo// srid pa'i spyi lugs zhwa gon te// 'phreng ba chen po de bzhin bgrang// keng rus rung ba'i mtha' ma bskor// srog thig drangs las de la bstim// zhag gsum bzlas pa bar ma chad// yid la byang shar sprin nag 'khrug/ snying gtor bskor zhing dbang du bsdu// lnga nas de las thog cig 'byung// nang khrol gtor ma de dus sbyin// bdun na dngos su 'byung ba 'am// 'od dang dri ni gang byung yang// sha khrag lhag ma gtor ma sbyin// bdud rtsi'i dam bsre dam yang bca'// ku ma ra yi sngags bzlas pas// nga yis bskul pas dbang med du// mo yis sha truM gnan pa dang// bu ga dgu nas khrag skyug snying yang za// 'khor gyis bkug cing de la bstim// ling ga 'dar bar 'gyur ba dang// dpal gyi skur bsgoms sngags bzlas gdab// bdun phrag gcig nas gtor ma sbyin// des kyang gsod par ma gyur na// she khyi'i bzlas pa byed bzhin du du// skur bsgoms dpung par ling ga bsgreng// bskyed nas bzung ste de la brdab// brgya rtsa brgyad ni rdzogs dus su'o// mtshon chas gnad bkros sha khrag za// zhag bdun lon dang gtor ma sbyin// des kyang 'grub par ma gyur na// ling ga rgya tshil me la gdug/ ru ru'i sngags kyis rab tu gdab// rnam par ldan pa'ang rab tu sdigs// 'khor gyis bkug nas de la gtad// des kyang me la bsreg kying bza'// ling ga dum bu ma mar gtub// re re brgya brgya rdzogs shing sreg/ thal ba gnon pa'i sa ru gnan// yang na bsres la phyogs bzhir gtor// des kyang dam nyams ma sgrol na// snga ma las kyang gnas sgyur la// khrag gi maN+Dal gru gsum bya// mtha' ma rtsang dang phur bus bskor// ra thod phag thod khyi thod gsum// gnyan pa'i gnas su sgyed bur gzugs// dug sna lnga dang snying sna lnga// khrag sna lnga dang mi rus rnams// rtsa med pa'i nang du blugs// ma ma'i sngags kyis kar gnan bzlas// bdag nyid gnyen po'i lha ru ste// bud med nag mo ral pa can// re ba'i 'bo bu rkang la gon// sha tru'i tsit+ta g.yas

g.yon thogs// dmar thab dmar la bskru ba la// dmar zhing ma mor gyur ba dang// de yi stobs kyis yul phyogs rnams// sha tru bskul byed za bar bsgom// brgya brgya nyid la sgong tshad dpo// nyi shu rtsa gcig rdzogs par bya'o// bsten dbyangs snyan pas bskul ba ni// lha mo nag mo chen mo khyod// mi mngon mkha' dbyings sku bzhengs cig/ mnyam nyid mkha' dbyings mi dmigs chos kyi dpyings// bde chen lhun nas rdzogs nas sku bzhangs cig/ bstan pa 'jig byed dam nyams dgra bo yis// dkon mchog dbu 'phang smod cing rnal 'byor thal bar rlog/ zhag dgus dgra bo thal bar ma byas na// khyod nyid thal ba bzhin du rlog/ ces bskul ba ni// lha mo chen mo 'khor dang rnam par ldan pa'i sgrub thabs so// 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma'i rgyud las// lha mo chen mo 'khor dang rnam par ldan pa'i sgrub thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyi rlabs kyis// 'khor thams cad gcig tu 'dus par mkhyen gyur te// lha gnod mdzes la bskul pa dang// lha gnod mdzes kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas// lus la sbrul ltar 'dud pa byas nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// thog mar rnam par dag pa las// brtags pa'i dbang gis 'khor bar gyur// de phyir mi rnams thams cad kyang// 'dod pa tha dad brtags pas 'byung// de rnams kun gyi don ched du// bdud mo spun bzhi g.yog mo gsum/ gnod sbyin rnam bzhi du ma yis// 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bshad du gsol// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// ma ni skye ba med pa'i don// mo ni 'gag pa med pa'i klong// ma mo rnam par dag pa las// brtags pa'i las kyi ya mor gyur// de rnams sgrub thabs bshad par bya// dur khrod ri ni dmar nag tu// dmar nag gru gsum khrag gis bri// 'bru mar rak+ta'i thig le bya// ku mar dang yak+sho mo// shun chen bris sku thig le'i steng// lho phyogs dam can re ma to// nub phyogs bka' nyan re ma dza// shar phyogs phyag nyen re ma dzu// phyi rim zla gam gsum po la// thod pa tshon nag bris pa gsum// bud med nag mo dkar ser dang// dmar smug 'bum gyi zab mtshan// phyi rol sgo bzhir ldan pa la// srin mo bzhi yi phyag mtshan bzhi// dir bu khrag sna bcu gsum gyis// rkang pa gsum ni zur gsum gzhag/ de stengs rabs chad thod pa ru// lcags phur gsum la mi rta khyi// snying gsum kha gyen bstan pa dang// gcig gsum thun mong khyad dam rdzas// bya nag dar snas brgyan pa gsum// thun mong khyad par

bstan pa'i rdzas// shel nag spyi dkar bskang pa'i rdzas// sha sna tshogs kyi gtor ma la// dbyar ni me tog ston ni 'bru yi tshogs// dgun ni sha khrag dpyid ni lcugs// spyan gzigs tshogs kyis brgyan pa la// dar ni mthing nag kha bcad pa// lha mo chen mo mchod pa'i rdzas// khrag 'thung skur bsgoms drangs pas ni// sku la re ma ti nyid bstim// lcags phur gsum la gsum po nyid// zhag lnga'i nub mo sdug pa dang// mi sdug cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung ba'i dus// dus der nag mo spyi dkar bskang// grub nas zhag bdun nub mo ni// gtsang dang mi gtsang bye brag gis// bud med nag mo ral pa can// mche ba nag mo rno la gtams// pa spu'i gseb nas me 'tsheg na// dbang du bsdu zhing bshags par bya'o// 'bring na bud med nag mo la// mche ba zla tshes 'khyil par snang// bar na bud med dkar mo la// g.yu yi smeb chags pa ste// mche ba zla tshes dkar po 'khyil// dam bca' dam gse las la bskong// gtor ma nam phyed dus su sbyin// lug nag bsgral pa'i tsit+ta dang// bya nag dir bu'i khrag gsum po// rtags ma phyin par lta bu gzugs// de nas khrag phyung gtor ma byas// ngo rer dus tshod rnam gsum la// gtor ma byin te bskul bar bya'o// gtor ma bya nag g.yas g.yon g.yob// nam gyi gung la bskul ba ni// hU~M// nam mkha' ji dbyings phyug ma// gnam phyed steng na gon kyang spyi bo zangs sa zangs// sa phyed stan du bting yang zla za ya ba bkor// ral pa phyed kyis gnam khebs na// ral pa phyed kyis sa khebs ma// ral pa'i zar la skar 'khrug ma// khrag dang zhag gi thig le can// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// nam mkha' khams kyi dpal mo btsan// chibs su 'brug mo chibs la chibs// rol du glog mo 'gyur la rol// spyan nas khrag 'dzag rgya mtshor 'khyil// shangs nas rlung byung srid gsum 'debs// zhal nas hU~M byung srid gsum skems// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// dpal ldan lha mo khyod nyid kyi// bka' sdong pho nya 'byung ba ni// lha mo 'gyogs byed re ma ti// mthong byed gser gyi 'ug pa zhon// phyag g.yas khrag bskams za zhing rdeg/ g.yon pa lcags kyu 'bar ba bsnams// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// rang dbang med par snying na drongs// nam mkha' khams kyi pa rna sha pa ri// sku la sha thul gnyen po gsol// chibs su smin sha yu mo chibs// phyag na zhags pa 'dom brgya dgu bcu rtsa gcig bsnams// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// bar snang khams kyi gzi 'phen ma// sku la gzi thul khra mo gsol/ phyag na gzi yi khram bam bsnams// dgra bo dam nyams khram la thob/ khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// bar snang kha mas kyi mthu mo

che// srid pa gsum gyi b+h+yo bzlog mkhan// chibs su rlung dang bu yug chibs// phyag na ser ba kha char bsnams// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// de yi bka' nyan gsung bsdod ni// bar snang khams kyi glog 'bar ma// chibs su dred mo drus mchibs// phyag na 'dzin byed cha lugs ni/ g.yu zhags sngon mo shar rar// sngon gyi rgyal bas gsungs pa'i bka'// da lta nyid du rtags phyung zhig// dus bdag chen mo'i dus la bab// de yi bka' nyan gsung bsdod ni// dpal ldan nag mo re ma ti// sku stod re pa nag po gsol// dred lpags nag po'i sham thabs can// lcags kyi dre rta rkang gsum la// srin po'i ya mkhal snga ru la// srin mo'i ma mkhal phyi ru byas// srin po'i pags rlon sga g.yogs la// sbrul gyi gong thag gong rmed la// byi ru dmar dmar po'i mthar srab can/ g.yu yi kha srab sil li li// ske nag gser gyu dril bu 'khrol// khyed kyi zla ni nag po me'i kha rlabs can// lag na bdud kyi khram thogs shing// dgra bo'i dam nyams khram la thob// g.yon na nad kyi sgye'u sngon dmar la// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad kyis bkang// dgra bo'i phyogs su rims gtong ma// tsha ba nad kyi khrag skyug cing// gson par mi byed myur du gsod// 'phongs la lcags kyi dra ba bkal// dra ba shod byang kra la la// dgra rnams shod la gdab tu gsol// de yi nu mo gcung mo ni// smug nag 'bar ba'i na bza' la// me stag 'bar ba'i sham thabs can// chibs su klu glang nag po chibs// rgyu ni dur khrod klong du rgyu// len ni spyugs pa'i glu len ma// 'babs ni ltas ngan sna tshogs 'bebs// tha ni mi sha rlon pa za// bsgregs pas stong gsum 'gegs par byed// 'thung ni mi khrag rlon pa 'thung// bzhin yang mi sdug khrag mdog ma// 'khor ni nag mo khrag mig ma// de yi 'khor gyi ma mo ni// grangs ni stong phrag brgya yod kyang// re yang gnyen mo khyod la re// su la mi re khyod la re// su la mi bltos khyod la bltos// dpal ldan nag mo re ma to// mthu rtsal che par cha mchis pas// dmag dpung bskyed la ru mtshon phyor// bdud kha sgyur la dgra dpung chom// re ma ti chen mo yis// re tri gsum gyi phur pas gdab/ nag mo ma sha la dza dza// ma sa ma hab hab// nag mo tsit+ta snying la dza dza// nag mo dgra bo'i rtsa la dza dza/ na mo dgra bo dbugs la ha hur dza dza// nag mo dgra bo'i srog la dza dza// nag mo dgra bo'i snying la dza dza// rak+mo sha rgyud snying la laM dza dza// rag mo snying rgyud rtsa la dza za// rtsa brgyud dbugs la dza dza// dbugs rgyud srog la dza dza// zhes brjod de phur pa gdab po// de nas bsten dbyangs snyan pas bskul ba ni// 'khor gyi ming sring bskul ba ni// dpal rdo rje re ma ti// glog ma

srin gyi yul na gnas// gser gyi bud med gshog pa can// nyi zer 'bar pa'i ral pa can// gtum mo mi sr-in khrag mig ma// lag g.yas ri rab stsol por 'phen// g.yon pa gnam lcags zor ba thogs// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// tsit+ta kha kha ru ru// bka' nyan rdo rje re ma dza// sku ni glog 'gyu chen mo la// thugs ni gtum mo lag rings ma// bse yi mdog la g.yu yi sbyan// bse yi ral pa sil li li// za 'og mdzes pa'i stod slag la// re ba'i thu la gnya' za skor// phyag na lcags phur stong 'dril zhing// gtum mo mi bsrun mgo lus 'brel/ g.yu yi dre'u rkang gsum chibs// 'akor yang dre zhon stong gis bskor// gang la dmigs pa'i dgra bo la// nad kha thong la khram bam thob// rak+sha kha long kha// dpal ldan gyi phyag brnyan re ma dzu// gtum mo mi srun phag rgod so// ral pa sngon dmar gtibs pa la// khyod kyi lag pa g.yas g.yon na// zhags pa lcags kyu glog 'gyu ma// dred thul nag mo gos su gon// lag na khram bam rnge'u chung bsnams// dur khrod tsha ba'i mnga' bdag mo// nyin bzhin khyo bdun bkug nas nyal// mtshan mo khyo bdun khyab par sbyor// srod la nag mo grib so zhon// gung la khra mo stag slag can// tho rangs bzhad 'gro 'thing skya ma// shod byang rtsis byang dgra la 'thor// nyi ma zla ba zhon pa mo// gling bzhi kun tu khyab par 'gro// khyod yang shel dang rus pa'i mi// dam tshig nyams pa'i snying 'byin ma// gnod spyin dkar po skul ma 'debs// tho rangs rgyu ba'i dkar mo ni// dung gi mdog la shel gyi sku// seng ge dkar bo'i thul chen gsol// nyi zla spel pa'i dbu rgyan can// phyag na shel gyi phur 'dril ma// nyi ma zla ba'i zer la chibs// srog bdag dkar po'i btsun mo yin// tshil tshil sha// ma sha khug khug thang sha rbad// srin mo dkar mo shel khrab can// lag pa g.yas g.yon mda' gzhu thogs// shel gyi dre'u la g.yu sga bstad// dpag chen mo'i dus la bab// gser gyi srin mo 'gyogs byed ma// gser gyi lan phran gos su gon// gser gyi tshe brang sil li li// gser gyi mda' 'phen ta la la// gser gyi dre'u dung sga can// de yi 'khor yang 'bum gyis bskor// snying 'byin ma yi dus la bab// zangs kyi srin mo dbang mo tshe// byi ru'i lan phran gos su gon// zangs 'gyogs tshe brang sil li li// zangs kyi mda' 'phen ta la la/ phyogs bzhir zangs kyi rgya 'dzugs ma// zangs kyi dre'u la mchong gi sga// srin mo 'gyogs byed tshe 'gugs ma// mi bzan chen mo'i dus la bab// lcags kyi srin mo chen mo la// g.yu yi lan phran gos su gon// lcags kyi tshe 'brang sil li li// lcags kyi mda' dang rdo 'phen ma// lcags kyi dre'u la g.yu'i

sga// srin mo khus 'debs su byed pa// mi zad chen mo da tshur spyon// tshil tshil ma ma sha sha khug khug dam tshig rbad// 'khor gyis bkug rjes phur pa gdab// ces bya ba ni bdun mo bdun dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs so// 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma'i rgyud las// bdud kyi g.yog mo bdun dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o// ma mo kun gyi phyag brnyan ma// re ma ti dang re ma dza// nag mo A r+ya re ma ti// nam mkha' byi phur glog ma srin// klong dgu ma cig re ma ti// ming dgu g.yog mo gsum ldan pa'i// de yi dkyil 'khor sgrub thabs bshad// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// chu bo'i gzhung dang bzhi mdo dang// brag nag chu rigs mtshal rigs chags// de ru byin brlabs mtshams gcad de// dam rdzas yo byad tshang bar bsag/ dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum bri// khrag las byas pa'i zla gam gsum// tshul bzhin bris pa de nyid du// dpon g.yog bzhi po tshul bzhin dgod// bsgrub pa chen po gzhung bzhin bya// sngags pa man ngag gdeng ldan pas// shun chen slag pa de bzhin no// srid pa spyi lugs zha gon te// 'phreng ba chen po de bzhin bgrang// spos chen dud pa rgyun mi gcad// bu cig spu gur ma nyams sems// 'bras bu mi dbang mtshal tog dang// shel nag spyi dkar mi rigs dang ni// dkar nag tshe nu zla gam 'dra// sol pa'i phye dang sen dgu rnams// de nyid bsgrub dang bsten pa'i rdzas// ming gis med du mi rung ngo// lho dang lho yi glong phyogs nas// kha dog bcud kyi dam pa dang// dri dang ro dang kha dog ldan// 'byung ba rtsal te rdzas su bsag/ ming gis med du mi rung ngo// ljang khu dmar dang mdar chen mdzod// lhum pu sngo dang tshon sna lnga// maM sa gang rung dmar rnams bsag/ ming gis med du mi rung ngo// ma mo spyi yi phyag rgya bcings// srid pa'i dkyil 'khor nas drangs nas su// 'bum mam bye bar rab bzlas te// 'od dang du ba dri dang sgra// lha mo'i gzugs kyang ston par 'gyur// dkair ser dmar sngo'i rnam pa yi// ldan pa de tsho'i dngos grub kyang// rnam pa gang 'dod bsgrub cing blang// de nas dngos grub thob pa dang// phan gnod las kyi bdag mo ste// ma mo nyid du bdag nyid gnas// phan gnod las ni gang byed pa// so so'i dam rdzas bsags nas ni// dmigs pa'i las de bsgyur la bsgrub// gdungs pa'i dbyangs 'di blang bar bya// lha mo nag mo re ma mthu mo che// ming gcig ma la mkhan stong ma// mdog bzang nag mo ral pa can// ral pa'i zar bu smug nag gtibs// ma mo kun gyi phyag brnyan ma// brtan ma kun gyi yang rje mo// ma bdud rgyal mo zhes kyang grags// skye 'gro'i srog dang dbugs

'chang ma// rkang dug lcags kyi lham gon ma// sku la re lde mdzes pa gsol// mi mgo rta mgo mkhar du brtsigs// thod pa dgu brtsegs gzhal yas na// nag mo tshogs kyi dbus 'gying ma// khams gsum srid gsum thams cad na// dam tshig bsrung pa re mang na// yal dam can ni 'ga' 'ga' tsam// khams gsum srid gsum thams cad na// 'gro don mdzad mdzad ma cig 'o re brgyal// bdag 'dra gsungs pas bskyod cing gdungs pa'i tshe// 'chi ma thul ma thogs myur du spyon// bu cig sbu gur ma nyams sems// 'bras bu mi dbang mtshal tog 'di// ma la 'bul lo za za ma cig ma// bdag gi brnag pa'i mthar phyung zhig/ bdag gi las 'di 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// rdzas rnams gang yin de tshe bstan// zhes bya ba ni// lha mo chen mo nyid g.yog mo gsum dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs so// 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma'i rgyud las/ dpal lha mo nyid g.yog mo gsum dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gu+i sgrub thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// gnod spyin mo lbar ldan pa de'i skrub thabs cho ga bshad// bsgo pa nyan pa'i phan 'dogs bcas// dur khrod khyad par lho phyogs bstan// sgo ngos mo nyal nam mkha' la// sgrib g.yogs med pas sgrub pa pos// mngon du gyur pa de'i tshe// khyad par can gyi sbam pho blang// sa stengs rak+tas rdol rnon byas// sha chen 'phan bya shun pas bla re bya// lhu gdum mthar gzhag gu gul gyi// dud pa mi tshad sbrang chen gyi// me mar 'od dang ldan par bya// sna tshogs ro ldan dkar nag tshe// rnam pa sna tshogs lda par bya// bcu drug gtso gtor rak+ta sbyar// ra sa ya na myos byed sbyar// che mchog gzugs mar re ma ti// yab yum gnyis po gsal bar dmigs// gnod sbyin ma lnga'i snying nas drang// zla ba gcig nas tsa ras bskang// gsum na nam mkha' lding gis so// drug na shel nag spyi dkar te// lo gcig mngon du byung bar 'gyur// chu dang ma 'dres dngas ma'i khrag/ b+ha ling sha truM rgyun du bzhin// bzlas brjod bsgrub pa'i skabs su ni// ra kyang 'brel med yugs sa mdze mo dang// sprang mo spyi skyes 'dzings ma rnams// mthong na bshags pa myur du bya'o// mngon du byung bar ma gyu kyang// rgyal mos mchod dang bsgo ba nyan// mdzes pa'i tshul du ston gyur na// lnga las gnas 'gyur rgyal mo ste// g.yog mo bzhi yis bskor bar bsgom// sngags dang ming rus spel te brjod// gang 'dod las ni bcol bar bya// bsten dbyangs snyan pas bskul ba ni// cig ma cig re ma ti// srin mo mdog nag gcer bu khyod// gos su mun pa nag gon// me sgron 'bar ba'i sham thabs can// rdo rje mche ba 'bar pa

ste// za bar 'dod pas lce 'jib ma// zhal nas mi khrag rta khrag rta khrag 'dzag/ phyag g.yas 'gugs pa'i lcags kyi bsnams// phyag g.yon ral gris gcod par byed// chibs su dre'u rta rkang gsum chibs// sha khrag kun gyi dri snom ma// sku stong mi lpags khrag 'dzag gsol// sku smad re lde nag pos dkris// rkang gdub lcags sgrog nag pos byas// thod pa khrag 'dzag skul brgyan// thod pa lnga yi dbu rgyan can// gang du bsams pas yud kyis phyin// sngon gyi thugs dam dmar lags kyis// dmar chen khrag la da tshul spyon gnod spyin 'phrog ma mthu mo che// khrag mtsho 'bar ba'i gzhal yas nas// lcags kyi spyang mo mgo gsum chibs// phang pa yod na 'dzin pa ni// gser la khus gon nu ma bzhin// g.yas na ral gri 'dzin pas gcod// snga gong phyi gong zhing bcu la// sku yi smad du dkris pa ni// ras nag mun pa'i kha dog 'dra// lha ma yin gyi cha lugs te// 'dod khams ma lus 'khrug byed ma// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas nas// ma mo dur khrod tsa mu ti// khyod kyi gdan gyi mtshan nyid ni// ro yi steng na ro bsgreng brtsegs// phrag pa gnyis su zhabs 'jog ma// gnod spyin dmar mo rgan mo'i gzugs// zhal gcig ma la spyan gsum ma// phyag bzhi g.yas kyi dang po na// gcid par byed pa'i gri rnon 'dzin// phyag bzhi g.yas kyi 'og ma na// 'debs par byed pa'i ral gri 'dzin// phyag bzhi g.yon gyi dang po na// mche chung khar 'dzud sgyeg tshul gnas// phyag bzhi g.yon gyi 'og ma na// 'thung bar byed pa'i thod pa bsnams// chibs su dre'u rta rkang gsum chibs// 'khor ni gnod spyin stong gis bskor// dur khrod gnas nas dmigs pa len// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// rnal 'byor chen mo nag mo ni// pho brang rlung mtsho'i gzhal yas nas// rlung gi rnga mo'i ro stengs bzhugs// skad cig yud la kun tu phyin// gnod spyin rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// gos su mun pa nag po gon// lag na tsit+ta dmar po thogs// khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab// gnod spyin dus mtshan chen mo khyod// gcer bu nam mkha'i gos gon ma// dre'u pho la legs par chibs// g.yas na gcod par byed pa'i gri// g.yon na thod pa khrag gang la// rang gis rang la thim par stob// lha ma yin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan// 'khor kyang lha min stong gis bskor// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// ces bskul ba ni// 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma la gnod spyin ma bzhis bskor pa'i sgrub thabs so// 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma'i rgyud las// dpal lha mo gnod spyin mo'i cha lugs su zhugs te// gnod spyin ma bzhis bskor ba'i sgrub thabs bstan pa

le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// de nas bdun mo sgrub thabs ni/ ma bdun bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad// khang rul nag po 'am gdug pa'i sa// chu gling drag po 'am gnod spyin gnas// 'dre srin 'tshags pa'i mdun sa dang// brag dmar gcan gzan mche ba 'dra// brag nag drag po'i gnas der bsgrub// brgyad dam bco lnga'i nub mo 'jug/ phung po'i shul nas sa blangs te// dkyil 'khor 'phen tshad rgyas par brtsigs// dbus su gru gsum dmar nag bri// dbang gi zla gam gsum gyis bskor// bcad pa rak+ta'i rgya mtsho gtang// mu khyud ka ba'i 'phreng bas bskor// lcags sam rdo sol nag pos gtang// mtshan ldan gnyis ni yab yum gnyis// dbus kyi gru gsum rten ma'i steng// lcags sam seng ldeng phur pa nyid// byin brlabs de la phur pa brten// zla gam gsum la drag po bdun// dbyings bdun byin brlabs phur bu dgod// gnod spyin rtsang bdun lcags ris bskor// gdong bzhir phur bu grwa bzhir gzugs// mchog gi phur bu sgo bzhir dgod// ba lam khri sman nub byang dgod// mi dbang rgyal mtshan grwa bzhir gzugs// zhing ngam mthing nag bla re bri// spyi yi gtor ma shar du gzhag/ ma mo'i gtor ma lho ru ste// thun gyi gtor ma nub tu gzhag/ skam phe a mr-i tas ldan pa'i// khrag gi zangs bu byang du gzhag/ lta ba drod kyi man ngag dang// spyod pa bsgrub pa'i man ngag dang// khyad par ma mo'i man ngag gsum// sngags pa man ngag gdengs ldan pas// shin chen slag pa de bzhin gon// srid pa spyi lugs zha gon te// 'phreng ba chen po de bzhin bgrang// tshil chen me mar kha lnga gtang// gu gul dud pa rgyun mi gcad// shing lo'i gzugs ni gtor ma'i dbus// phung po gzugs kyi lig ka de// lcags sam nag po'i mtshon gyis gdags// lha mo nyid kyi lag tu gtad// nyungs kar nyungs nag thal chen rdzas// lho nub mtshams su gzhag par bya// rus pa sha chen sha snang dang snying sna la sogs mang po kun// mu ran la ni gzhag par bya'o// khrag 'thung gzungs ma mtshan ldan la// gcig gam yang na gnyis kyang gzhag/ nam mkha'i lding dang tsa ra dang// shel dang gsum po nag por bsag/ rang nyid dpal gyi cha lugs te// yum yang yum du bsgom par bya// khrag 'thung yab yum gsal ba yis// bdud mo ma bdun bcas pa yang// rang gi snying gi dkyil nas drang// sngags bzlas bar ma chad pa dang// de dus rtags su// byung ba ni// nam mkha' smug nag 'thibs pa'i tshe// bdud mo shel spyi dkar bas bskang// gnas khang 'khor bu 'am thams cad du// chom sgra chung dang che ba ni// rgyal po 'am ma mo dbang 'dus pas// bskrad dang gtor ma byin te

bcom// 'tshegs na 'gong bu bskrad par bya// chas ngan sprag mor 'ong ni// bskang gso'i cho ga rgya cher bya// rang nyid nyams ni mi gsal na// phur bu byang chub sems kyis bskang// rang nyid bsdu bar 'dod pa'i tshe// rak+ta khrag gis bskang bar bya// seng seng 'gro bar 'gyur pa na// dbang du bsdus te gsal bar bya'o// 'jigs shing snying nyid mi dga' na// bdud mo nag mo byang chub ma'i// nyams sod yin pas myur du bsgom// 'od dkar byung na rgyal po bskrad// me dum byung na dam sri bskrad// bud med nag mo'i tshogs byung na// ma dang sring mor bstan par bya// gdung zhing 'khor la byams pa dang// bu tsha 'tsho bar rab tu bshad// zlas dang grogs dang bram mo'i tshul// bu med rang gnod nor la skam// sgra snyan byung na tshe nyid 'grub// sgra chen byung na drag po bya// tshub ma dmar nag mthong sleb na// gtor ma byin te dgra la rbad// nam mkha' lding gis bskang bar bya'o// dri zhim byung na zas skom 'grub// tsa ra nag mos bskang ba bya'o// lha mo dngos su mthong ba dang// ma dang bu ru dam bcas shing// bod+hi tsat+ti rang byung gis// dam bsres mnas bsgrag las la bsgo// bzang ba'i rtags rnams gang byung yang// nye ba yin phyir mnyes pa dang// dbang du bsdus nas las rnams 'grub// rkyen dang phrad dang ma phrad kyis// rings myung mo nyid gang der bsgrubs mthong nas tha tshigs dam bcas pa// dam tshig nyams kyis 'jigs pa'i phyir// mgu dang ma mgu med par bsgrub// mang po'i mdun du las byas kyang// the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur// ma mo dngos sum thong gyur na// kha na ma thor 'gyur srid pas// slob dpon ma gtogs gzhan mi smra// gcig pu grogs kyang med pa bsgrub// dbang 'dus ting 'dzin gsal gyur na// ma mthong na yang 'grub par 'gyur/ rgyun du bsrings na gang gis kyang// the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur// nye bar 'gyur na legs 'grub pa// dpyid ni chu mdo gsang 'das 'dabs su// dbyar ni gsang rtse g.ya' gong bsgrub// ston ni spang 'bos 'dubs bsgrub// dgun ni dur khrod spang phub bsgrub// mchod pa nyin gung mtshan la bstabs// nam gyi gung la gtor ma gtong// de las gsad pa'i las kyang bya// phur bus gdab cing ral gris gtub// gtor ma 'phang zhing spyin sreg bya// bsten dbyangs snyan pas bskul pa ni// bskal pa me ltar 'bar pa'i klong dkyil nas// rlung nag tshub mar 'khyil ba'i nang shed nas// ma gcig 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma// bdud kyi lcam gcig gshin rje'i yum gcig ma// nag mo rngam pa'i mche ba can// mthing nag gcer bu ral pa can// sku mdog nag mor bzhugs pa ni// don dam

dbyings las bskyod pa med pa'i rtags// ral pa g.yas nas g.yon du 'khyil ba ni// yum gyi mkha' la sprul pa 'gyed pa'i rtags// ral pa spyi gtsug gcig tu 'khyil pa ni// skye med don dam gcig tu 'khyil pa'i rtags// ral pa'i gseb nas me stag 'phro ba ni// thugs kyi sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed pa'i rtags/ thod rlon 'phreng bas sku la brgyan pa ni// thugs rje sprul skus 'gro don mdzad pa'i rtags// g.yas kyi snyan nas seng ge 'phyo ba ni// sman mo thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags// g.yon pa'i sbrul gyi gdengs ka 'phyo ba ni// zhe sdang ma spangs dbyings su dag pa'i rtags// snyan cha gser gyi dril bu 'khrol ba ni// sangs rgyas kun la bsnyen bkur mdzad pa'i rtags// spyan rtsa dmar la sdang mig bgrad pa ni// dgra bgegs thams cad rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags// shangs nas khrag dang zhag gi dro snom ma// dpag tshad brgyad khri'i gnas nas len par byed// zhal nas drag po ho ma khug gdangs pa ni// dam nyams dgra bo zhal du sdud pa'i rtags// rno gdug mche ba zur gsum gtsigs pa ni// dgra bgegs sha la chem chem gsol pa'i rtogs// thugs rje chags pa'i rtags su rak+ta'i thig le sa brgyan// don dam bcud kyi rtags su zhag gi zo ris brgyan// 'dul byed 'phrin las rtags su thal chen chen mas brgyan// zhing lpags rlon pa sku la gsol ba ni// chos nyid yang dag don dang ldan pa'i rtags// glang chen ko rlon sku la gsol ba ni// theg pa mchog gi don dang ldan pa'i rtags// re lde nag pos gnam phyed dkris pa ni// 'jig rten 'di na che btsan ldan pa'i rtags// lte ba'i dkyil nas nyi ma 'char ba ni// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho ma lus skems pa'i rtags// lcags sgrog 'bar ba zhabs la 'khrol ba ni// 'dod ka mas 'dul pa'i dbang dang ldan pa'i rtags// g.yas na shing lang nag po bsnams pa ni// sdug bsngal skye shing rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags// 'og ma thod rlon 'phreng ba 'dren pa ni// thugs rjes 'khor ba gnas nas 'dren pa'i rtags// g.yon gyis tri shul rtse gsum bsnams pa ni// dam nyams khams gsum rdul du rlog pa'i rtags// 'og ma thod rlon dmar gyis bkang ba ni// srid gsum sha khrag zhal du 'thung ba'i rtags// bong bu ga phyin phyogs zhon pa ni// gti mug don dam shes rab bsal ba'i rtags// srin po'i lkog mas sga ru byas pa ni// bdud dang srin po zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags// sbrul nag chun pos gong rmed byas pa ni// zhar sdang dbang gis dgra dpung 'joms pa'i rtags// rus sbal nag pos pho bus brgyan pa ni// klu rigs thams cad dbang du rdzogs pa'i rtags// bdud kyi khram bam snga shar btags pa

ni// dam nyams gang yin khram la 'debs pa'i rtags// nad kyi rkyal pa phyi shar byas pa ni// dkon mchog dbu 'phang smod byed dgra bo la// nad kha ma lus 'bebs par byed pa'i rtags// nag mo 'bum phrag bran du bkol nas kyang// bstan pa 'jig par byed pa'i snying nas drongs// ma bdud 'bum phrag pho nyar da thog la// dam nyams dbu 'phang smod pa khrid las shog/ ma cig kha nas me 'bar rgya mtsho skems// lag na rdor 'phyar ri rab snyil// ral nag mun pas stong gsum khengs// kha na mi sha rlon pa za// khrag dang zhag 'dzag rgya mtshor 'khyil// dpal ldan chen mo da tshur spyon// bdag gis brtson par khyod bstod kyis// ma cig lha mo da tshur spyon// bcol pa'i las rnams grub par gyis// mA mo b+h+yo b+h+yo srog la hur hur thum thum rbad rbad// hU~M// stong chen mo'i dkyil 'khor nas// rdo rje gur gyi gzhal yas nas// rdo rje bka' yi pho nya mo// dkar mo dung gi ral pa can// khyung gi mgo la nyi zla'i spyin// ral gri stong gi gshog pa can/ rdo rje mche gshog re re la// sprul pa khyung gi pho nya 'gyed// lag na shel gyi phur pa 'dril// rdo rje pho nya 'bum sde yis// slob dpon smod pa khrid las shog/ ma ma pram bu a ti b+h+yo dza// dgra bo ni dza// zhes ni kun tu spel par bya// nam mkha' yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'ja' tshon 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// rdo rje bka' yi pho nya ni// 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i mtshon cha can// ral kham nag gyen du 'khyil// spyan gsum sdang mig 'jigs par lta// thod rlon 'phreng bas sku la brgyan// phyag na rdo rje rtse gsum bsnams// kun bzang chen mo 'khor bcas kyis// dam nyams dgra bo khrid las shog/ ye shes chen mo'i dkyil 'khor nas// ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas nas// rdo rje bka' yi pho nya mo// sngo nag mi sdug mche ba can// ral pa dmar nag gyen du 'khyil// spyan gsum zhe sdang logs kyis lta// phyag na rdo rje rtse gcig 'dril// ye shes chen mo 'khor bcas kyis// dam nyams dgra bo khrid las shog/ phyag rgya chen mo'i dkyil 'khor nas// mu men mdzes pa'i gzhal yas khang// rdo rje bka' yi pho nya mo// dmar mo bse yi thor tshugs can// bya rgod mgo la nyi zla'i spyan// spu gra 'bar ba'i gshog pa can// me dpung 'bar pa'i klong na bzhugs// phyag na lcags kyi phur pa dril// rdo rje sgron ma 'khor bcas kyis// dam nyams dgra bo khrid las shog/ gnod spyin mo yi dkyil 'khor nas// an+d+ri nI la'i gzhal yas khang// rdo rje bka' yi pho nya mo// dmar mo spyan gsum mche ba can// ral pa sngo dmar gyen du 'khyil// gdug pa ma lus kun 'dul zhing// g.yas na rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams// g.yon na mchog gi phur ba

'dril// rdo rje 'od chags 'khor bcas kyis// dam nyams dgra bo khrid las shog/ 'od dpug chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// sna tshogs 'phro ba'i gzhal yas khang// rdo rje bka' yi pho nya mo// sngon mo mi srun 'brug la chibs// zhing gi g.yang gzhi gos su gon// lag na khrag gi zhags pa thogs// tshangs pa'i gnas kyang 'jigs par byed// g.yon na gser gyi phur pa 'dril// rdo rje g.yu sgron 'khor bcas kyis// dam tshig nyams pa rdul du rlogs// dbang phyug chen mo'i dkyil 'khor nas// pad+ma 'bar pa'i gzhal yas khang// rdo rje bka' yi pho nya mo// sngon mo gtum mo mi srin seng ge chibs// sbrul nag stong gis sku la brgyan// rus sbal dkar po'i thod 'phreng can// lag na be con nag po thogs// g.yon na bse yi phur pa 'dril// rdo rje g.yu sgron 'khor bcas kyis// dam nyams dgra bo khrid las shog/ mkha' la dbang sgyur srid pa'i byan mkhan ma// de yi thugs las sprul pa'i pho nya ni// shar lho gru chad 'bar pa'i gzhal yas nas// mi mo seng ge'i mgo can la// lcags kyi ral pa gyen du 'khyil// sku la mi lpags rlon pa gsol// lag na khrag gi lcags kyu thogs// mi snying rlon pa zas su za// mi khrag mngal mo skom du 'thung// khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab// de yi bka' nyan pho nya ni// shel gyi seng ge ral pa can// shel gyi lus la nyi ma'i mig/ spu ni lcags kyu bsregs pa 'dra// bang ni glog pas nges par mgyogs// skad ni 'brug pas nges par che// mig ni nyi ma'i zer bas rno// zas su dgra bo'i sha la za// skom du nyams pa'i khrag la 'thung// dam tshig nyams pa'i snying nas drongs// lho nub gru chad gzhal yas nas// mi mo stag gi mgo can la// ral pa ser nag gyen du 'khyil// sku la mu men slag pa gsol// phyag na khrag gi tshags pa bsnams// kha nas nad kyi rlangs pa 'byung// 'jig rten nad kyis btul bar mdzad// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas drongs// de yi bka' nyan pho nya ni// stag la gser mdog mgo lnga po// gser gyi lus la nyi ma'i mig/ spu ni lcags kyu bsregs pa 'dra// bang ni glog pas nges par mgyogs// skad ni 'brug pas nges par che// mig ni nyi ma'i zer bas rno// zas su dam nyams shal za// skom du dam nyams khrag la 'thung// khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab/ nub byang gru chad 'bar pa'i gzhal yas nas// sprul pa bya rgod thang nag la// mchu ni gnam lcags zhun ma 'dra// lcags sder sngon mo bshad de bshad// rdo rje gshog pa 'bar ba las// sprul pa bya nag mang por 'phro// zhing chen ba su 'dren cing za// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// dgra bo dam nyams snying nas drongs// de yi bka' nyan pho

nya ni// ur mo 'brug sngon so rnon la// yan lag thams cad sbrul gyis brgyan// klu chen brgyad kyi khri la bzhugs// zas su dam nyams sha la za// skom du dam nyams khrag la 'thung// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// byang shar gru chad 'bar pa'i gzhal yas nas// sprul pa kaM ka chen mo la// khrag gi gshog pa brlabs pa yis// 'jig rten khams su khrag nad 'bebs// bse yi mchu sder dmar po yis// dur khrod gnas nas bam chen 'byin// b+ha ga'i sprul pas stong khams khengs// khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab// de yi bka' nyan pho nya ni// lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum ma// lcags kyi lus la nyi ma'i mig/ spu ni lcags kyu bsregs pa 'dra// bang ni glog pas nges par mgyogs// mig ni nyi ma'i 'od pas rno// zas su dgra bo'i sha la za// skom du dgra bo'i khrag la 'thung// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// shar phyogs shel gyi khang bzangs nas// sprul pa rdo rje bud med lus// rus sbal dkar po'o go cog can// sku la glang chen g.yang gzhi gsol// phyag na rtse ta kha gsum bsnams// dbu la rdo rje rtse gcig 'bar// pa spu nyag ma re re la// bskal pa'i me ltar tsha tsha 'phro// chibs su rus spal nag po chibs// sdom dang sdig pa'i sprul pa 'gyed// sprul pa'i pho nya da thong la/ dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas drongs 'phrin las mdzod cig tsa mun ti// lho phyogs g.yu yi khang bzangs na// sprul pa rdo rje bud med lus// rus sbal sngon po'i mgo bo can// chu glang nag po'i g.yang gzhi gsol// zhabs las bskal pa'i chu nag ldang// dbu la rin chen 'bar bas brgyan// pa spu nyag ma re re la// sbrul dang sdig pa'i tshang kyang bcas// chibs su sbrul nag mgo gsum chibs// zhags pa sngon po phyag na bsnams// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// snying nas drongs cig ku ma la// dbang sgyur srid pa'i byan mkhan ma// de yi thugs las sbrul pa'i pho nya ni// shar lho gru chad 'bar ba'i gzhal yas nas// mi mo seng ge'i mgo can la// lcags kyi ral ba gyen du 'khyil// sku la mi lpags rlon pa gsol// lag na khrag gi lcags kyu thogs// mi snying rlon pa zas su za// mi khrag mngal mo skom du 'thung// khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab// de yi bka' nyan pho nya ni// shel gyi sel ge ral pa can// shil gyi lus la nyi ma'i mig/ spu ni lcags kyu bsregs pa 'dra// bang ni glog pas nges par mgyogs// skad ni 'brug pas nges par che// mig ni nyi ma'i zer bas rno// zas su dgra bo'i sha la za// skom du nyams pa pa'i khrag la 'thung// dam tshig nyams pa'i snying nas drongs// lho nub gru chad gzhal yas nas// mi mo stag gi mgo can la// ral pa ser nag gyen du 'khyil// sku la mu

men slag pa gsol// phyag na khrag gi zhags pa bsnams// kha nas nad kyi rlangs pa 'byung// 'jig rten nad kyis btul bar mdzod// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// dam nyams dgra po'i snying nas drongs// de yi bka' nyan pho nya ni// stag la gser mdog mgo lnga pa// gser gyi lus la nyi ma'i mig/ spu ni lcags kyu bsregs pa 'dra// bang ni glog pas nges par mgyogs// skad ni 'brug pas nges par che// mig ni nyi ma'i zer bas rno// zas su dam nyams sha la za// skom du dam nyams khrug la 'thung// khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab// nub byang gru chad 'bar ba'i gzhal yas nas// sprul pa bya rgod thang nag la// chu ni gnam lcags zhun ma 'dra// lcags sder sngon mo bshad de bshad// rdo rje gshog pa 'bar ba las// sprul pa bya nag mang por 'phro// zhing chen ba su 'dren cing za// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// dgra bo dam nyams snying nas drongs// de yi bka' nyan pho nya ni// ur mo 'brug sngon so rnon la// yan lag thams cad sbrul gyis brgyan// klu chen brgyad kyi khri la bzhugs// zas su dam nyams sha la za// skom du dam nyams khrag la 'thung// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// byang shar gru chad 'bar ba'i gzhal yas nas// sprul pa kaM ka chen mo la// khrag gi gshog pa brlabs pa yis// 'jig rten khams su khrag nad 'bebs// bse yi mchu sder dmar po yis// dur khrod gnas nas bam chen 'byin// b+ha ga'i sprul pas stong khams khengs// khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab// de yi bka' nyan pho nya ni// lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum ma// lcags kyi lus la nyi ma'i mig/ spu ni lcags kyu bsregs pa 'dra// bang ni glog bas nges par mgyogs// mig ni nyi ma'i 'od bas rno// zas su dgra bo'i sha la za// skom du dgra bo'i khrag la 'thung// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// shar phyogs shel gyi khas bzangs nas// sprul pa rdo rje bud med lus// rus sal dkar po'i go cog can// sku la glang chen g.yang gzhi gsol// phyag na rtse ta kha gsum bsnams// dbu la rdo rje rtse gcig 'bar// pa spu nyag ma re re la// bskal pa'i me ltar tsha tsha 'phro// chibs su rus sbal nag po chibs// sdom dang sdig pa'i sprul pa 'gyed// sbrul pa'i pho nya da thong la// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas drongs// 'phrin las mdzod cig tsa mun ti// lho phyogs g.yu yi khang bzangs na// sprul pa rdo rje bud med lus// rus sbal sngon po'i mgo bo can// chu glang nag po'i g.yang gzhi gsol// zhabs las bskal pa'i chu nag ldang// dbu la rin chen 'bar pas brgyan// pa spu nyag ma re re la// sbrul dang sdig pa'i tshang kyang bcas// chibs su sbrul nag mgo gsum chibs/ zhags pa sngon

po phyag na bsnams// khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab// snying nas drongs cis ku ma ri// nub phyogs bse yi khang bzangs nas// dbang mdzad ma phang kun 'dul ma// sprul pa rdo rje bud med lus// dbu na gti mug phag rgod mgo// rus sbal stong gi thul pa gsol// pad+ma 'bar pa'i go cog can// chibs su phag mo sum grus chibs// bar bar sa rko lhogs se lhogs// phyag na zangs kyi sgrog chen bsnol// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas khug/ dur gyi rag+sha sho ra re// byang phyogs gser gyi khang bzangs nas// sprul pa rdo rje bud med lus// dbu ni za byed spyang mo'i mgo// sku la lcags kyi tshem tshem gsol// mu men gser gyi go cog can// gser gyi dril bu 'bum gyis brgyan// phyag na gser gyi sil snyan bsnams/ chibs su lcags kyi spyang ki chibs// khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab// thal bar lhogs shig yak+sha tsa mun ti// nam mkha' yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// sring cig khug chos dbyar mo btsun// chibs su skyin bu kha dkar chibs// sku la rus sbal thug pa gsol// phyag na lcags kyu 'bar ba bsnums// khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab// gling yul gling stong gling gi khri rtse nas// sring cig lho yi skyi mthing ma// chibs su mdzod chen zal mo chibs// na bza' bcos kyi la'u gsol// phyag na 'phrul gyi me long bsnams// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// rma chen 'khyung btsun rab gnas nas// sring cig kha rag khyung btsun ma// na bza' bya rgod thul pa gsol// chibs su bya rgod dar ma chibs// phyag na ne seg 'phreng bas 'grang// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// byang phyogs rus chen 'khor lo nas// sring cig byang gi sma 'thig ma// chibs su bse glang dmar po chibs// na bza' rus chen slag pa gsol// phyag na gser gyi cha lang bsnams// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// nam mkhar g.yu yi lding khang nas// sring cig rdo rje g.yu sgron ma// chibs su lcags kyi spyang khu chibs// sku la gser gyi gos su gsol// gser g.yu spangs pa'i thod rdeng can// phyag na khram gyi zhags pa bsnams// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas drongs// gangs ri chu 'dzag gnas rab nas// sring cing sha med gangs dkar ma// chibs su dung sha dkar po chibs// sku la dung gi le'u gsol// phyag na ban+d+ha rlon pa bsnams// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// spu si si'i spang khang nas// sring cig kong yul bod khams skyong// chibs su bdud bya nag po chibs// na bza' btsos kyi go zu gsol// dbu la mthing gi go cag gsol// phyag na bdud kyi khra bam snams// khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab// ces bskul zhing

rak+ta brlabs pa ni// bdud mo ma bdun dang bcas pa'i sgrub thabs so// 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma'i rgyud las// dpal lha mo nyid bdud mo'i cha lugs su zhugs pa ma bdun dang// 'phra men ma bzhi dang// sprul pa bzhi dang// las kyi sring bdun dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// de nas dpal lha mo nyid kyi 'khor na dang bdud kyi rgyal po gnas pas// gnod 'dul lha'i rgyal po 'di skad ces smras so// kye gnod 'dul lha'i rgyal po khyod nyid ni// bdag cag lha thams cad kyi gtso bo// gnod spyin thams cad kyi bdag po lags na// ci'i slad du dpal lha mo nyid sprul pa sna tshogs su sprul pa'i sgrub thabs bcom ldan 'das la mi zhu ba// a la la// shin tu ya mtshan che zhing ngo mtshar to// zhes gsol pas// gnod mdzes lha'i rgyal po shes bzhin du stan las langs te// bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan stong phrag du mar byas te// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// 'di skad ces gsol to// sems can las ni tha dad pa// tha dad de rnams gdul don du// sprul pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbrul// 'jig rten bsam pa tha dad pa'i// 'jig rten mi la sman slad du// sna tshogs sgrub thabs dam pa 'di/ mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal 'tshal// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// 'jig rten mi la phan don du/ sna tshogs sgrub thabs nga yis bshad// nal gyi snying dang dbang po dang// go ro tsa na rab bsres la// ri lu tsa na'i tshad tsam bya// nyi shu ma'i bum pa bskam// bsgrubs dang ma bsgrubs pa'i sman// rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu bsags// mkhang dang sa stengs sa 'og dang// rnam pa thams cad 'tshogs par bsag/ byang zad la sogs khu ba'i tshogs// gson dang mi gson sna tshogs bsag/ rab tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su// skyon med shi ba blangs nas ni// man+Dal khrag gis byi dor bya// mgo bcad snod der nyid kyi dbang// gzhi byas b+ha ling gong rgyu las// kar nag tshe ni tsit+ta 'dra// ril kus sman dang dpa' po bstsal// myos byed dmar dang bdud rtsir sbyar// bum pa'i phyi ma dag tu'o// rtsa ba med pa'i bum nang du// snying khrag dug tu sbyar ba ni// zur gsum 'bar ba'i nang du gzhug/ gnyen po lta yang bsgom par bya// rlung nang nag mo'i tsit+ta drang// 'ongs nas mdun du gnas par bsgom// zhag gsum nub mo sdug mi sdug/ cho 'phrul sna tshogs byung ba la// rtog med sems kyi gtor ma sbyin// zhag lnga'i nub mo sdug pa yi// cho 'phrul sna tshogs byung ba la// dga' ba med pa'i sems kyis ni// gtor ma byin to gsol ba gdab// ga pur

dud pa rgyun mo cad// bdud gyi nub mo mngon du 'byung// gtsang dang mi gtsang bye brag brtag/ lus la sbrul gyis 'khril ba dang// sbrul la zhon zhing 'gro ba sogs// klu'i sdug dang mi sdug pa'o// rta'i rtag dang zhon pa dang// lha khang mchod rten bu chung sogs// mchod dang mi mchod bye brag ni// btsan dang rgyal po sdug mi sdug/ bud med sprang dang mdzes pa sogs// 'khor gyi sman mo sdug ma sdug/ bong bu dre'u tsogs 'dra zhon pa// lha mo nyid kyi sdug mi sdug/ kun la dga' ba'i sems bskyed bsgrub// mi sdug sdug la bsgo ba nyan// mo nyin mngon du byung ba 'am// dam tshig bsreg na ci yang bsgrub// 'jigs na yi chad phung bar 'gyur// gdung ba med na g.yel bar 'gyur// zhe sdag med na sgrol mi nus// ting 'dzin tshungs na bsgo mi nyan// bsten thabs nor na 'khor la gnod// lta ba med na dpang mi 'du// dam bsres deng nas gting bsgrub dngos// ma slangs sbyor ba thams cad dgos// dga' ba skyes na gzhan mi 'grub// the tsom can la grub ba med// dam tshig med na rang nyid gsod// rdzas rnams zhan na khro bar 'gyur// lo zla 'das na nyams pa'i gnas// drod tshad med na bar chad 'byung// skyon rnams bzhi po yongs spangs nas// bsgrubs na yid bzhin nor bu bzhin// gnam stong tshes brgyad bco lnga la// myos byed khrag dang ri lur sbyar// bum pa re re mchod par bya// gnyis lnga dgu ni nyi shu dbang// de la gtor ma drag po 'phang// grub pa tsam gyis dbang byas pa'o// grub nas bka' nyan snying zor bsgom// tshig dang dbyangs kyis bskul ba ni// byang shar mtshams kyi ma cig ma// dpal ldan nag mo re ma ti// ma bdun chen mo zhes kyang grags// gnas ni khrag gi mtsho la gnas// bzhugs ni mi thod spungs pa'i mkhar na bzhugahas// nag mo gcer bu ral gcig ma// sku la re ba'i gos su gsol// ched ka dar gos sngon po gon// sdug dang mi sdug cha lugs can// mgo la skra gcig skyes pa ni// kham pa mi bzad gnam du zug/ ral pa gnam du sprugs pas ni// gnam la dkar po khrag tu skyugs// ral pa thad kar sprugs pas ni// khams gsum ma lus dbang du sdud// ral pa thur du gsigs pas ni// dgra bgegs ma lus thal bar rlog/ thod rlon 'phreng bas rgyun du bcings// dpral nas mig gcig bgrad pas ni// khams gsum mi mthong gang yang med// dam nyams dgra bo rtsad nas chod// kha nas so gcig gtsigs pas ni// dgra bgegs sha la chem chem gsol// brang nas nu gcig bshal bas ni// rnal 'byor kun gyi gsos kyang mdzad// thugs dam drag tu bskul ba'i tshe// dpung mgo g.yas la 'gyel zhing 'gro// phyag

g.yas bdud kyi khram bam bsnams// g.yon na nad kyi rkyal pa bsnams// shangs nas nad kyi bu yig 'bebs// zhabs la sag ti cang khre gsol// chibs su dre'u nag rkang gsum chibs// dri ba dgu'i te len can// thod pa'i sga la zhing chung leg/ sbrul nag lnga brgya'i gong smed la// spal nag gzhibs pa'i pho bus brgyan// chibs ky-i de nas snga sha la// khrag gi zhags pa dmar po bcings// chibs kyi de ni phyi sha la// tshon gyi gru gu sngon dmar bkal// nag mo 'bum sde bran du 'khol// sngags pas gdungs te rbad pa'i tshe// gang la bya ba drongs shig khug/ las ngan bstan pa 'jig pa'i dgra bo 'di// kha ru lag chug khong nas snying phyung zhig/ ltag nas bdud chod gdong nas 'od phrogs shig/ mchan nas bu phrogs 'og nas chung ma sod// gnam gyi 'ju thag brten yang chod// sa yi rten phur 'og nas phyung// log par lta ba'i gti mug choms// zhe sdang ba yi don snying phyung// dkon pa'i tshe srog gnyis dang khrol// don snying khong nas 'dren tsam na// nang khrol kun kyang dum bur gtubs// srog rtsa gcad pa'i dus la bab// nang khrol dbyung pa'i dus la bab// snying khrag bzhi ba'i dus la bab// glo snying sbrug pa'i dus la bab// ces bskul lo// 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma'i rgyud las// dpal lha mo nyid mi dbang 'bras bu zas su byas pa'i sgrub thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// de nas mtsho sman rgyal mo'i sgrub thabs rab tu bshad par bya'o// ri zlum cha lang phur pa 'dra// brag phug sgo chung gting ring na// sa'i maN+Dal legs par bya// zhing dun g.yang gzhi ma bral bdun// bla ri btags shing sa gzhir dgram// zhing gi gur dang rbad por dang// tsit+ta mi dbang 'bras bu dang// tshil chen btags te rak+sha bsag/ dur khrod rdzas brgyan shom phyir dgra ma// rdzas rnams bsdus la gtor ma bya'o// gu gul dud pa rgyun mi gcad// khrag sna nyung yang bco brgyad bsham// sman sna nyung yang bco brgyad do// nam mkha' lding dang tsar dang// shel smug shel dkar shel nag gsag/ las byed phyir na byang shar sa// gshin rje'i gdug chu lho nas sbru// byang sems maM sa rak+ta dang// dru chu dri chen chag chag ni// shar lho nub byang dbus su gdab// man ngag gdeng ldan nub tu ste// yo byad byang nas bsham par bya'o// bar chad bskrad phyir khro bcus bskrad// sa las 'byung lnga ye sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas spyan gyi mkha' klong dag/ byang sems cis kyang bcos pa'o// sa las kun gyi rten gyur phyir// chos sku lte ba zlum po dkar// sbrul sku dbang gi rang bzhin gyis// pad+ma bzhi po kha dog dmar// pho nya las byed lcags ri gnag/ dbus su zla gam kha sprod la// mngon rdzogs yab kyi rgyal po

bri// g.yon gyi zla gam gnam zhal la// shar phyogs bcu gsum ban+d+ha ru// glang chen 'bras bu tsit+ta cig/ lho phyogs bcu drug ban+d+ha ru// rta sngon 'bras bu tsit+ta cig/ nub phyogs nyi shu'i ban+d+ha ru// rma bya'i 'bras bu tsit+ta cig/ byang phyogs nyer gcig ban+d+ha ru// pha wang 'bras bu tsit+ta cig/ nyi shu bzhi yi ban+d+ha ru// byang sems dri chen tsit+ta cig/ pad+ma bzhi la yang gab bzhi// steng du ban+d+ha bzhi po gzhag/ de la yang snying bzhi po bri// dkyil 'khor grwa bzhir las byed bzhi// dkyil 'khor mu ran chag gang la// long ba rgyab sbrel dkyu bar bri'o// dkyil 'khor mtha' mar phur pa ni// brgya rtsa brgyad kyis rab tu bskor// phyogs mtshams gsair phye me long bzhi// gzhal yas khang du rab bskyed la// dbus su dngos nyid nga dang yum/// rten du ban+d+ha dang po gzhag/ spyang khu'i khrag dang 'tshal chen sbyar// dbus kyi nang du khyad par du'o// gzhon nu'i zho khyor gang gis// byang sems mtshams kyi gser phye bzhir// hU~M// ma cig kun bzang chos kyi dbyings bdag mo// stong gsum 'jig rten yongs la dbang sgyur ma// 'byung lnga yum gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir// thugs dam dbang gis gnas 'dir gshegs nas kyang// dur khrod shin tu 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// yab yum dges shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// mo ha zhes bya ba la sogs brjod// dbus kyi ban+d+ha yul du gzhag/ rang rig ye shes 'od las grub// khab blon chen po spyan 'dren na// sngon gyi dpal chen spyan lam du// khab blon chen mo zhal 'ches kyis// thugs dam bskul zhing gshegs su gsol// spyi tis zhes byas shar du bzhugs// dpal chen thugs kyi sras mo ste// dpal chen bka' nyan 'khor sdud ma// sgrol blon chen mor zhal 'ches ma'i// 'dir gshegs mchod pa gzhung bzhin bzhes// badzra thod pa ma mo lho// phrin blon chen po spyan 'dren pa// gangs dkar rtse la gnas pa mo// spyan sngar khas blangs bsnyel lam ci// dur khrod 'bar ba dkyil 'khor 'dir// mchod bzhes brtan par bzhugs su gsol// rag mos thod pa nub kyi ma// dur khrod ma mo tsa mun ti// mthing nag rlung zhon gshegs su gsol// yab yum dges pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// sras mchog dam par bzhugs su gsol// byang gi ma mo spyan drang bstim// phal ba ban+d+ha bcu bzhi la// bdun gnyis bcu bzhi bris la dgod// tshal bu stong ni rtsa brgyad la// stong rtsa brgyad bris lcags ris bskor// rang sems ma bcos de bzhin nyid// ma rtogs snying rjes rang rig las// nam mkhar 'dab bzhi'i lte ba la hU~M// gdan brtsegs steng du gnam yag ste// gnam zhal nang hU~M che mchog dmigs// dpal chen byang sems thugs nyid

rten// rtsa bzhi dbang gi rgyal mo bzhir// shar phyogs rtsa ni nas tsa pa// gser gyi sbu gu dar skud 'dra// dkar mo dbu dgu re ma ti// spro bsdus shar gyi 'dab ma bskyed// snying kha rag la sogs pa'o// lho rtsa bai TU r+Ya sngon po ste// rin chen sbu gu nas tsam pa// mtsho sman A r+ya re ma ti// srin mo sngon mo rab tu bskyed// nub phyogs rtsa ni le brgan la// dmar po dar gyi lce 'dra las// spro bsdus gu h+ya re ma ti// srin mo dmar mo rab tu bskyed// byang phyogs rtsa ni nas tsam pa// in dra nI la ljang khu 'dra// rlung nag rlung zhon de la rgyu// spro bsdu tsa mun du ru bskyed// spyan drangs bstim la mchod pa dbul// yang sbas ma mo drug gi stong// he ru ka ru gsal ba des// yang gab bzhi 'khor snying drangs te// pad+ma 'dab bzhi yi rtse mor thin// 'dab ma bcu bzhi stong rtsa brgyad// sum brgya drug cu 'dus 'khor de// bka' nyan las la sdod par bsgom// nub gsum phyogs bzhi nam mkhar ni// bzlas brjod stobs kyis mdog 'thun 'byung// nam mkha'i lding gis thugs dam bskang// bzlas bas nub lnga'i nub mo ni// sgra ni phyogs bzhir lding bar 'byung// tsa ra nag pos de dus bskang// bdun gyi nub mo dri zhim bzhi// shel nag sbyi dkar thugs dam bskang// dgu yi nub mo ban+d+ha bzhi// bdud rtsis khengs pa de longs spyod// shel ni dkar pos thugs dam bskang// sku ni mngon du bcu gcig 'byung// shel smug thugs dam bskang nas kyang// dam bsre mnas ni bsgags par bya'o// de dus rbad sngags mang bzlas bcol// las su bcol ba ci yang 'grub// rten dbyangs snyan pas bskul ba ni// hU~M// gling bzhi mun pa'i g.yung drung bzlas pa'i pha rol nas// rol mtsho bdun dang gser ri bdun// gser gyi ri bdun 'das pa'i pha rol na// lcags mtsho nag po khyil li li// lcags mtsho nag po khyil pa'i nang shed na// gser gyi khri la g.yu yi yi gdan bting nas// snang zhing srid pa thams cad dbang du sdud// skye 'gro'i tshe la legs nyes ltang 'dzin ma// thog gi rgyal mo thog 'phreng ma// srig cig chen mo sku yi rje// sku la na bza' ci gsol na// na bza' rma bya'i thul pa la// mtha' ma g.yu yi rdo rjes gtams// bud med gser gyi go cog can// spyan mig g.yas pa zla ba 'khyil pa cam// spyan mig g.yon pa nyi ma 'khyil pa tsam// bzhugs na nyi ma ri rab lho la bzhugs// mtsho sman rgyal mo legs nyes ltang 'dzin ma// sku ni mi bskyod brtan par bzhugs// phyag na 'phrul gyi le long bsnams// rnam par thar pa'i lam yang ston// sangs rgyas rnams dag gshegs shul cig/ dbang phyug 'phra men rnams kyis dgongs sbyod cig/ 'jig rten 'dzam bu gling bzhir legs nye ltang 'dzin

ma// 'dzam bu gling bzhi'i sems can tshe zad dus zad gtan la 'bebs// sangs rgyas rnams dang gshegs shul 'thun rgyal rigs rnams dang las thabs gcig/ legs ldan nag po pho nyar 'gyed// klu rnams kun la dbang sgyur ma// yang dag nges pa'i don dam par// ma phang mtsho la gnas pa mo// ma phang g.yu mtsho sngon mo ni// dbyar ni mi skye dgun mi 'khyag/ mtsho mo ma phang yang dag la// de yi nang na gnas pa mo// phyag g.yas srid pa'i 'khor lo bsnams// phyag g.yon me long tshe bum pa bsnams// bsnyen cing bsgrub cing thugs dam bskul// dam tshig ma nyams bdag la dngos grub gsol// rak+ta sna mangs phyar
