cing bskul// de yi thugs dam bskang ba ni// ku ku ra tsa shel mig dang// rma bya'-i mdongs kyis thugs dam bskang// 'dir bskong mi bzlag gcig kyang med// hU~M// dpal chen thugs las sprul pa'i ma mo ste// gnas ni rol mtsho chen po bdun la gnas// chibs su 'jigs pa'i mgo dgu chibs// sku ni shel rdo bcag pa 'dra// nyi ma'i zer bas shin tu 'tsher// zla ba'i 'od pas 'tshel la dkar// sku yi 'od kyis stong khams khyab// zhal nas 'jigs pa'i skar mda' 'phro// dgu tshigs gzhu la skar chen 'da'// nyi zla gzhu ru 'gegs pa mo// skar mda' mda' ru 'phen pa mo// dgra snying phor gyis 'debs pa mo// che zhes ma sar dbang phyug ma// sha khrag dmar gyi dri snom ma// dam tshig nyams pa'i rjes gcod ma// thog dang ser pa zhal nas 'phro// sbrul nag stong gi zhags pa'i 'phen// zla ba tshes pa'i spyan zur gzugs// dam tshig nyams pa'i gshed mar zhal 'ches ma/ thugs dam rgyud bskul bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzod// shel dkar chos nyid lta ba dang// lug dang man ngag gis bskang// hU~M// gangs dkar rtse la gnas pa mo// las su bcol na kun yang 'grub// phyag na dril pa'i mchog phur bsnams// dgra bgegs snying la gzer 'debs ma// sku la btsos kyi la 'u gsol// zhal nas sgra sgrogs 'brug chen ldir// phyag na thod 'dzag dgra snying bsreg/ thugs ni dgra bo'i tsit+ta rlob// spyan mig stong khams khyab par gzigs// smug nag chen mo dbu lnga ma// tsit+ta stong gi mnga' bdag ma// nam mkha' stong la khyab par gzigs// nam mkha'i stong la dbang sgyur ma// ston zla gsum la 'bras bu lo tog bcud len ma// dbyar zla gsum la thog dang ser ba zhal nas 'phro// dpyid zla gsum la me tog kun gyi bcud len ma// sems can gzhon pa'i mdangs 'phrog ma// dgun zla gsum la rgyu ba'i dus// rlung nag tshub ma'i gdong 'dren cing// mang po kun gyi drod 'bebs ma// srid pa'i bu mo dam tshig can// dam tshig dus la

bab kyis gshegs su gsol// shel nag smug chags ku ku ra// smug mo shel mig dag gis bskang// dur khrod bdag mo shrI tsa mun ti// sku mdog dmar ser chen mo la// nu ma'i bshal thag gsus pa g.yogs// yar ltas steng gi lha rgyal ma// mar ltas 'og gi klu rgyal ma// chibs su sprul pa rlung nag chibs// na bza' gos su nag po gsol// zhal nas rdzi ba 'bud pa ma// g.yas na zangs kyi rgyu zhags bsnams// g.yon pa 'dzin khug byed pa'i phyag/ sdang ba'i dgra bgegs drongs shing khug/ rlung gi phyogs nas pho nya 'gyed// sbrul pa sha zhon mang po gtong// 'dir gshegs bcol bskul 'phrin las mdzod// ces bskul khrag sna mang po dang// gu gul dud pa rgyun du gtang// mngon du phyung nas gnas pa'i tshe// lnga rdzis gnam zhal stong nyid du// che mchog sprul par bcas pa bsgom// la nu bzung ste 'di skad smras so// khar sang kha nyid sngon du ni// bdag gis ma ru ngo ma shes// bdag gis grogs su ngo ma shes// bdag gis mdza' mor ngo ma shes// bdag gis bran mor ngo ma shes na// brtse ba'i gdung dang ldan// grogs su ngo ma shes// grogs su ngo shes na// mkha' 'gros bdag la tshur smras pa// chos nyid kha ru ngo ma shes/ dbyang dang ye shes ldan ming sor ngo mi shes/ ming sor ngo shes nas brtse ba'i gzhung dang ldan// rje bor ngo ma shes// rje bor ngo shes na// yun du 'bar du mchi// de nas mngon rdzogs rgyal po yis// yum gyi srin lag rab bzung ste// yum gyi b+ha ga dbang bsdus nas// snyoms 'jug byas te pad khrag dang// ga pur bsres te dbyings cig phyir// kun rdzob cig pa'i rnam pa bsre// de ltar bsres nas dam bcas pas// ma ru da bsgrub kyis// ma ltar dbang mche dbyings dang ye shes 'byor// sring mor da bsgrub kyis// sring ltar sla ma dam// grogs su da bsgrub kyis// grogs ltar phrag ma dog// mdza' mor da bsgrub kyis// yid la gzhung ma ngan// bran mor da bsgrub kyis// bran ltar snying ma ring// de nas dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bzung la dbang bskur la gzhag go// grub nas pra dbab dngos por blta// zhi rgyas dbang la sogs pa bya// khyad par drag po bsgrub pa'i phyir// bud med snrel gri'i thod pa'i nang// gu gul nag po dug sna tshogs// khrag dang snying sbyar ba 'di// gru gsum zur ni gcig la gzhag/ mon nag la byung thod pa dang// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa dang// spyang thod phag thog gang yang rung// thod pa gsum po dag tu yang// gong ma'i rdzas dang mthun par blugs// zur bzhi drag po bzhi nang bzhugs// yab yum ting 'dzin gsal ba dang// nyungs kar nyungs nag rdzas rnams la// dkar mo re ma ti'i tri// rab tu bzlas tu

dang por blugs// snying rbad snying thig bzlog pa'i dus// kha nas ma mo'i tshogs 'phros pas// thim ste ma mor gyur pas gsad// dang por dkar mo re ma ti// gnyis pa A r+ya re ma ti// gsum pa gu h+ya re ma ti// bzhi pa ma mo tsa mun ti// khri re bzlas shing thun du bsgrub// nam gyi phar phyed tshur phyed na// sle'u nag ras kyis mgo phur la// khang phyi lan gsum bskor nas kyang// khyim nas rkang 'dom bcu gsum sar// zur bzhi'i rmad du rba ba ni// gza' ni mig dmar dus la sba'o// 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma'i rgyud las// dpal lha mo nyid mtsho sman gyi rgyal mor zhugs pa'i sgrub thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// ri yi dbyibs kyang kham nag dang// lung gsum 'dus pa'i mdo dag ni// nags tshal stug po'i dbus su bsgrub// dkyil 'khor gru gsum mthing nag la// dbus su sa bon ma cig bri// bar ma thod pa'i 'phreng bas bskor// kha ni me ri smug por bskor// mi dbang snying dang mkhal ma dang// nang khrol klad par bcas pa las// gzhi byas sha sna 'tshog par sbyar// 'bru dang shing thog 'tshogs pa las// gtor ma byas te bsgrub rdzas so// mi dbang khrag la sogs pa yi// khrag sna stong ngam yang na brgyad// nyi shu'i mtha' dang myos byed dang// nyi shu rtsa gcig bar du bsag/ sman sna stong ngam yang na brgyad// nyi shu'i mtha' dang myos byed dang// gong ma'i bar du sbyar bar bya'o// zhing chen bla re sa gzhi dang// gu gul dud pa rgyun mi gcad// keng rus lhu gdum mtha' dang mthar// shun chen slag pa de bzhin te// so so'i 'phreng ba bgrang bar bya// de ni ma mo bsgrub pa'i rdzas// rten pa'i rdzas ni grogs med pa'i// rang gi byang chub sems la bya// a mr-i ta dang sbal nag gi// mgo bo spyar bar bcug la brten// rlung nag tshub nag dre'u rkang gsum// zhon pa bud med nag mo la// ral gri zang yag bsnams sor drug/ shing shun bris te 'og bcug sba// de ni ma mo rten pa'i rdzas// yag sha dpal gyi skur bsgoms te// gzungs ma 'khor los rgyas 'debs dmigs// yab yum dkyil nas las byed dkyil// srid pa'i dbus nas drangs nas su// mdun du byang shar mtshams nas 'ongs// ma thim 'og lta bka' don bzlas// de ltar bzlas brjod byas pa las// snying mi dga' la nyams mi bde sgrib pa yod na bshags byang ba'o// du snying 'dod la mi dga' na// thugs dang ma skongs mchod pa bstab// khro snying 'dod na snying zhugs te// dbang du ma 'dus bsgom par bya'o// khyo ga'i cho 'phrul che na yang// dbang du ma 'dus bsgom pa bya'o// bud med cho 'phrul che na// dgra la rbad pa'i las bya'o// cho 'phrul chung la g.yal 'dod na// dge bas gdugs

te bzlas brjod bya'o// bud med mdog ngan phrad pa na// sgrib pa yod pas bshags pa bya'o// snying nyid dga' la nyams bden// dmigs pa'i las la sgrib pa med// rang sems dga' na thugs dam bskongs// nyams bde rang sems brjid che na// bka' nyan las la 'gro ba yin// ting 'dzin g.yos na dbang du 'dus// khyod ga'i cho 'phrul med gyur na// de yang dbang du 'dus pa yin// phyag 'tshal mchod pa byed pa na// de yang dbang 'dus bka' nyan 'ongs// bud med bzang dang phrad pa'i tshe// cho 'phrul che zhing bud med phrad// de yang dbang 'dus bka' nyan yin// bzang pa'i rdzas ni skyel ba na// tshe yi dngos grub gter ba yin// ni yi sha tshogs skyel ba na// rdzas kyi dngos grub ster ba yin// rang gi bla dang gzhan gsad na// drag po'i dngos grub thob par bshad// de ltar rtags dang 'thun pa dang// yab yum gsal byas dgra la rbad// tshig dang dbyangs kyis bskul ba ni// phyogs phyogs de ni pha gi na// nyi ma byang phyogs pha gi na// sbrin dang na bun tshur rol na// g.ya' dang gangs kyi tshur rol na// yul dang mgon yul gnyan thang na// thod pa dgu brtsegs mkhar cig brtsigs// de'i lags sam nang shed na// the brang brtsegs pa'i beg tshe la// ma cig chen mo de la bzhugs// sku la de ni ci gsol na// rma bya mdzes pa'i thul pa gsol// dbu la de ni ci gsol na// srid pa spyi blugs zhwa la gsol// phyag ma g.yas na ci bsnams na// nad do cog gi rkyal pa bsnams// dgra la nad ka gtong pa'i rtags// phyag ma g.yon na bsnams pa ni// bdud kyi khram bam chen po bsnams// sang phod de'u sang su 'chi ba// do cig ding sang khram la 'bebs// khyod kyi mchan khung g.yas pa na// mtshon gyi shod d+he'u dkar nag 'grems// sang phod ding sang su 'chi ba// do cig ding sang shod la 'debs// ma cig chen mo mthu mo che// chem chem grod grod sha la grod// dgra snying spar gyis 'debs pa'i mthu mo che// gnam sa bzlog pa'i dus la bab// rang srog bzung pa'i dus la bab// gnas nas bskul zhing bskyod pa'i tshe// dre'u rta mgo gsum zhungs se zhungs// dgra bo las ngan bde 'byam la// blo bur ye 'brog dus la ba// khram kha ston la nad kyang bzlog/ gnam sa gru gsum nyams mi dga'// rang nyid lha mor gnas pa des// las su grub pa thams cad kyang// shar ru de la byed dmigs te// rgyun du rgyun sngags bzlas par bya'o// phur pa sngags btab khang rmang ngam// zhing gi dbus su sba bar bya'o// bsgrub pa'i rdzas rnams dbul ba ni// sngags kyis thams cad dbul pa ste// gtor ma 'dod yon lngar dmigs mchod// bdud rtsi byang chub sems kyis

mchod// rak+ta dgra bo dngos kyis mchod// dur khrod che dang chu bo dang// tshub nag 'khyil dang khang stong dang// med na byang shar mtshams su bskyal// 'dod pa khams kyis dbang phyug ma'i rgyud las// dpal lha mo nyid kyis bdud dmar pa'i nal bu zos pa'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// dben la gnyan pa'i gnas su ni// gtor ma byin bsko bskrod par bya'o// mi phung shul nas sa blangs te// bong bu'i bdud rtsis sbrus pa la// gru bzhi gnas sbyang 'dom gang ma// yang na mda' gang dag tu brtsig/ bdud rtsi sna lnga'i chag chag la// dmar chen khrag gi thig le bya'o// steng du lha mo'i zhal dkyil 'khor// sna ni zum po 'thur du brko// mig gnyis khams gsum gru gsum ste// drag po de la dgod pa ni// tsa ko la nag po gsum nang du// dug dang sme khrag rtsi bsres dgang// zhi la kham phor zur gsum dgod// tsa ra dkar ser nag 'dres ma// bsgral te snying sogs nang khrol rnams// dum bu gsum du byas pa blugs// 'bru rnams sna tshogs phye las kyang// tsi ra'i rak+tas sbrus drag po// ming rus gzugs byas shun chen po// tsho gsum dag tu rlan par bya'o// phu tra mo ni lo gsum lon// mtshan ma tsit+ta zlum po gsum// gsang pa'i ma mo'i dam rdzas so// bu tra pho yi rnam gsum ni// gsang pa'i pho nya'i dam rdzas yin// bcu drug lon pa'i kham phor ni// gnyis su dam rdzas gnyis po gzhag/ sman sna stong dang khrag sna stong// sbyar ba mo mtshan bcu gcig gi// thod pa dag tu gzhal nas kyang// chos nyid stong pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// rang sems ye shes kun snang yin// gsal ba'i rgyud las 'phros pa ni// yi ge hU~M 'od las nam mkha'i dkyil// 'byung bzhi me chu dregs pa'i steng// nyid bzhi'i steng nas yak+sha ni// he ru ka nyid gsal par bsgom// dkyil nas dkyil 'phros nges par dgug/ mdun na bka' nod nges par dmigs// zhal gsum bar du srog nas drags// grub nas las la sbyar ba ni// rkang pa lag pa mdun rgyab bsnol// tsit+ta 'bar ra ta ka la// ma mo gsum dang pho nya gsum// gzugs bris drangs te thim pa las// rtags sam mtshan mar byung ba'i tshe// pho nya brag tu dgug pa ni// lcags kyi spyang mo chen mo khyod// khrag gi sder 'dzub shad de shad// spyang mo rngam skad dgra la 'debs// nga ro 'don cing dgra la rgyug/ thams cad kun lam gtong gis/ do nub bdag gi las mdzod cig/ las rnams grub par da gyis shig/ 'dzum mdangs phyir la khrod la shog/ snying nas drongs las khrid la shog/ pho nya'i sngags ni brgya ru bzlas// dam rdzas bstan cig rak+ta brlab// lte ba'i gzugs phyi de khugs bsam// hU~M// zangs kyi wa mo dgra 'gugs

ma// khrag gi sder 'dzub shad de shad// wa mo'i rgyug tshul zhugs se zhungs// wa mo'i rgyug tshul dgra la rgyug/ wa mo'i bshad skad dgra la bzhad// snying nas 'dren pa'o pho nya mo// 'dzum mdangs phyor la khrid las shog/ khug cig dril cig pho nya mo// sngags brgya bzlas la mchod pa stab// sha tru'i bla ni khugs par bsam// dud kyi khyi mo 'od 'phro ma// khrag gi sder 'dzub shad de shad// khyi yi rngam skad dgra la 'don// khyi yi bzhad sgrogs dgra la sgrogs// 'dzum mdangs phyor la khrid la shog/ khug cig dril cig pho nya mo// sngags bzlas stab brlab khugs par bsam// pho nya mo yi las kyi sngags// ra yi snying khrag khong nas khri// kham phor gru gsum ling ga ste// pho nya gsum gyi bka' nyan nas// bkug nas bsad de za bar bsgom// mig kyang mas ltas khros 'dungs zla'o// shin tu khugs pa kho nar bsam// gsang ba'i ma mo chen mo khyod// chibs kyis bskyo dang mi 'tshal te// 'khor lo rlung gis bskyod du med// rgyang glu len cig sha rnams za// khrag chen 'thung zhing 'dzum nag stong// srog rtsa gcod cing rang dam bsrung// snying 'dren lcags kyu klad la bskor// drongs shig dgra bo'i snying nas drongs// rak+ta 'phyar zhing dam rdzas bstab// gsang pa'i ma mo'i ngan sngags kyis// nyungs kar bzlas shing khrag tu blugs/ kha mig la sogs thams cad nas// char du dbab dang dang po'i khrag/ khri thon kha ma phor nang du ste// sha zos khrag kyang 'thungs par dmigs// de ni bla 'gugs ngan sngags so// khyad par snying nas 'dren par dmigs// gsang ba'i ma mo chen mo khyod// g.yab 'dor dgra la lings se lings// kha nas dug mda' rtse gsum 'phen// lag nas g.yab 'dor mdung nas 'phyar// drangs nas dges pa'i bzhad mo 'gyed// za ni mche gtsigs sha chen za// 'dren pa'i lcags kyus snying nas drongs// pho nya bas kyang mgyogs par rgyug/ gsang ba'i ma mo chen mo khyod// srog gcod snyig gi bdag mo khyod// khyod kyis gnas nas bskyod tsam ni// ma mo 'bum khris pho nya 'gyed// gsang ba'i ma mo khyed gsum gyis// gsang ba'i pho nya gsum bskul la// yud tsam gyis na khrid la shog/ rab bstabs brlab cing snying bcu'i sngags// khri phrag gcig gis thun tshogs bsgrub// tsa kol drag pos brgyab pas ni// tshogs kyis snying bcu phyung zos bsam// tha mar bltab brlab nyungs kar gyis// srog gcad khri khrag thun tshogs bsgrub/ drag po'i gnas nas drag snod brdeg/ srog bcad sha ni za bar bsgom// don du yak+sha he ru kas// yum la rdzogs pa'i ma mos bskul// nying khol gsang ba'i pho nya 'gyed// gzugs gsum phyis nas lan gsum dgug/ bstab

brlag brgya'i bar du ste// khri yis thun tshoms nang du 'phang// yak+sha he ru ka gsal bas// yum la sbas pa'i ma bskul te// gsum phyis gsum gyi bkug nas kyang// khri gsum thun tshogs ma mo gsum// 'phangs pas snying za snying za snying bcu bzhi// srog gcod las ni byed par bsgom// chu dang ma 'dres dwangs ma'i khrag/ nang khrol smad lnga myos byed sman sbyar pa'i gtong ma gsum gsum sbyin// yang bskyar yang nas yang bsgrub ba// 'bum phrag gcig gi bar du steng// thon nas phyogs dang ma'i zhing// rgyu ba'i srang dang 'thung ba'i chu// de la ma mo'i mthun tshogs sba// yang na sha ru rgyu ba yim// byang phyogs lam du sba bar bya'o// ma byung spogs pa 'bum phrag gnyasi// de ltar 'bum gsum du'o// spyang mo wa mo dung khyi gsum// tshad du phyin nas khyim du babs// gal te tshad du ma phyin kyang// 'ug sogs bya ni khyim du'o// blo rdol nad kyis 'chi ba ste// zla ba'i nga la rtags kyang 'byung// ma mo gsang ba mchog tu nyan// pho nya rtag tu rang bzhin ngan// nyams na rang yang za bar byed// de phyir dam tshig shin tu bsrung// nyi ma byang shar khyi yang 'bros// 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma'i rgyud las// gsang ba'i ma mo gsum dpal lha mo nyid sprul pa'i sgrub thab stan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// de nas dgra gshed bsgrub pa ni// dur khrod gnas su rab phyin te// sa yi man+Dal byas nas kyang// mchod pa'i gtor ma rgyas pa ni// bam chen gsar pa'i sha la bya// de yi khrag dang chang bdud rtsi// mchod yon sbyar la bdud rtsi'i rdzas// de yi sha yi tha ma bskor// de yi shun pas g.yog par bya// spos chen dud pa rgyun mi gcad// mkha' lding shel dag sho na nyid// nag mo sa bdag rgyal mo bsag/ snying khrag lug nag grod pa blugs// gzugs dag ming bris shun bris bcug/ de yang thod pa'i nang du'o// sngas 'og gru gsum brus par ni// rang gis mi mthong phyir na sba'o// khrag 'thung dkyil 'khor rdzogs byas nas// yag sha dpal gyi lha mo drang// nyungs kar nyungs nag bzlas nas kyang// lha mo'i bu dgu ba sbu nas// gnod spyin dra ba can dang ni// ma mo nag mo 'phros pa ni// khro thon gtor ma spyin par bya'o// yang skyer bdun 'bum par du ste// snying 'byin rtsa 'khro sha za zhing// khrag 'thug bsgom zhing zhe sdang skyed// grod pa khur du rab khur te// lha khang mchod rten rab bskor nas// sngags zlos yul phyogs khrag tor dus// lhag mkhang pa'i rmad du sba// rnams pa'i rta ni snod blugs te// sbyi bos yi 'og ti sba// brdabs te sbas na ser pa 'ong// sha trU'i sngon du gtor ma gtang// mod la 'byung bar rab tu bshad// grong la kha bcings rta ru bzang// ming rus yul 'dre che la

gtad// bcu gcig nub mo chung ma sdang// zhag dgu'i nub mo byis pa 'tshe// bco lnga'i nub mo khyo grir 'chi// de dus brten dbyangs bskul ba ni// gsang ba'i ma mo chen mo khyod// chibs kyis bskyod dang mi 'tshal te// mgyogs pa rlung gis skyod du med// rgyang glu len cing sha rnams za// khrag chen 'thung zh-ing 'dzum nag ston// srog rtsa gcod cing rang dam bsrungs// snying 'dren lcags kyu klud la bskor// drongs shig dgra bo'i snying nas drongs// lcags kyi spyang mo chen mo khyod// khrag gi sder 'dzub shad de shad// spyang mo rngam skad dgra la 'debs// nga ro 'don cing dgra la rgyug/ khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// yul dang phyang ma phyung bstod na// bdud kyi bu mo smun cig ma// ming ni bdun mo sman cig ma// sku la na bza' ci gisal na// bdud kyi slag pa yug chen gsol// chibs su de ni ci chibs na// bdud rta nag po mgo dgu chibs// phyag na de ni ci bsnams na// bdud kyi zhags pa'i khra bo bsnams// dbu la de ni cig sol na// ban+d+ha zlum po zhwa la gsol// chibs kyi de ni snga gong la// nad do cog gi rkyal pa bkal// chibs kyi de ni phyo gong la// dgra bo 'thum pa'i dra ba mig dgu bkal// lcags kyu khrag las byas pa bsnams// zhag dgu'i nub mo khyod dgu rku// zhag lnga'i nub mo ma lnga len// phyis kyis bskyer nas bu rnams rku// pho nyar mngags pa khyod las lhag pa med// mngags pa'i tshe na myur par 'gro// bcol ba'i tshe na khugs par byed// khyung gshog 'bar bas dbang du bsdus// g.yas nas gsang ba'i ma mo 'gyed// g.yon nas gsang ba'i pho nya 'gyed// dngos ni ma mo dngos kyi bu// de la gnas pa'i khyung chen mo// zhes gsungs pa ni// 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma'i rgyud las// dpal lha mo nyid bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed du sprul pa'i sgrub thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// dug ri nag po'i man ngag gis// dam nyams bsgral bar bshad par bya'o// sngas kyi 'og tu zung gsum bri// mdun du maN+Dal gru gsum brtsigs// khrag gi chag chag zhen par gdab// yak+Sha dpal gyi dkyil 'khor bskyed// gtor ma mchod yon rgyas par dbul// lha mo la byed myur du bsgom// bcu bzhi'i nub mo mchod nas ni// bco lnga'i nub mo thun gtor ni// khyi mo dkar mo'i grod pa'i nang// stag dang dom dang mi snying khrag/ ra khyi phag khrag rnam pa gsum// bzhi byas de nang blugs pa ni// khrag nas stong yang de ru blugs// nyungs kar dug tu bsres pa la// de la sngags kyis gdab par bya// lha mo'i kha mig sna tshogs nas// ma mo nag mo'i char bab nas// thun du gyur te sha za zhing// khrag 'thung rtsa 'phro gsod par dmigs gsum 'bum thon nas

khyim dang ni// zhing dang chu la gdab pa dag// rgyu ba'i lam dang 'dug sar gdab// de dus dbyangs kyis bskul ba ni// hU~M// srin mo khrag 'thung glog 'gyu ma// tshu ba nag stong gi nang na bzhugs// rgyug ni rak+ta'i mtsho nas rgyug/ phyag na bdud kyi khram bam dang// nad kyi rkyal pa phyag na bsnams// chibs su bdud bya nag mo chibs// gos su mun nag 'thibs po gon// srin po 'bum phrag bran du 'khol// sdang mig zur gsum bzlog pas ni// gshin rje nyid kyang sngags par 'gyur// shangs kyis rlung sgrom bus pa yis// rlung nag bu yug tshub nag 'khyil// sha khrag rlon pa za ba'i ma// gnam sa yid kyis gcod pa'i ma// srid pa bya ra mdzad pa'i ma// bar snang bgegs su 'gum pa'i ma// ral pa kham nag sprugs pas ni// 'jig rten lha srin bred cing brgyal// mche ba gtsigs shing rkan sgra rdebs pas ni// dam nyams dgra bgegs thams cad dbang du sdud// hU~M// nam mkha' mtha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten na// thu lum sreg byed 'bar ba'i snying zan ma// dgra snying spar gyis gdab kyis da tshur spyon// rgya mtsho'i gting na gnas pa'i me za brag gyon ma// dgra bo'i snying khrag 'thung gis da tshur spyon// bar snang mkha' la 'gro ba'i rdo rje thod 'phreng can// nga yi dgra yi yul phyogs su// bal nad khrag nad dbab kyis da tshur spyon// stong gsum sbrul bas 'gengs pa'i ma cig mthu mo che// rims nad rlung ltar tshub kyis da tshur spyin// hU~M// dur khrod klong na gnas pa'i dmar nag ral pa can// dgra bo'i rnam shes dbrog gis da tshur spyon// gdangs nyid rtsa yi khrag 'thung ma// dgra bo'i klad khrag 'thung gis da tshur sbyon// g.ya' ri rtse la gnas pa'i mche ba can// dgra bo'i snying khrag gtung go da tshur spyon// 'bum gsum ma thon par du ni// sngas 'og zur gsum sbas nas kyang// mis mi mthong bar rab tu gsang// gong ma'i gnas su bskyel ba dang// zla ba lnga ni rmi ltas ldog/ zla ba drug na nad kyis 'debs// bdun na nges par 'chi bar 'gyur// zhes bya ba ni dug ri nag po'i le'u las// ma mo khrag mda' bsgrub pa'i thabs so// lha mo rjags kyi dug mda' ni// 'gyogs pa sngags kyi pho nyar bshad// gnyan zhing dben pa'i gnas su ni// khrag gi maN+Dal gru gsum la// ngos re sor ni bzhi bcu brgyad// de steng gzhan mthun gtor ma dang// de bzhin mchod yon sbyar bya'o// bya mo nag mo gser mig ma'i sgong brtol la snying po yi// glud ni sor gcig khong bar ni// gro gar ming rus bris pa gzhug/ glud kyi snying khar gzugs thag gdags// badzra ku ma ra dang ni// 'khor los rgyas 'debs thabs gzungs kyis// lag tu gzung khrag 'thung gi// dkyil 'khor

rdzogs byas mchod par bya'o// dkyil nas dkyil du 'phros pa yis// yab yum re tri 'khor bcas bod// gtor ma mchod yon mchod pa bzhin// yab yum gnyis kyis bskul ba yis// sha ru'i tsha yang de yis drangs// drangs te bkug la nang du bstim// gshu bu'i nang nas ra drag po// phyung ste ra'i 'chi byed kyi// dum bur bsres te lce la gzhag/ de dus yab yum mgo la gzhag/ bdag nyid bdud mo re ma ti// sbrul pa bdud bya'i tshul gnas pas// sku yi khyon yang ri rab tsam// lding nag 'tsher ba'i bya mo ni// sha za'i mchu dmar zangs dang 'dra// sder mo khrag sder shin tu dmar// mchu dmar brag dmar gshibs 'dra'i nang// lce ni bdun zhu dmar po ste// mchil ma dug mda' nag po la// dug 'brum dug med kha brgyad pa// dgra bgegs snying gi dkyil du brdeg/ nyin mtshan gung gnyis sngags bzlas te// nub ka shar ka'i zes ches rdeg/ yang na brgya brgya bzlas te 'phangs// drag sngags bdun nam brgyad kyis gsad// kun gyi 'jug la gdags par bya'o// lha mo bya mos za dmigs la// brgyad dang bdun ma dmigs pa'o// 'bum phrag gcig na bdag nyid yang// dpal ldan yab yum gnyis dmigs te// sgong bya mo nag mor bsam// byas ni sgong zos gyur na// zla ba bdun gsum rtags gsum kyang 'byung// bya ni sgo nga ma 'dod na// gong ma bzhin du khri khrag bskyar// brten dbyangs snyan pas bskul ba ni// ma g.yel ma 'da' sring cig ma// ma yin nang nas ma cig ma// sring gu nang nas sring cig ma// dam nyams kun gyi srog gcod ma// dam la gnas pa'i tshe 'dzin ma// stong khams kun gyi nyul le ma// nad kyi bdag mo rim gyi rkyen// chibs su dre'u rta rkang gsum chibs// dra ba dgu yi lan 'phran can// byi ru dmar po'i rgyan srab can// nyin zhing khyo dgu skugs na sbed// mtshan mo dur khrod khyab par nyul// rnal 'byor mtha' dag tshogs kha 'grim// rnal 'byor dam tshig gtsang mi gtsang// mched lcam brtse gdung che 'am chung// legs nyes ltang 'dzin dam tshig rjes gcod ma// nyid ni sku mdog mthig nag la// ral pa'i zar bu g.yas nas g.yon du 'khyil// zhal nas mi khrag rta khrag 'dzag/ mig nas khrag 'dzag zu lu lu// lcags kyi dre'u rta rkang gsum bskyod pa'i tshe// dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yang// mtshan mo gcig la khyab par gcod// rnal 'byor chen mo a la la// dbang phyug chen mo a la la// khyod kyi lag pa g.yas pa nas// bdud kyi khram bam gnam la 'phyar// skye 'gro gzugs su snang ba kun// sang phod ding sang su 'chi ba// do cig ding sang khram la 'debs// khyod kyi lag pa g.yon pa na// tsan gyi shod rde dkar nag 'grems// skye 'gro

gzugs su snang ba kun// sang phod ding sang su 'chi ba// do cig shod rde nag po 'grems// khyod kyi mchan khug g.yas pa na// byang dmar dkyus kyi bam po sbed// skye 'gro gzugs su snang ba kun// sang phod ding sang su 'chi ba// do cig bya dmar dkyus la 'debs// khyod kyi mchan khung g.yon pa na// nad kyi rkyal pa sngo dmar la// sbrul nag lnga brgya'i kha chings can// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la// gsang sngags 'bras bu chos dor te// gsang sngags bon du khyer ba'i dus// rnal 'byor grong bsnyen dar ba'i dus// de tshe srid pa'i ma mo 'khrugs// ma mo 'khrugs pa'i rtags bstan pa// khyod kyi kha rlangs ser po yis// stong khams thams cad 'gengs byed cing// bud med ser mos stong gsum 'gengs// che zhes mkhris chen gsha' ya gtong// nam mkha'i mthongs na khyod gnas na// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dpal mo btsan// sems can skye shi'i lam yang ston// de yang byang shar re ma ti// bar snang khams la bzhugs pa'i tshe// b+ha ga d+hi ti mkha' la char 'bebs ma// 'byung ba lnga yi cha snyoms ma// 'dzam gling 'bras bu bcud len ma// de yang byang shar re ma ti// ri rab zoms na bzhugs pa'i tshe// 'bar ma me khyer glog 'phreng 'dzin// lha srin dgu brgya'i lings pa ma// de yang byang shar re ma ti// rgya mtsho'i gting na bzhugs pa'i tshe// me za chen mo brag gyon ma// byis pa kun gyi tshe 'dzin ma// de yang byang shar re ma ti// 'bar ma brgyad kyi gtso mo mdzad pa'i tshe// 'bar ma nyi ma'i zhags pa can// lhag phud nyul zhing bsgrub mchog skyob// de yang byang shar re ma ti// hU~M byed nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi nang na bzhugs pa'i tshe// mi srun g.yag mgo thod rlon 'chang// kha chu nyab cing bsgrub mchog skyong// de yang byang shar re ma ti// ma brgyad gtso mo mdzad pa'i tshe// e ka dza ti ral gcig ma// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin drod nyul ma// gtso gzungs gnyis kyi tshe 'dzin ma// de yang byang shar re ma ti// bstan ma bcu gnyis nang na bzhugs// ma btsun ug chos dbyar mo bsil// de yang byang shar re ma ti/ che zhe chen mo'i dus la bab// bdud kyi yul du dmag 'dren na// che zhe chen mo dam la 'du// dgra bgegs yul du dmag 'dren na// che zhe chen mo dam la du// dgra bo'i yul du dmag 'dren na// che zhe chen mo dam la 'du// dgra bgegs ma lus rdul du rlog/ dug ri nag po'i le'u las// ljags kyi dug mda'i sgrub thabs so// khrag skam thod mda' 'phang ba dang// mdze nad dug mdar 'phang ba dag// myo 'bog brgyal nad gsad pa dang// mA ra ya ni myur gsad bzhi'o// de ni rab tu bshad par bya'o// brag dmar gnam du snyeg 'drar phyin// sa yi maN+Dal khrag byugs par// khrag

'thung mchod pa gzhung bzhin te// khrag 'thung bsgrub pa tshul bzhin bya// ma mo'i mchod pa bshams nas ni// yab yum rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// srid pa'i dkyil nas drang par bya'o// rtsa med thod ni khrag byugs nas// khrag sna dug sna ci rnyed dang// 'bru thog shing thog sna tshogs dang// snyug ma rtsod zhung sga g.yer sogs// dbyi spyang dom drod sha spags sogs// thams cad de ru blugs par bya'o// yab yum rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// gtso 'khor bcas pa'i thun phab nas// bsgrubs te btsan la de gnod bya// le lan dgra la dbebs bsam// zhag gsum bzlas pa bar mi gcad// bstan dbyangs snyan pas bskul ba ni// ra hU la yi rgyu dus su// btsan gyi gnas ni nges par ni// gong du bsgrubs pa'i dug rdzas dang// ra'i smang kar thod nang blugs// gnyis med stong pa'i ngang las kyang// bcom ldan pad+ma he ru ka// me dpung klong na kun tu zhal// pad+ma rA ga'i dbu lngar ldan// dbu skra ral pa'i gtsug rum na// rta mgo ljang khu kun tu gzigs// dbang gi rta skad rab tu sgrogs// bco lnga'i spyan bzlog smin ma'i khro gnyer brjid// snyan bcu gsan cing shangs lnga sgra chen 'byin// zhal lnga rngam zhing brjid pa'i sma ra 'khyug/ ljags lnga 'dril zhing dkar pa'i mche ba gtsigs// bcu drug phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin// zhabs brgyad zil gnon stang stabs tshul du bzhugs// dur khrod chas brgyad sku la rdzogs par ldan// oM shrI badzra pad+ma DA ki ni badzra ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT// brgya 'am stong gis dbang du bsdu// ma mo dbang 'dus btsan gzir te// thog 'bebs sngags bzlas rdzas kyang bsreg/ thal ba sol pa khrag bsres khyer// khang khyim gtor na thog kyang 'byung// dug ru nag po'i le'u las// khrag skam thod mdar 'phang pa'i sgrub thabs so// mdze nad dug mdar 'phang pa'i thabs// mdze bo'i thod par thun yang blugs// gong du thun bsgrub zhag gsum bya// klu yod nges pa'i chu mig tu// gza' bdud rgya ba'i dus su ni// mdze mo'i thod par thun yang btsal// dug rtsa 'brum bu thams cad blugs// dbang chen ting 'dzin rab zhug ste// pad+mas ma bskul klu la gnod// gong ma'i rdzas bsreg khyad par du// klu la gnod pas klu gdug gis// gza' pa'i snying du rab zhugs te// snying khrag 'thung bas nad gtong bsam// gong ma'i thun gyi lhag ma dang// thal bsres khyim la gtor pa'i dus// thal pa klu gnod thun ma mo// gnod par bsams te gtor par bya'o// dug ri nag po'i le'u las// mdze nad dug mdar 'phang pa'i sgrub thabs so// smyo 'bog brgyal nad gtang ba'i thabs// zhag gsum ma mos rA dza ni// gzir ba'i thun ni rab tu bsgrub// rgyal po yod

pa'i rten sa 'am// lha khung khang pa stong par ni// gza' bdud chen po rgyu dus su// smyo 'bog brgyal nad shi ba yi// thod pa'i nang du thun yang blugs// dug shing me la bsreg pa'i steng// byi li'i snying yang rab tu bsregs// de dus bsam pa'i rim pa ni// dbang chen ma mo rbad pa'i sa// des kyang rgyal po rab tu gzer// rdzas kyis kyang ni de bzhin te// gzir bas dgra la smyo 'bog gis// rgyal po rab tu gsod par bsam// bsregs pa'i sol pa thun lhag ma// rgyal po ma mo tshogs de yis// khang khyim gtor na las byas bsam// dug ri nag po'i le'u las// smyo 'bog brgyal nad kyis gsad pa'i sgrub thabs so// myur du gsad pa'i sgrub thabs la// zhag gsum ma mo gnod sbyin mo// gzir te 'dus pa'i thun yang bsgrub// dur khrod khang pa stong pa'i sar// khyab 'jug chen po rgyu dus su// gri mo'i thod par thun yang blugs// de nyid lag g.yas mthil du ni// ming rus bris pa'ang de bzhin gzhug/ de la me yis gtang nas kyang// rnal 'byor bsam pa'i rim pa ni// pad+mas ma bskul gnod sbyin bkug/ nad kyi rdzas kyis gnod sbyin bskul// gnod sbyin mos kyang myur gsod bsgom// bsregs pa'i thal ba thun lhag la// gnod sbyin ma mo'i tshogs bcas kyis// sha gtun myur du gsod par bsgom// khang khyim gtor la brlag par bya'o// de rnams gang zag rim pas ni// dang pos 'grub dang gnyis pa dang// gsum pa bzhi pas gang 'grub pa// ltas dang sbyar te las kyang bya'o// gsum gsum bar 'dres thun bsgrub bya'o// stong rtsa brgyad kyis so sor ni// nam gyi gung la bsreg par bya'o// kham khyim drag sngags bdun pas gtor// dbyangs ni snyan pas blangs pa yis// zhag gsum stong stog rab bskul ba// bdag dpal brjod par bya ba ni// nyi ma stong khams khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// ma mo bal nad gtong zhing btsan yang thul// rdo rje brag chen gdams pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// ma mo khrag zor gtong zhing dgra la b+h+yo// rak+ta rba glong 'khyil pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// ma mo khrag nad gtong zhing btsan la bskul// sa gzhi gdan du btings pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// ma mo khrag nad gtong zhing btsan yang rbod// rlung nag 'tshub mar 'khyil ba'i klong nad shed nas// srin mo dbugs 'phrog len cing btsan kha bsgyur// rgya mtsho gdan du bzhag pa'i dkyil shed nas// srin mo myos nad gtong zhing btsan yang bskul// dur khrod keng rus gtams pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// srin mo yams nad gtong zhig btsan yang bskul// me dpung gdan du btings pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// yams nad me ltar mched ting btsan kha bsgyur// bal nad chu ltar 'khrug pa dgra bo'i yul du

b+h+yo// bal nad char ltor phog la dgra bo'i yul du b+h+yo// bal nad rlung ltar 'tshubs la dgra bo'i dbugs la b+h+yo// bab la nag sprin ltar gtibs la dgra bo'i klad la b+h+yo// sol ba'i thun yang bcas pa ste// blangs te lha mo'i skur gnas nas// tshig dang dbyangs kyis 'di skad brjod// mig rtsa gnam du bltas nas kyang// hU~M/ nga ni srid pa'i rgyal mo ste// las byed thams cad dam la 'dus// 'jig rten btsan rnams dam la 'dus// nga yi bka' las khyod ma 'da'// nga yi bka' las khyod 'das na// dman mo bzhin du zhabs kyis gnon// dam nyams bzhin du zas su za// 'gong po bzhin du rdul du rlog/ nga yi bka' las ma 'das na// grogs po'i tshul gyis mdza' bar bya'o// bu'i tshul du gdung bar bya'o// de bas nga yi bka' nyon la// sems can las ngan sdig can 'di// thog ma med nas khyod kyis bskal// rnam shes phrogs la myur du sgrol// zhes brjod do// rdzas rnams dgra bo'i phyogs su gtor// mchod pa rnam gnyis bsregs nas kyang// dpal dang mo la gtor ma sbyin// mtshan ma rtags ni byung gyur na// gtang rag rab 'bring tha ma gsum// bam dang srog dang gtor mas gtang// de yang lta ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// bye brag rims bzhin shes par bya// dug ri nag po'i le'u las// ngan thabs bzhi yi sgrub thabs so// drag sngags bdun pa 'di dag ni// gang byed 'jug la gtor ma'i nang// ling ga smug nag bris pa la// dpral par rus pa snying khar ming// ma yis gzir pa bri par bya// rkang gnyis 'gugs pa'i sa bon te// lag pa gnyis la bcings pa'o// nyungs kar sme khrag gsum byugs pas// srid pa'i rgyal mo 'khor bcas kyis// nad dag mtshon gyi char phab 'phang// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du ni// tshig du mi smra gzhan mi bsam// srid pa'i rgyal mo'i drag sngags kyis// sbyor ba ldan pas btab gyur na// lha yang rung ste rlag par 'gyur// dug ri nag po'i le'u las// drag sngags bdun pa'i sbyor pa'o// sna'i sbyor ba 'di dag ni// lha mo las kyi 'jug pa'o// sa yi maN+Dal khru do la// zlum po khrag gis bsgyur bar byug/ kham phor zur gsum nang du ni// snying khrag me long gang blugs te// chu dang ma 'dres dwa ngas ma'i khrag/ rnam pa sna tshogs blugs par bya'o// snying sna stong ngam yang na brgya// nyi shu rtsa gcig par du blugs// sman sna stong ngam yang na ni// bdun gsum myos byed bsres te blugs// de 'gram dra phying gtsang ma'i steng// ra snying bsam pa'i dum bu ni// sha tru ma mo'i gzugs ming ni// g.yas g.yon lag sprad lag mthil du// pa dang ma bris sbrel la dril// yab yum gsal pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// srid pa'i dkyil nas

drangs nas mchod// rbad dang bskul bas ling khar bstim// thim pa'i ma mos bzlas pa ni// nyungs kar gzugs brnyan dag la brdeg/ bstim pa'i sha tru ma la smras// nyungs kar ling ga dag la'o// dril te nyungs kar la bzlas te// sbyor dus yab kyis rbad par bya'o// de nas dril ti snying khar gzhug/ sngags bzlas tha dad snying za bsgom// gtor ma dbus su gzhag par bya'o// gtor ma sha trur gyur pa yis// bdud mo zas su sbyin par bya'o// dur khrod rnams sam chu gzhung bskyal// dug ri nag po'i le'u las// sna'i cho ga'o// shin tu dben pa'i gnas su ni// ma mo'i grub pa thob pa des// bsgrubs nas gsod pa byed dus su// dgra bo'i pho nya dpral ba'i thabs// snod nag nang du gzugs shog bcu// khyi yi sgo nas 'byung ba'i me// btang ste dud pas bdug par bya// gon pa'i 'bob dang smang kar brdab// bdag po bral ba'i zhabs mas kyang// btab cing gu gul tshil chen gyi// dud pas bdug cing sngags bzlas pas// snying zhugs mngan du smra ba dang// lha la spyod ngan byed par bsgom// bya rog 'ug pa'i dang ru la// lha dang mi yi gzugs bris te// btags la ba rlung 'thab tu gzhug/ dbye ba'i sngags ni stong du bzlas// sngags tshan kun yang brdeg par bya'o// gu gul dud pa tshil chen gyi// dud pas bdug cing phye bas ni// pho rog 'ug la zhon nas snying/ zhugs te 'thab par ma mos byed// dmigs te bzlas na lus sems bde// dug ri nag po'i le'u las// nyi 'byed kyi cho ga'o// dur khrod gnas sam khang stong du// khrag gi maN+Dal gru ste gsum ste// mchod pa'i gtor ma tshul bzhin bsham// 'brub khung gru gsum lho phyogs rtse// bstan de gzhan gyi rjes su ni// yab yum gsal ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// snying nas drang ste dges par mchod// thim yab yum gyur pa dang// yab yum khyung gshog mgo la sdud// phur nag cig chod phur zor ni// lcags phur sor ni bcu gnyis la// mgo bo rgyu mdud brum gzhal yas// nang du rdo rje gzhon nu ni// yam yum bcas pa dmigs par bya// mgul pa man chad khro mo ni// ri tri lag g.yas nyungs kar gyi// zor 'phen g.yon nas phun pas 'phen// smad ni phur pa zur gsum pa// dmar la 'tsher pa'i ngos gsum du// sngags gsum so sor mtshan par bsgom// gnod spyin pho mo bos nas kyang// gru gsum sha tru'i ling ga la// stong gi bar du brdeg par dmigs// gtso mo gnod spyin 'khor bcas kyis// phur zor 'phen dmigs bye ba 'bum// drag sngags bdun pas de rjes su// gtor mas mchod de 'phang bar bya// phur nag cig chod 'id lta bu// the tsom med par 'jug byas na// lha brin sde brgyad sgrol bar nus/ du ri

nag po'i le'u las/ khur nag cig chod kyi sgrub thabs so// dbang phyug chen po'i ling ga 'am// lha khang shig gcig drung du bsgrub// ra rog g.yang gzhi brkyang nas kyang// nang khrol rnam lnga'i gtor ma'i steng// ra mgo gdengs par ra snying gzhug/ mchod yon gong ma bzhin du bsham// yab nyid rdo rje gzhon nur gsal// srog gi bdag mo'i snying nas drang// rag sha las ni mngon du ste// gtor ma byin la brdegs pa ni// snying nas yon gong ma bzhin du bsham// yab nyid rdo rje gzhon nur gsal// srog gi bdag mo'i snying nas drang// rag sha las ni mngon du ste// gtor ma byin la brdegs pa ni// snying nas ling kar bcas pa la// nyungs kar mda' la khrag gis sgron// dug gi mde'u gcug nas kyang// mtshon mda' nad sgro mde'u ni// srid pa'i ma tshogs 'phen dmigs te// snying thun sngags ni khri ru bzlas// snying nas ling ga gtor bcas pa// ma la mchod de der rjes su// dgra yi dur du thun dmigs gnan// ra mgo lam ni rgya gram mam// re rul 'dre can nang du ni// gnan pa'i man ngag gis kyang mnan// lnga yi skabs su shes par bya// de dag skabs su bsten glu bskul// hU~M/ srid pa gsum gyi rtse mo na// 'khor lo'i bdag mo dre zhon ma// lus po gcig la mgo bo dgu// mgo bo dgu la bco brgyad mig/ bco brgyad mig ni skar chen 'dra// 'ja' tshon lus la nang rlags 'byung// 'jug ma sprin nag phyogs bcur g.yob// so ni ral gri spu gri gtams// skad ni mi snyan cho nga brdung// dre'u mgo ma la tshug rings sgra// lag na 'khor lo dmar po bskor// mtshan cig gnas nas gsod pa'i tshe// dgra bo kun la snying thun 'bebs// nam gyi gung la nag mo rgyug/ de yi bka' nyan pho nya ni// lcags kyi spyang mo sogs po gdong// mjug rings ma la lce 'bar ma// glog ma sprin gyis sna 'dren ma// dgra bo dam nyams snying la dza// ri rab gung gi yang rtse na// nag mo chen mo g.yag mgo ma// shun chen rlon pa'i gos gon ma// shun chen zhabs ma zha la la// mi ro rgyus pa'i g.yab 'dor ma// lcags kyi bya rog zhon cing rgyug/ dam las 'das na long la shog/ shin chen drung gcig rtsa na mo// nag mochen mo phag mgo ma// sdong nag shing shun phrul lu lu// lag na 'ug pa srin bya thogs// chibs su srin shing khu mo chibs// dus la bab bo sa ma ya// 'ja' tshon 'bar pa'i sgeg yul na// mdzes pa'i ma mo 'od gsal ma/ 'ja' tshon mdzes pa'i thul pa la// nyi ma zla ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan// rus sbal nag po chu srin mchu// stag gi sham thabs sku brgyan cing// stag gi sder mo phrul lu lu// khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab// lcags ri 'bar ba'i rtse mo

nas// lcags kyi bud med rnga mo gdong// lag na lcags kyi phur pa 'dril// lcags kyi 'brong chen 'gying ba chibs// 'khor ni mon pa brgya yis bskor// sdang bar byed pa'i dbugs la rngubs// dus la bab bo rtags phyung zhig/ brag phug dgon pa'i gting rum nas// nag mo chen mo pha wang gzugs// srin lag rlon pa'i gnya' za skor// skad ni mi mthun 'bri skad ngur// lcags kyi grog mo g.yag tsam zhon// lag na sbal pa'i 'phreng ba bgrang// nag mo kun gyi lam mkhan ma// brag phug 'dre can kun gyi bdag/ khyod kyi thugs dam dus 'bab// gcan 'phreng mi ro'i dur khrod nas// ltag tshar gon pa'i g.yag zhu can// lag na lcags kyi spu gri thogs// rkang pa sbal sder sha ra ra// lus la mi lpags rlon pa gon// phang na khrag gi shu phru thogs// dur khrod rgyal mo nad gtong ma// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// srin phrag rgal gyi tshang srin mo// lus la gzig dang chu srin gsol// stag gi rmog zhu ral pa can// lag na dug gi rkyal thogs ma// rgyu ni g.ya' ri'i rtse nas 'drim// gsod na pan de dam nyams gsod// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// de yi pho nya mngag gzhug ni// nag mo mgo gsum mon gyi gdong// ral pa kham nag dred kyi mig/ byi ru'i mche ba 'dar cing rgyud// phyag na gser gyi zangs gri bsnams// lam chen rgya gram srang na rgugs// gang du rgyu ba'i srog la chod// dam nyams 'di yi srog chod cig// ces bya ba gsungs pa ni// dpal lha mo'i sngags kyis sgrub thabs so// 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma'i rgyud las// du ri nag po'i man ngag gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o/// nag mo srog gi gcod pa'o// gser gyi yang le'u bshad par bya// dben la gnyan pa'i gnas su ni// sa yi maN+Dal gru bzhi nyid// khrag gis zhen par byug par bya// rin chen gser dngul zangs lcags las// byas pa'i snod ni dbus su gzhag/ dom nag phag nad khyi nag gi// snying khrag sbyar pa'i gtor ma bsham// phyar ba nag po thod nag po// gon c-ing bcings te de nas ni// rta sogs lha mo'i gzugs bris g.yas// khyi nag sogs pa sha tru yi// gzugs bris g.yon du thogs nas ni// mkha' dkyil yag sha he ru ka// chu srin nag po'i mdog 'drar dmigs// srog gi dkyil nas drangs nas ni// bdud kyi dus dang gza' yi dus// de dus gzugs la lha mo bstim// lha mo rbad pas sha tru nyid// gzugs la bstim ste gtor ma'i steng// gan rkyal lha mos mnan par bya// nyungs kar drag sngags de la brdeg/ thun dgu brgya phrag gcig tu ste// bskul nas las byed las la dmigs// de dus drag tu bskul nas ni// zhe sdang g.yos pas

bskul nas 'thab// sha tru drul du gtang dmigs te// srog pa g.yas g.yon brdab par bya'o// de la stong phrag gcig tu bzlas// drug 'bum lnga 'bum bzhi 'bum dang// sum 'bum nyis 'bum gsad byas lnga'i// dbang du byas te gsad par bya'o// gtor ma mo la mchod byas nas// drag sngags thun du de nyid bsgrub// bsgrub pa'i ma mo dur khrod dam// khang rmang rgyu ba'i srang du gnan// gzugs gnyis rkang gnyis bsnol mar bskor// chu dang g.yang dang re rul dang// lam chen rgya gram sku sbas na// chu dang g.yang grir 'chi ba dang// mi mangs dkyil du srog 'chad dang// skye bu 'khrug pa'i mtshon grir 'chi// gser gyi yang le'u las// nag mo srog gcod kyi sbyor pa'o// gser gyi yang le'u yang gsad pa'i mchog/ da ni gsad pa bshad par bya'o// yan lag med pa'i thod nang du// mi khyi ra yi khu ba dang// 'bab chu ser ba chu mig chu/ snying sna dug sna tshogs par blugs// yab yum rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// srog gi dkyil nas drangs nas su// zhag gnyis pa la sbyor ba ni// nad bdag nyid kyi sngags brjod pas// ma mo phyung nas ma mo la// thim pas ma tshogs thun du bsgrub// nyungs kar nyungs nag tsit+ta la// dgu khri dgu 'bum bzlas nas kyang// 'phang dang gsad pa'i las bya'o// de dus dbyangs kyis bskul ba ni/ hU~M// nga ni srid pa'i rgyal mo ste// ma mo thams cad nga yi bran// gnod sbyin thams cad nga yi g.yog/ gshin rje nag po nga yi bu// nag po bkrag med pa yi bran// khams gsum sha rus nga yi zas// srid gsum khrag ni nga yi bskom// shin tu gdug sems ldan pa'i ma// khro tshul zhe sdang 'bar pa'i khro// lnga phung rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// phung po lnga la thun pho cig/ rnam shes brgyad la thun phob cig/ nga rgyal snyig la thun phob cig/ 'dod chags khrag la thun phob cig/ gti mug la thun phob cig/ klad pa'i rgyas su thun phob cig/ dpral pa'i dbyings su thun phob cig/ mig gi dkyil du thun phob cig/ snying gi dkyil du thun phob cig/ nang khrol lnga la thun phob cig/ smra ba'i ngag la thun phob cig/ yul mkhar khyim la thun phob cig/ 'gro ba'i rkang la thun phob cig/ gong gi khye la thun phob cig/ chung ma'i rmad du thun phob cig/ nor gyi dbyibs la thun phob cig/ tad+ya thA// oM shan+ti kha thum yag+sha shad shad b+h+yo/ oM Ni dza dza sha rbad snying la yam/ hU~M de pa tad tra mA ra ya phaT// mun tra tri snying la yam hU~M phaT// khrag rtsa 'dus rbad yam hU~M phaT// dbugs kyib kyib chod snying la yam hU~M phaT// srog bred chos snying la yam hU~M phaT// gsad pa mchog gi sbyor pa 'dis// lha chen nyid kyang bsad par 'gyur// 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma'i

rgyud las// nag mo srog gcod gser gyi yang le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// dur khrod shing rkang gcig pa ru// ci bsgrubs sbyor la phod pa des// gru gsum ngos rer gcal tshad ni// nyi shu nyid lte de phyed ldan// sol nag sol chen bsres bas byug/ bcu tshad ldan la gzugs byas te// nri shun mig rus bcas pa gzhug/ sbyor ba'i snod ni chen por ni// sha sna khrag sna 'tshogs par ni// gtor ma'i cha rkyen ldan par bya// lug nag bya nag sgo khyi yang// nag po gsum skyer snying btags pa// lha mo bdud mo bdud phrug gi// tsit+ta u pa dag yin no// gtor ma mchod yon sbyar ba ni// mchod pa'i rdzas su bsham par bya// yam yum rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// srid pa'i bdag mo sring nas drangs// mchod rdzas mchod de de nas ni// bdun gnyis nyin song nub mo la// sbyar ba'i snod nang sha khrag snying// 'tshogs pa shul med snod nang blugs// dug sna stong yang de ru blugs// shing lo ling kha phye ba gzhug/ bdag pos bdag mo bskul nas kyang// srod la ngan sngags brgyab pas ni// kha sna la sogs mtshon tshogs kyis// rdul du nyag dmigs nyungs kar dmigs// shul med snod du ling ga la'o// lug nag bstab par rab byas te// 'o dod bos nas las byed do// nam gung bya nag bstab bya ste// bdud mo'i ngan sngags rab bzlas pas// bdud mo'i 'phros pas brlag par bsam// 'o dod pos la las kyang byed// bdud phrug ngan sngags bzlas pas kyang// mtshon tshogs char phab brlag par dmigs// nam gung nam nangs bar du ni// khyi nag bstab bya 'o dod 'bod// khang pa 'tshegs pa'i tha ma la// ru ru shad shad sgra byung na// yid ni zing po byed mthar ni// du na shag pas brgyan pa dang// sems ni khro 'dod rjes su yang// tsa thun rag thun sgra byung ba// srod dang nam gung tho rangs te// rgyas pa dang po dbus ma dang// mthar ru byung bar gyur pa'i tshe// bcu bdun srog dang gung tha ma// shel dang mkha' lding ku ku ra// nag po gsum dang lha mo dang// bdud mo bdud phrug gtang rag gtang// dbugs bskang sha khrag gtor ma sbyin// rus pa gsum dang mi khrag sogs// khrag sna gsum dang rus ming bcas// de yi rjes su bsreg bya ba// 'dre tsher shing dang 'om bu la// ngan sngags gsum gyi phyi nub ni// nam cha gsum la bsregs nas kyang// gsum po nyid kyis bza' bar bya// shul med snad kyi gtor ma 'phang// nya gsum par du rtags med na// mchod pa'i gtor mas mchod rjes su// drag po'i gtor ma 'phang bar bya// brtags pa'i gtor ma mtshon re zhing// brgya re bzlas shing phyi pa ya// nya gsum dag la de bzhin no// de nas brtags rnams byung ba ni// gong ma

bzhin du byas rjes su// zhag grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// chung ma bdag po bu tsha rnams// smyos sam yang na 'chi bar 'gyur// go rims bzhin du lha mo dang// bdud dang bdud mos thebs pa ste// de bzhin gtang rag gtang bar bya'o// ngan sngags rnam gsum sbyor ba 'di// the tshom med par 'jug byas na// nam mkha' nyid kyang 'jig par 'gyur// bcu dgu nyi shu gnyis nub mo// dur khrod dam ni khang stong du// lha mo'i gzugs brnyan chen mo yi// ma yi thugs kar shing gnyis ni// rgyu ma'i thag pas bcings te gzugs// rus pa ming rus rgyus pas bcings// zhal du bcug ste de 'og tu// gtor ma mchod yon 'tshogs par bya// ra snying dum bu brgyar byas nas// yab yum rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// drangs te nyin mchod rbad bkug nas// mtshan ma med pas ma la mchod// snying ka'i me ni gru gsum pa// rab tu bcug ste bsreg par bya'o// 2rgya brgya rdzas bsreg skya rings la// gtor ma mchod yon phul nas kyang// rgya gram lam chen brus la gnan// sa truM byang du gzhug pa'i thabs// dben la gnyan pa'i gnas su ni// mkha' dkyil pad+ma he ru kas// srid pa'i dkyil nas drangs nas mchod// bskul te gzugs la bstim nas kyang// phyi nas gzhan du gzhug pa ni// dmar pos bstod bcings ser pos bskyed// nag po smad du bcing bar bya// 'bum phrag gsum du rims bzhin du// mtshon gyi gru gus bcings dmigs te// lha mo'i ting 'dzin gnas pa yis// 'bum phrag re la gnas rer bcing// de re gtor mas gtang rag gtang// 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma'i rgyud las// nag mo bzhin bzlog gi le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o//// shing rkang gcig gam mtsho 'gram mam// yang na ma mo'i gnas su ni// nag mo phung gsum bsgrub 'dod pas// khrag las byas pa'i maN+Dal ni// sor ni bzhi bcur rgyas par bya// de yi steng du snying rnams ni// sna tshogs 'tshogs par byas nas ni// na chung bcu drug thod par gzhag/ skyes pa nyi shu grir shi ba'i// thod pa'i nang du gzhag pa ni// mtshan dang ldan pa'i rang byung dang// glang nag snying ni dang po'i rdzas// lto 'phye nag po'i snying dang ni// 'ug pa'i mig 'bras bar ma'i rdzas// phag rog snying dang bud med ni// grir shi'i klud khrag ma mo'i rdzas// sbyor te gong gi thod par bsag/ kun gyi phud la gtor ma ni// cha rkyen ldan par rab tu bsham// gtsang ma grir shi'i sha khrag la// gtor ma'i gzhi ni de las byas// sbos chen dud pa rgyun mi gcad// shun chen slag pa gon nas kyang// srid pa'i spyi lugs zhwa gon te// 'phreng ba cen po de bzhin 'grang// nam mkha' stong ba'i dkyil 'khor na// bcom ldan dpal chen he

ru ka/ sku mdog mthing nag ral pa can// zhal gsum mthing nag dkar dmar ldan// dang po rdo rje bar ma na// ti ra'i dbyug to tha ma nyid// rtse gsum 'bar ba dbang bskur dang/// rdeg dag shin ti rdeg pa'i tshul// g.yon gsum dril bu ban+d+ha ni// dmar bkang thugs rje'i zhags bsnams pas// dges bskyed dam 'dogs las la 'dzud// ngo 'bur g.yas dang g.yon pa la// tsan dan sol ba rak+ta'i shing// dpral bar zhag dag thig les mtshan// lus sbyang phyir na sbyan drang bstim// badzra ke ri sa ma ya dza// brgya brjod dbang gi lha mo ni// dkar mo dug gi thor tshugs can// gnam lcags khyung go mgo bos ni// srid pa gsum po dbang du bsdu// khyug gshog nam mkhar brgyangs pas ni// bco lnga zla ba'i 'od zer bzhin// bdud rtsi bum pas dbang bskur bsgom// thugs nas gsum gyi dkyil nas drangs// mdun du 'ong bar bsam pa ni// gnam gyi ye 'dar thog babs bzhin// bar gyi glog ma sprin nyid ni// bya rgod gzan la bcums pa bzhin// sa yi phung byed 'ong ba ni// seng ge sha la rub pa bzhin// rtsa ba'i sngags ni 'bum du bzlas// zhag gsum gnam la thog rtsig 'bab// nam mkha' lding gis thugs dam bskang// zhag lnga nyid mtshan glog 'byung bas// zangs kyi gtsug phud nag mos bskang// zhag gsum sa la dug sbrul 'byung// dogs med shel ni nag mos bskang// dgu nas gzugs su ma byung na// gshog pa'i phyag rgya bcas nas kyang// khyung gsog gseb nas sbrul pa 'phro// dbang du bsdus pa'i rim pas ni// ye 'dar sol sdong bsgyel ba 'dra// glog sprin 'od ni yal pa bzhin// phud byed shing thog skams pa 'dra// bdud rtsis gsos pas gzugs bstan te// dbang bsdus snyoms par 'jug pa yi// rak+ta byang sems bsres pa yis// gnyis med dam bcA' g.yon par ma'i// ban dmar bskang ba de yis so// ye 'dar thog ser mig nad dang// sha g.ya' 'brum nag bal nad dang// rgyu gzer dam nyams bsgral ba dang// glog sprin dag gi bdag mos ni// dug nad smyo 'bogs 'bebs pa'i gsod// phung byed khrag gi bdag mos ni// khrag gzer mdze nad phol mig dang// blo bur ye 'drog dam nyams sgrol// so sor dam 'char gyur dang gzhug/ de ltar gyur pa'i dus de ru// gtor ma de nyid cha gsum du// bgos te ma mo de la sbyin// bam ril sha yang bgos te sbyin// gnam gyi ye 'dar 'brug thog dang// nam mkha'i bya'i mdun du gtang// glog sprin 'tshub nag ser ba la// phung byed sa yi gting du sba// yang na mkha' dag sa dang ni// sa yi gting du sba bar bya// dam rdzas kun dang snying rnams kun// sun chen btings pa'i steng du ni// ga

'u'i nang du bsdus nas kyang// lcags kyi brtan gtun zhib du brdung// sman sna stong gis sbyar nas kyang// sems can mngal khrag la sogs sbu// sran ma bcu tshad tsam du ni// ri lu thod par bskams byas nas// kha sbyar snod ni ma mthong bar// gar 'gro nyid du bcang bar bya// yar ngo mar ngo'i bco lnga dang// brgyad gnyis mar gyi tshes bdun dang// mar gyi ngo yi bcu bzhi la// gtor ma sha sna khrag sna ni// 'tshogs byas ri lu rer bcug nas// dam bcas bzin du bskul bar bya// the tsom med par ci 'dod 'grub// gal te mngon du ma gyur na// gnyan zhing dben pa'i gnas phyin te// sa bdag zhi ba'i sbyin sreg sogs// mnyes par byas te bskrad phyir bsgo// dam med rnams ni dbye bsal byas// gnas kyi maN+Dal khrag byugs te// gong bzhin gtor ma mchod yon gzhag/ de yi lho phyogs cha nyid du// gru gsum khru gang zabs su ni/ khru gang rtsang ni dmar pos bskor// kha khyer ser brgyan me rir 'bar// mon nam yal ka med par ni// thod pa skam po skya bo la// phyogs gsum phung gsum bris pa dbus// phung gsum gzugs ni legs byis la// gdug pa'i shing la brten nas kyang// zur gsum gnas su gzhag par bya// snying kar ming rus bris la gtad// mtshan ma rnam gsum gtab nas kyang// dpal gyi ting 'dzin gsal byas nas// sbyan drangs dbang gi lha mo des// dbang bskul rjes su phung gsum bod// zhing gi g.yab mos ling ga brdab// thod skam gzugs gsum dag la bstim// sha tru bkug ste lha dang dbye// nyi shu rtsa gcig dbye bar bya// gu gul dud pas rab tu bdug/ nyungs kar nyungs nas rdzas kyis ni// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar gyis ni// mo nor sha tru phung bya'i phyir// nag mo 'khor bcas las la gzung// ngan sngags lan gsum bzlas pas ni// phung gsum ma'i pa spu dang// bug pa'i nang nas ma mo'i tshogs// byung ste man tra la thim pas// dpal tu med pa'i tsho gsum gyis// sha tru sha za rus 'cha' zhing// snying 'byin nges par gsod par dmigs// gzungs re gzung zhing 'bum re bzlas// de ni stong phrag re thon nas// gzugs rnams so sor gzhag ste bskul// gtor ma re gtang yang bsags nas// de bzhin byas pa 'bum phrag gsum// de rjes stong tshig skabs nyid la// bsten dbyangs snyan pas bskur ba ni// g.yab mos bar snang nam mkha' dang// sa gzi gsum la g.yab par bya'o// nam mkha' g.yu yi dkyil 'khor nas// g.yu 'od 'bar ba'i lding khang na// mun pa 'khor lo'i g.yung drung nas// dpal chen rngam pa'i pho nya mo// rgyal ba rnams kyi tha tshigs can// gdug pa khol mo'i tshul du gnas// rnal 'byor kun gyi dgra lha

mor// sol pa'i bud med mgo dgu ma// lag pa bsnyag byed sol sbrul lag/ gshog pa rdeb byed sol ba'i gshog/ rkang pa rdeb byed sol pa'i rkang// sol ba'i ral pa la bur gon// kha nas sol ba'i mtshon nag khol// dbu yi ral pa gsigs pa yis// sol ba'i mtshon cha char du 'bebs// sbyan gyi smin ma nyag re las// sol ba'i tsha tsha skar ltar 'khrug/ sbyan gyi rdzi ma 'byed 'dzums kyis// sol ba'i mchi ma char du 'bebs// phyag ma g.yon gyi mtshan ma ni// nad kyi rkyal pa rdebs shing sbyon// phyag ma g.yas kyi phyag mtshan na// bdud kyi khram bam brdegs shing spyon// sol pa'i ral pa mun par gtibs// chibs su sel ba'i khyung chen chibs// chu srin g.yang gzhi'i stod slag la// rus sbal nag po'i sham thabs can// sngon tshe dpal chen he ru kas// lag tu rdo rje byin tsam ni// rnal 'byor rdo rje ming po dang// gcig dang du mar dam bcas te// rang rtags srog gi snying po ma phul lam// da lta ming nas bos na mi 'byon nam// dam tshig gnyan la mi dgongs sam// sring cig rdo rje nye gnas so// sham sham nag mo sol ba'i lus// sol pa'i bya khyung chibs pa ni// bar snang thog ltar 'groms te sbyon// sol ba'i ral pa'i cod pan ni// nag mo sprin ltar gtibs las spyon// sol ba'i bud med nag mo ni// 'jig rten mun ltar gtibs la spyon// phyag mtshan nad kyi rkyal pas ni// sdang bar byed pa'i dam nyams la// nad kyi rkyal pa rdebs shing spyon// sngags pas gdungs nas bos pa'i tshe// gnam sa gnyis kyang kha zhabs bzlog/ ri rab nyid kyang tshogs phor 'phen// rgya mtsho chu rnams khrogs la 'thung// ri rab 'phang pa'i dus la bab// gnam sa bzlog pa'i dus la bab// rgya mtsho btung ba'i dus la bab// gdug byed sol ba'i bud med nag mo khyod// khyod ni bud med gnam mo ste// khyod ni gnam gyi gnam gyi ye 'dar mo// dgra bo 'di la ye 'dar thob// dam nyams las ngan dgra bo 'di// sha dang rus pa chem chem nal// khrag dang cu ser chib chib gsol// brngam pa'i zhal nas blal za 'phyo// ci za mthong na blal sha 'phyo// mi sha mthong na dbyal za 'phyo// sol ba'i bud med mchil za 'khyud// mi khrag 'thung na 'chil za 'khyud/ sol pa'i bud med sos 'dar khrigs// mi rus mthong na so 'dar khrigs// sngags pas gdungs nas bos tsam na// 'jig rten khams kun g.yeng zhing 'phyar// rang la rang yang 'tshig cing 'ong// sangs rgyas kun kyang 'dar zhing sdang// he he dgra bo'i sha la hed// he he dgra bo'i khrag la hed// he he dgra bo'i rus la hed// de yi bka' nyan 'gyogs byed ni// mun pa'i bud med 'bum phrag gcig/ lag na mun pa'i g.yab mo

'debs// kha na mun pa'i tshub nag 'khyil// lag na g.yab 'dor lings si lings// kha na khus 'dabs ltongs se ltongs// lag na g.yab 'dor dgra la 'dor// kha nas khus 'debs dgra la 'debs// ma mo'i brda skad khyi li li// gsang pa'i spyugs pa phyu ru ru// las su gnyer zhing mthu ma chung// dus la bab bo gshegs su gsol// dam nyams dgra bo las ngan 'di// lo dang zla bar ma gzhag cig/ zhag dang za mar lus sa re// he he du na tshal pa tshal pa// bar snang 'ja' tshon dkyil 'khor nas// srig gcig gdug byed lag brgya ma// dug gi ral pa'i cod pan la// dug gi mtshon cha'i rba rlangs 'phyo// dug sbrul nag po'i gshog pa la// dug gi du na me 'bar lams se lams// dug sbrul nag po'i rdug gu la// kha nas dug med rtse gsum bsnams// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying la gzer// sbrul nag stong gi g.yang gzhi la// chu srin dmar po'i sham thams can// sdig pa stong gi thor tshugs can// chibs su kang ka mgo dgu chibs// lag pa 'dzin byed chu srin lag// gdug byed chu srin lag pa yis// dgra bo 'dzin shes btong mi shes// zas su stong khams mi sha za// skom du stong khams mi khrag 'thung// las su dam nyams sgrol gying byed// khams gsum dbang sgyur dbang mo che// sngon tshe dpal chen he ru ka'i// spyan sngar khas blangs dam bcas bzhin// ji ltar tha tshigs gnyan bgos shing// ming po rdo rje bdag 'bod na// tha tshigs bka' bzhin mi byed dam// sring mo dam las ma 'da' zhig/ ming nas bos na mi snyan nam// sring cig rdo rje bde 'gro ma// dam tshig bsrungs na mi dga' 'am// spyan ma rdul cig g.yab 'debs so// sngags pas gdungs nas bod pa'i tshe// kang ka mgo dgu chibs pas ni// skar mda' lam du zhugs pa bzhin// dus la bab bo gshegs su gsol// sdig pa'i thor tshugs gsig cing spyon/ sbrul nag g.yang gzhi rdebs shing spyon// chu srin lag pas 'dzin cing spyon// dam nyams dgra bo len cing spyon// blo bur ye 'drog dus la bab// srog la hur thums dus la bab// dur bya mug ta heb heb// de yi bka' nyan 'gyogs byed ni// lcags kyi dmigs bu stong phrag gcig/ lcags kyi sder 'dzub shad de shad// lcags kyi so 'dar khrigs se khrigs// lcags kyi gshog pa phrugs se phrugs// myos byed dmigs bu'i pho nya ni/ myos shing de ni bla zhing spyon// dam nyams dgra bo las ngan 'di// klad pa'i dkyil du zho ltar dkrugs// srog rtsa dmar la rta ltar rgyugs// rgyus pa dkar la phur ltar thob// las su gnyer ro mthu ma chung// gser gyi sa gzhi rin chen gnas// che zhes sham sham khrag mdog ma// khrag gi bud med

dmar mo la// khrag gi ral pa gting za can// kha na khrag gi rgya mtsho khol// mig nas khrag gi me 'bar mig/ lus la khrag gi la bu gon// rus sbal dmar po'i thur tshugs can// chibs su ke'u le gdong drug chibs// sngon tshe dpal chen he ru ka'i// ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas bzhin// ji ltar tha tshigs gnyan skongs ltar// ming po rdo rje bdag 'bod na// dam tshig tshul bzhin gshegs su gsol// ming nas bos na mi snyan nam// sring cig rdo rje chags pa'i mdzod// sngags pas gdungs nas bos tsam na// ke'u le rgyug tshul zhungs se zhungs// khrag gi ral pa'i cod pan la// khrag gi mtshon cha'i rba rlabs 'phyo// khrag gi ral pas stong khams khyab// dam nyams dgra la rbad tsam na// dam nyams kun gyi snying 'dren ma// gzer thabs drag po dgra la gtong// nad kyi rgyu ni khrag yin pas/ khrag gi char pa dbab du gsol// khros pa'i nga ro 'di skad zer// stong khams sha yis nga ma 'drangs// nga yis zas skal gang gis bya// stong khams khrag gis nga ma ngoms// nga yi 'thung skal gang gis bya// ma mo'i gsol skom gsol skal ni// dam nyams sha dang khrag la mdzod// dza dza du ru mug ta hed hed// de yi pho nya 'gyogs byed ni// khrag gi bya rgod stong phrag gcig/ khrag gi gshog pa me ltar 'bar// lcags kyi sder 'dzub shad de shad// dgra bo'i don snying ma lus brus// phung byed chen mo byed gsum gyis// srid pa gsum gyi b+h+yo bzlog mdzod// dam nyams bdun rgyud thal bar rlog/ ces bskul bsgrub pa thon pa dang// bod dang nye 'byed mi nor dang// ngan sngags 'bum gsum bzlas pa yi// nyungs kar nyungs nag ri lu gsum// sngags kyi thod par bcug pa ni// ma mo sha trur ming rus gcug/ gsod par dmigs te sbrel ba stong// khang rmang zhing dkyil thod pa sba'o// ma grub bar du bskyod pa ni// dus drug gtor ma spyin zhing bskul// nyin re dpal gyi skur gnas nas// phung sum nyi shu gcig tu bod// mtshan re'i las su bya ba yang// lag mthil g.yas dang g.yon pa la// he bri ma yang bri bar bya// khrag chen ming rus gro gar bri// ral gcig sngags ni brjod par bya// phung sum gnam gyi ye 'dar bdag/ g.yas pa g.yon pa phung gsum nyid// bkug ste gsod par dmigs nas kyang// thal mo drag ti dril nas kyang// yul phyogs char pa dril bas ni// lo tog dag la 'debs 'dod na// thod pa gral la mi 'dug la// snying po tsho lnga mi khrag dang// mngal khrag dag gis kyang// ri lu gsum ni rab bcug ste// snying khrag du rdzas nyungs kar la// ma mor bsgrubs te blugs nas kyang// chu mig btsan zan yul lha'i rten// de ru dgun ka rab sbas

la// dbyar ka zla ba nams tshad 'dra// de la dus drug gtor sbyin sngags// bzlas shing bskul te ma mo dang// bcas te phyogs su ser 'debs dmigs// lo bdun lo tog med par 'gyur// de nas bdun bar bdun du bskul// skye ba gcig la'ang med par 'gyur// 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma'i rgyud las// nag mo phung gsum sha tru'i bla dang dbye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// de nas tshangs pa dung gi thor tshugs can dang// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi blon po sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi mchog/ drag po la sogs pas shin tu rngam pa'i tshul gyis// lha gnod 'dul lha'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so// gnod 'dul lha'i rgyal po khyod ni phyis 'byung ba'i dngos po thams cad shes pa yin na// phyi rabs kyi 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams ni// bsod nams ma bsags shing// las ngan pa la skyes pas// khe lo dang ldan pas bsgrub pa la mi brtson pa// thos pa dang shes pa dang ldan pa'i mi rten pas// the tsom dang bcas pa yin pa dang// bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba la mi mkhas shing// nyon mongs pa du ma dang ldan pa yin pa// ma mo mngon sum du mi 'grub pa'i phyir// las la the tsom za ba dang// de'i dus su dam nyams pa'i srog la// bar chad du byed pa'i las la phan 'dogs pa'i thabs// ging la sogs pa'i bsgrub pa ci'i phyir mi zhu// de nas lha gnod 'dul rgyal po de rnams kyis bsam pa bzhin du bya ba'i phyir stan las langs te// bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan brgya stong du byas nas// rang gi lag pas rdo rje yang nas yang du gsor nas// bsnyems pa dang bcas pas rang gi 'khor la blta zhing// bcom ldan 'das yang mngon rdzogs kyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// phyis 'byung 'dzam gling sems can rnams// nyams pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed// las kyis mnar pa'i sems can rnams// dus der bsgral par mi nus pas// 'dzam gling mi la sman slad du// ging dang gshin rje la sogs pa'i// sbyor ba yab kyis bka' stsol cig/ de nas mngon rdzogs rgyal po yis// de rnams bsam pa mkhyen pa dang// 'jig rten mi la sman slad du las kyi sbyor ba bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// gang gi las rnams bsgrub 'dod pas// dben la gnyan pa'i gnas phyin te// dra phying gtsang ma'i steng dag tu// kham phor tshad ma bzhi yi nang// nas gro sran ma til rnams las// gtor mar rin chen sna bdun bdar// lung gi rje ngar sha snying blugs ngar glud nag po sor bcu gnyis// bdud gzugs khram dang bcas par bya// ming rus de yi snying kar gzhug/ dar nag gur chen steng nas dbub// sha tru'i pha mes sogs pa la// gzugs dang ming rus

dug khrag gis// bris te khram la gdags par bya// zhal lnga phyag ni bcu drug pa'i// pad+ma dbang chen bsgoms nas kyang// mo dang 'khor gyi snying nas drang// stong rtsa brgya la bskul bar bya// bdud rnams kyi ni ya bdud de// sor bcu gnyis kyi gzugs la bstim// ma dang 'khor la gtor mas mchod// de rjes gdungs dbyangs snyan pas bskul// bdud rnams gtso bo ya bdun de// me ri dmar nag 'bar pa'i nang// nag mo me yi kha rlangs can// me 'brug dmar po zhon cing rgyug/ lag na gnas lcams srin mo'i rkang// shan pa khyod kyi dus la bab// chung ma nag mo khrag 'dzag ma// khrag gi ral pa sprin ltar rgyug/ bdud kyi chung ma nag mo ni// nad gtong ma yi dus la bab// bdud ri nag po'i rtse nas kyang// nag po po ldon mig gcig po// ral pa gcig 'greng// lag na mi yi g.yang gzhi brdeb// bdud g.yag nag po zhon cing rgyug/ de yi chung ma nag mo ni// nag mo chen mo klong dgu ma// mgo med brang ni nu mas gang// gse dang dung gi zho 'thor ma// stong khams khyab pa'i lag rings ma// dgra snying dbyung ba'i dus la bab// lha bdud bgegs chen gsus po che// lag na dar nag ru mtshon 'phyar// lcags kyi mdzo rgod zhon cing rgyug sbrin nag dud kha'i dkyil na gnas// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la 'bab// de yi chung ma nag mo ni// nag mo chen mo mgo gsum ma// phag skad 'tshor zhing/ ser drag 'bebs// lcags kyi ser drag 'bebs pa mo// dam nyams 'di la bdud phob cig/ bdud mkhar nag po sgo med na// ral pa spyi ching lcags kyi so// lag na mi snying rlon pa thogs// bdud rta nag po zhon nas ni// zhags pa nag po sha ra ra// bdud bya nag mo ldig nag 'dzums// bdud kyi nag po rdung zhing 'jab// dam nyams 'di zhes bya ba la// dus gcod bdud gcod dus la bab// btsun mo nag mo so gcig ma// khyed kyi pho nya'i las byed ni// mun bu sta thogs bcu gsum 'khol// mgo skye gcad pa'i dus la bab// khu le shod kyi lag dgu'o// bse mkhar smug po'i nang na gnas// byi ru mche ba 'dar zhing 'ong// bse khrab dmar po si li li// bse rmog smug po bzang rings gsol// bse mdung dmar po 'dems se 'dems// bse dar 'brug rings bu ru ru// bse yi lcags kyu khra la la// bse yi zhags pa shar ra ra// bse rta dmar po gzhug rings zhon// bse yi byan lag zhungs se zhungs// dmar po sbrul mgo mig gsum po// dam nyams dgra bo las ngan la// sbos nad btsan thabs dus la bab// de yi btsun mo mi srun mo// lag na khrag gi phor thogs shing// nag gtong ma ste smyos ba mo// dam nyams 'di la nad thong la// khyod kyi bdud

dbab dus la bab// rgya mtsho chen po'i gting rul nas// klu bdud sbrul gyi rgyu ma can// lus la sbrul gyi gos gyon cing// sbrul dang sdig pa'i ral pa can// lag na nya phyis phor thogs shing// rus sbal zhon nas rgyug pa ste// gang la dmigs pa myur bar gyis// klu bdud de yi chung ma ni// nag mo sbas mig ral pas gtibs// sdom sdig dmar po'i dra ba can// klu glang sngon po zhon cing rgyug/ nya lcibs stong thul gnya' za kor// klu mo nya mgo'i 'khor gyis bskor// khyed kyi 'phrin las dus la bab// bdud po mi zan pho mo rnams// ma sdod myur du 'phrin las mdzod// gzhan rnams kyi ni bdud kyang yin// nga yi stongs dang grogs kyang yin// sems can kun gyi bdud du langs// ma bcol par yang srog gcod na// nga yi bcol ba'i las rnams ni// dam nyams 'di yi srog chod cig/ skabs su bdud kyi snying po nas// bzlas shing sa la lan bdun brdab// sum brgyas nyis 'khor khram la 'debs// de bzhin yang dang yang bskyar ba// rgyas pa dang po mtha' bar du// zhag gsum lon nas bskyar ba ni// bzlas pa'i nyung phyed gtor mar bcas/ bdag po bral ba'i rkang dkris gtum// chu dang lung pa mgo rdum dang// brag chen re srul 'dre can dang// lam chen rgya gram dag tu gnan// snang srid de ltar gtor ma spyin// khru do bcal pa'i sa ru ni// ming rus bcas te gnan par bya// sog pa bdud gtor nyungs gtor phyed// dur chad khang pa'i rmang du sba// chu gri khas bug g.yang dang ni// grong gseb khrom gyi nang du 'chi'o// gshin rje nag po bsgrub bya ste// dur khrod mi ro'i gnas su ni// gru gsum nang du snod nang du// btsan dug lag kun nag po dang// ka la ku ta la sogs dang// rgyu ba gnas pa'i dug rnams dang// khrag sna snying snar sbyar te blugs// gshin rje'i 'khrul 'khor mdun gzhag ste// stong las mar me'u rtse hU~M chas// gshin rje'i rgyal po zhal gsum dang// phyag drug re ma tir ldan pa// dges shing rol pas 'byung ba yis// gshin rje'i rgyal po de nyid kyis// thun du bsgrub cing 'khrul 'khor bsgrub// thun ni ling 'am dgra la dbab// 'khrul 'khor ling ga'i snying bcug ste// dur khrod dam dgra'i khang rmang sba// bsten dbyangs snyan pos bskul ba ni/ hU~M khri bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed// yum chen nag po re ma ti// yab yum thabs dang shes rab las// dges shing rol pa'i byin brlabs la// 'od zer dmar nag sprin ltar gtibs// dmar nag me 'dra de dkyil na// khye chung sngon po mkha' la lding// ye shes thugs kyi sbrul pa ste// dgung la thog thog mi bzad la// gcer bu nag po ral pa can// ya mAn ta ka nyid lags te// khro chen de yis bkA stsal pa// de

ltar yin te skal ba bzang// skal bzang nga yi dam tshig ni// lnga brgyad dus kyi tha ma la// sangs rgyas bstan pa mi gnas shing// zas ngan mna' la skam tsam na// de tshe nga yi dus la bab// pha ngag bu mi nyan pa'i dus// de tshe nga yi dus la bab// rnal 'byor dam tshig nyams pa'i tshe// de tshe yi nga dus la bab// gos ngan hrul po gon tsam na// nga yi dam tshig de ru 'byung// dog la chem chem za ba mo// sgeg mo ral gcig thod 'phreng can// dbu rgyan thod rlon dmar gyis brjid// ma mo nag mo 'khor dang bcas// khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab// de yi bka' sdod pho nya ni// bdud kyang nag po snying zan te// mi snying rlon pa'i ral pa can// lag pa dmar po zangs sder can// sprugs pa 'bod cing lce rings po// hed hed dgra bo'i snying la hed// gshin rje rgyal pos bskul pa'i tshe// ya mA n+ta ka'i dus la bab// rten mgo dgu'i dus la bab// kong rtse brag zhon dus la bab// bye ba gung ri'i dus la bab// bsel glang mgo dgu'i dus la bab// ral pa tshar dgu'i dus la bab// dbyug sngon can gyi dus la bab// gnos spyin im pa'i dus la bab// za byed stag 'thab dus la bab// ces brjod pas bskul te// sgrub pa ni// re ma tis gshin rje'i 'khor rbad pa'i sbyor pa'o// 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma'i rgyud las// bdud ma'i 'khor snying 'phrog gi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//// rnal 'byor lung dang ldan pa yis// dur khrod mtshan du phyin nas kyang// gnam stong bco lnga nyi shu gnyis// dur khrod rtsa ru phyin nas kyang// de yi rgyud kyi rims nad dang// bdag po bral dang mtshan ngan gyi// thod pa blangs te de nang du// chang phud ma nyams nad ngan las// shi ba'i sha khrag dang sder dang// mig zlum sbyan rtsogs sha khrag btsal// sbrang rtsi la sogs mngar btsal pa'i// gtor ma khru gang khru gsum nyid// thal chen byugs pa'i nang bcug la// kha bcad steng du bdag 'dug ste// ling ga rtsa med byang shar gzhug/ tshigs gsum bdud pa'i sgros bskyon te// skyer med zur gsum gra ma'i gzhu// yak+sha gsal bas lha mo bod// lha mo dbu la rnam ldan bdag/ rkang g.yon srin mtheb khrag byung dang// sha khrag gong gi rdzas sbyar te// kha phye gtor nang ling ga gzhug/ rtsa ba med dang khrag nad ni// ma tshogs stong gis nad thun phob// de yi 'bum du gdon par bya// glud nag shar phyogs bdud rgyal po// ma mo stobs kyis bkug thim pas// ling ga la yang mda' brdeg ste// 'bum du ldan pas brdeg par bya'o// ma mo'i gsod sngags thig ler 'bum// gtor mas mtshon gyi thun du bsgrub// ling ga dkar nag 'khril bas bcings// gtor mar bcug ste khang rmang

sba'o// yang na de la brgyab par bya// glud nag skye zhing tshon skud bcing// rang gis mis ma mthong bar gzung// ma byung gzugs brnyan gtor ma sbyin// dus tshod gsum la stong stong rbad// gal te des kyang ma byung na// de nyid gnan gzir byas la gzhag/ gal te des kyang ma grub na// nam mkha'i sprin sngon dkyil nas kyang// gshin rje gshed kyi sprul pa ni// sngon po lag nam thod dbyug thogs// bskal pa me yi klong na bzhugs// phyed tshal bkas pa bsgoms nas kyang// sdig pa'i sngags ni brgya rtsa brgyad// gal te las byed gyur pa na// gtang rag rang gi rdzas kyis gtang// ma mos ma grub 'di yis grub// ma mo ging nyid yin phyir ro// bdud la gtad dam yang na 'di// dur khrod yang na dben par ni/ sa yi maN+Dal gru bzhi par/ thig btab le tshe bzhi par ni// dbus dang phyogs bzhir le tshe lngar// kham pa'i slus ma lnga nang du// chang phud ma nyams snying khrag gsum// khyu ba shod na tsa ra yi// khrag gsum snying gsum sbyar te blugs// gos thod nag po gon bcings nas// dpal gyi mtshan ma rnam gsum gdab// nyungs kar nyung sa nag tsit+ta'i dum// yag gab med pa'i snod nang gzhug/ dpal gyi sngags bzlas g.yab nag dor// ma mo mngon du 'ong bar bsam// ma mos g.yab nag bor bzlas pas// bdud phrug mngon du 'ong bar bsam/ rnam gsum lus rjes mgo ma gnyis// bdud phrug lcags spyang bdag 'gyur te// gtor ma lnga la gzugs// ngan sngags bzlas pas lcags sbyang lngas// lnga las lnga na 'phros pas zas// rdzas gsum bzlas te la ru 'phang// sum 'bum nges par thun pa dang// rang gi rkang srin khrag phyung la// stong rtsa brgyad kyis gzugs la 'phang// gcig ni zhing ngam khyim dbus sba// bzhi ni phyogs bzhir sba byas te// phyogs kyi chen po bzhi la gtad// shin tu 'di nyid ma grub ste// zla gsum rtags ni ma byung na// lo gnyis dag na 'byung bar 'gyur// gal te des kyang ma byung na// rgyal pa'i ma mo gser mig gzugs// ser mo spu gri rnon po thogs// 'khor ni ma mo khro bos bskor// gsod par sgra skad sngags pa yis// lcags sbyang shin tu 'dar bar sgom zlos pa rna bar mi thos shing// nyal na yid kyi brgya yis bdab// thams cad kun la bya min gsang mi bsgrags// 'dod pa khams kyi dbang mo'i rgyud las// yang tig bdud kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//// dpal lha mo 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma'i rgyud las// sgrub thabs thams cad 'byung ba rdzogs so////

de nas yum 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma nyid// yak+Sha kro d+hi shwi rir gyur te// yab kyi sku la 'khril te gnas pa dang// yum 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma sprul pa dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa dang// lha gnod 'dul la sogs te// lha'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa dang// phya ya bdud kyi rgyal po la sogs te// bdud kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang// gshin rje nag polasogs te// gshin rje tshogs dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa dang// e ka dza ti la sogs te// srid pa'i sman dpag tu med pa dang bcas pas mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o mngon rdzogs yab kyi sku// gnyis med mkha' ltar ye nas dag pa las/ thugs rje'i sprul sku dpag tu med pa yis// ma rig log rtog bsal pa ya mtshon che'o// e ma'o ye shes sku mchog rnam rtog gting bral las// thugs rje khro tshul sku yis dregs pa pho mo btul// bdud rtsi ro rnyed sku mchog mthong ba tsamapagyis ni// nyi ma stong las lhag pa'i 'od kyi ma rig bsal ba ya mtshan che'o// phyi dus bstan pa 'jig pa du ma byung nas bstan pa mi gnas tshe// ma sprul dngos kyi tshig bsgrub srog tig snying tig la sogs sgrub thabs dang// bdud mo la sogs 'khor dang ldan pa'i sgrub thabs 'dul ba bstan pa dang// nad bdag mtsho sman la sogs ji ltar 'dul bzhin sbrul te de bsgrub bstan// 'khor gyi ging dang bdud la sogs pa'i sbyor bas gnan pa bshad pa ni// ngo mtshar e ma'o thugs rje shin tu mchog ste e ma'o ya mtshan che'o// zhes gsol pa dang// bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nang nas lha gnod 'dul la gzigs par gyur to// de nas lha gnod 'dul stan las langs te// bskor ba lan brgya phrag du ma byas nas mar me mdzad dang mthun pa'i rkyang phyag gis yan lag sa la brdabs te// thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// ma mo bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// ma mo dbang du ji ltar bsdu/ ma mi'i dam tshig ji lta bu// ma mo'i shi sa gang zhig lags// 'dod khams dbang phyug ji lta bu// lha mo nag mo tshogs kyi dze mo// nag mo'i rnam pa ji lta bu// de yi rdzags bsag byung khungs ni/ thun gyi rna ma pa du zhig mchis// 'jug gi don ni ji lta bu// sgrub pa'i thabs la ji ltar bsgrub// zhi rgyas dbang du mi 'tshal lam// srid pa'i dbang chen ma mo 'di// bskang ba'i gtso bo gang gis bskang// bskang ba'i yon tan ji ltar bu// tshig gis bskang ba gang zhig lags// rdzas kyi bskang tshul ji ltar lags// gtor mas bskang bzlog ji ltar lags// gtor mas bskang bzlog ji ltar bgyi// dus zad tshe bsgrub ji ltar bsgrub// rtsa

ba 'phel ba ji ltar bgyi// 'khor dang ldan pa'i sbyin sreg gang// 'khor la 'phra na gang gis gzir// phur gdab ral gris ji ltar gtub// ban de la sogs nyams pa la// nyur ba'i thabs ni gang zhig lags// de rnams lha dang dbye ba ni// dam bsre mna' bsgag ji lta bu// grub dang ma grub bye brag gang// pra dang rtags ni ji lta bu// rta dang sngags grangs ji lta bu// 'jig rten srog chags srog gzung phyir// ser ba ji ltar gcad par bgyi// rgas dang gu pa'i sems can gyis// gong ma'i las rnams mi grub pas// thod mda'i sgrub thabs ji ltar bsgrub// rabs rgyud rtsa ba ji ltar lags// bdag gi the tsom 'di dag ni// 'dzam gling mi la sman slad du// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab kyi bka' stsal ba// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// khyod kyi the tsom 'di rnams ni// yang dag nyid du ngas bshad do// ma mo bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// ma mo dbang du ma 'dus na// don yang mi 'grub rang yang rlag/ de phyir dbang du bsdu ba rnams// gnod 'dul nyon cig nga yis bshad// shes rab rtsal gyi chos nyid dang// ting 'dzin rtsal gyis gzir ba dang// bdag tu 'dul bas cig pa dang// sbyod lam dbang du bsdu ba dang// gdan du bya ba'i rim pa'o// ma ni spros pa med pa'i dbyings// mo ni mnyam pa med pa'i ngang// ma ni rtag chen g.yung drung mkha'// ma ni chags med byang chub klong// ma ni sku gsung thugs kyi mkha'// mo nu lus ngag yid gsum klong// ma ni dges chen rtag pa'i mkha'// mo ni bde chen longs spyod klong// ma ni rgyal ba kun gyi mkha'// mo ni srid pa kun gyi klong// ma ni skye ba med pa'i mkha'// mo ni 'gag pa med pa'i klong// ma ni spros med byang chub mkha'// mo ni spros pa'i sems kyi tshogs// ma ni thabs mchog 'dod med mkha'// mo ni shes rab chags med klong// ma ni nam mkha'i dbyings nyid mkha'// mo ni sems kyi dbyings nyid klong// ma ni chos kyi dbyings nyid mkha'// mo ni b+ha ga dbyings nyid klong// ma ni kun gzhi bde chen dbyings// mo ni rnam shes hU~M du 'bar// mkha' klong gnyis su bdag bsgom zhing// thig le chen por blo brtan pas// nam mkha' 'byung ba dang du sdud// spros bral dbyings su chos rnams sdud// byang chub sems su ma mo yi// sems kyang dbang du bsdus pas 'grub// ma mo'i lus kyang dbang du bsdu// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// yi shes tshogs kyi rje mo ni// ye shes thig le chen po dang// gsang chen bde ba'i lam mchog ste// man ngag rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// yang gsang ma mo drug po ste// chags pa'i dbang du bsgom par bya// yid kyi rang bzhin byed pa

ni// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rtogs pa'i tshogs// dman mo rang bzhin gnod spyin mo// srog rtsa'i rang bzhin re ma ti// rtsa ba'i rang bzhin bdud mo gnan// bdud mo'i tshogs kyi rtsa bran gyis// rang bzhin dman mo gnod sbyin mo// gnan pa'i dbang du 'dus par bsgom// pad+ma dbang du gsal ba yis// dbang bsdu khyung gshog 'bar ba yis// thams cad kun kyang dbang du sdud// byang chub sems dang ge sar gyis// tag tas bcas pas cig par bsdu// ston pa bde gshegs kun gyi dpal// sku yi phyag rgya mi g.yo zhing// bsgo ba'i tshogs rnams gang nyan pa// rdo rje spun la gdung ba bskyed// de ni lus kyi sa ma ya// bskyed rdzogs sa bon rgyun mi bcad// rgyal pa'i phyag rgyar gsal bar bsgom// 'di ni ngag gi sa ma ya// gsang ba'i snying po nges pa'i don// snod ngan rnams la spel ba min// 'di ni sems kyi sa ma ya// stan 'gan dang ni 'bras bu lnga// spang bar mi byed spyad par bya// nges med nges med ma mi smad// thab dang gzhob dang khon mi bya// las kyis nyams dang dam nyams dang// srog las nyams pa phrad mi bya// gzhan du mos dang gdung med pa// rnam pa kun tu bya ba min// nal mi spang dang mchod pa dang/ gtor ma rgyun du spang mi bya// dmigs med spyod pa mtha' dag kun// 'di ni rdzogs pa'i sa ma ya// sa ma ya ni rdo rje che// 'da' bar mi mdzad rdo rje'i dam// bcol ba'i las rnams byed pa yin// mkha' 'gro ma rnams sa ma ya// nam mkhar 'byung ba mi dmigs 'chi// chos nyid spros dang bral ba yis// chos can dngos po 'chi bar 'gyur// byang sems bde ba chen po yis// srid pa gsum gyi shi sar 'gyur// chos kyi rang bzhin dngos po med// dngos med yi ge stong par sbyar// stong nyid stong pas ye nas dben// stong pa'i snod kyang dngos kyis stong// rnam smin las kyang nyon mongs stong// gdod nas stong pa'i 'bras bu la// rtogs pas stong pa'i 'bras bu len// legs dang nyes pa gnyis med de// thig le chen por len pa med// gdod nas legs pa'i rgyal po yin// lang ka pu rangs srin yul du// dpal chen dpal 'bar 'jigs byed kyis// ma mo gsad de shi sa yin// dur sa lang ka pu rangs nyid// sreg sa'ang yul ni de nyid du// me dpung smug nag nang du bsreg/ de bas phyis 'byung rnal 'byor pas// dpal du gnas pa'i bka' 'das na// nges par gsad pa'i sbyor ba bya// dug gtor g.yas la sman gtor g.yon// ma mo'i sku gzugs mdun du dgram// rdo rje la sogs mtshon cha ma bdun// bdag nyid dpal gyi skur gnas nas// rdza rnga brdungs te gdung ba yi// mchi ma phyung nas bsgo bar bya// gal te des kyang ma nyan na// bdag nyid

dpal du gnas pa yis// rme ba dkar nag rnam gnyis la// sprul pa dpag med bskye nas kyang// brdeg pa'i tshul bstan bsdigs par bya'o// gal te des kyang ma nyan na// dpal chen ya gaSha he ru ka// 'khor dang bcas pa gsal byas nas// srog snying rnams kyi 'jug nyid la// ma ling dum rbad dza zhes brjod// sbrul pa dpag med 'phros pa yis// ma nyid 'khor dang bcas pa yang// bya nag mkha' la rgyu ba'am// nya nyid bye tshan gzhag pa bzhin// gyur te nyam thag tshig 'byin pa// dbang phyug chen po ci mdzad na// 'jig rten khams nas bdag cag la// nyams shing 'khrul pa ci mchis pa// bka' stsal dpa' bo chen po khyod// de la las kyang brjod par bya// gal te des kyang ma nyan na// bdag nyid dpal du gnas pa des// mtshon tshogs brdeg cing dug gtor sbyin// srog snying gsad pa'i sngags kyang brjod// gal te las byed gyur pa na// sman gyi gtor mas gso ba dang// gsol la snying snas bskang ba bya// bstod tshig brjod de gtor mas mchod// lha dbang brgya byin btsun mor gyur// sum cu rtsa gsum dbang sgyur ma// 'thab bral la sogs nam mkha'i lha// gtso mo rnams kyi btsun mo'i phyir// nam mkhar gnas pa'i dbang phyug ma// srin mo smug nag 'bar ba yis// srid pa gsum po dbang bsdus nas// gdul sa 'dod pa'i khams yin pas// 'dod khams dbang phyug ces su grags// 'dzam gling mi rnams tha ma'i tshe// bstan pa gnyan po 'jig pas na// zhe sdang phyogs gcig tshul gzungs// gnod spyin 'khor rnams dbang bsdud pas// gnod
