kyi rgyal po chen po ni// chos dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ngang du gshegs so// 'khor rnams ni rang rang gi gnas su mi snang bar gyur to// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po 'byung po 'dul byed ces bya ba rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ba su d+ha ra dang/ lo tsa ba bud+d+ha rad nas gtan la phab pa'o//// rgya gar skad du/ badzra pA Ni karma sa mu tra tan+t+ra nA ma// bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje las rgya mtsho'i rgyud ces bya ba/ mthu stobs kyi bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje de/ rdo rje gdan gyi lho phyogs gyad kyi shing sa la zung gcig gi tshal shing/ a mra dang/ nyo ti dang/ kham bu dang/ ku sha dang/ star ka dang/ gzhan yang 'bras bu can gyi shing sna tshogs pa dang/ 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'i shing la sogs pa/ sman gyi shing sna tshogs pa dang/ tsan dan la sogs te dri zhim po sna tshogs pa dang/ gzhan yang shing rnam pa sna tshogs gnas so// shing de dag la yang bya'i tshogs rma bya dang/ ne tsho dang/ khrung khrung dang/ shang shang dang/ de la sogs pa bya sna tshogs pa gnas so// bya de dag kyang sgra skad snyan po sna tshogs pa byin no// de dang nye ba'i phyogs la la na me tog rnam pa sna tshogs gnas so// sa phyogs la la na sman sna tshogs pa gnas so// sa phyogs la la na ri dwags sna tshogs gnas so// chu gtsang ma la sogs pa 'bab bo// sa gnas shin tu bsil ba dang/ rab tu nyams dga' ba byin che ba'i gnas de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje/ 'khor rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor rnams kyi nang nas/ lha'i sde chen po tshogs kyi bdag po 'dod pa dbang phyug srid pa gsum la dbang sgyur ba/ dpal mgon po nag po stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po la lan gsum bskor byas te/ zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas mdun du sdod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ mkhyen bzhin du bka' stsal pa/ dpal ldan mgon po nag po khyod// bskor ba byas nas phyag btsal te/ nga yi mdun du khyod 'khod pa// gang dang gang gi don du 'dud// ces gsungs so// de nas dpal ldan mgon po nag po shin tu yid dga' bar spro ba'i tshul gyis 'dud de/ pus mo sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas// gsang ba'i bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba dang/ skyong ba dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ spel ba dang/

dkar po'i phyogs la dga' ba la gsang bdag nyid kyis phan pa ji ltar bsgrub/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bshig pa dang/ dkon mchog dbu 'phang smod pa dang/ nag po'i phyogs la dga' ba la de la gnod pa ji ltar bskyal/ 'khor ba'i chos la skyo ba skyes nas/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba 'dod pa rnams kyis thabs gang dang gang la brten par bgyi/ zhes gsol pa dang/ gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ mahA kA la de legs so// dkar po'i phyogs la phan pa 'dod pa dang/ nag po'i phyogs rlag par 'dod pa dang/ 'khor ba spangs nas mya ngan las 'das par 'dod pa rnams/ khyod kyis nga la 'dod zhib tu dris pa ste/ ngas kyang khyod la legs par bstan par bya'o zhes gsungs so// de nas mgon po nag po shin tu glo ba ches dga' nas/ ga pur dang/ tsan dan dang/ a ka ru dang/ du ru ka dang/ gzhan yang spos rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang/ pad+ma dang/ pad+ma dkar po dang/ u ta pa la dang/ mdog mdzes pa dang/ tsam pa ka la sogs pa dang/ gzhan yang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang/ 'bru mar dang/ til mar dang/ mar gyi mar me dang/ mar me chen po la sogs pa mar me rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang/ bsil byed kyi chu dang/ bdag byed kyi chu dang// snub byed kyi chu la sogs pa yon chab dang/ khrus chab dang/ byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang/ bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ bca' ba dang/ mur pa dang/ 'jib pa dang// ldag pa dang/ 'brad pa la sogs pa zhal zas kyi bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang/ dung dang/ cha lang dang/ pi wang dang/ rnga dang/ 'khar rnga dang/ rdza rnga dang/ cang te'u dang/ pheg rdob dang/ dgu po rgyud mangs la sogs pa/ 'bud pa dang/ brdung ba dang/ dkrol ba dang/ sbreng ba dang/ sgra'i bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang/ bla ri la sogs rgyal mtshan dang/ na bza' dang/ gdugs dang/ ba dan la sogs pa rgyan gyi rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang/ rin po che sna tshogs bdun dang/ bkra shis kyi rdzas la sogs pa mchod pa'i bye brag dpag tu med pa rnams kyis chos zhu ba'i don du gsang ba'i bdag po la gus pa dang bcas pas mchod do// 'dud do// phyag na rdo rje las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas mgon po nag pos gsol pa/ kye ho gsang bdag rdo rje bsnams// dpa' bo khyod nyid sgrub don du// sgrub pa'i go rims rim pa bzhin// bdag la legs par bshad par zhu// zhes gsol to// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// mahA kA la khyod nyon cig/ khyod kyis dris pa'i don de dag/ nga yis khyod la legs par bstan// dam tshig sdom par rab ldan pa'i// dad pa dang ldan skyes bu

yis// gza' skar tshes grangs bzang po la// byin che bkra shis nyams dga' ba'i// dben zhing yid 'ong gnas dag tu// mdo klog sku gdung gdab pa dang// bden bdar sa bslang mchod rdzas btang// bsod nams tshogs ni ci nus bsag/ maN+Dal legs brtsigs pa yis byug/ dri zhim chus blug me tog bkram// gtsang ma'i ras la 'dod lha'i gzugs// legs bris rab gnas byas la dgod// khrus byas mchod pa'i rdzas rnams bsham// skad cig lha ru mos byas te// thugs ka'i sa bon 'od zer gyis// dkon mchog bla ma yi dam lha// spyan drangs mdun gyi mkha' la bsam// phyag bya mchod de bshags par bya// yi rang bskul zhing gsol ba btab// lus dbul skyabs 'gro byang chub bsngo// skad cig nyid la khro bor bskyed// bgegs la bka' bsgo bskrad sngags bzlas// hUM dang gsang sngags drag tu bzlas// rdo rje gur dang ra bar bsam// khro bo dpag med skyed byas la// gnod sbyin 'dul dka' thub par bsam// mtshon cha'i sa bon sngags bcas spros// gnod sbyin tshar gcad rlag par dmigs// mchod pa'i rdzas rnams byin brlabs bya// dngos rnams sna tshogs dpag med de// sgyu ma gzugs brnyan bzhin du bsam// hUM las rdo rje gsang bdag sku// sku mdog ljang sngon zhal gcig pa// phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams// zhabs gnyis phyed skyil sems dpa'i tshul/ khru tshad nyi shu gcig dang ldan// rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes par spras// de 'dra'i mgon po gsal byas la// mchod byas bstod bshags dngos grub blang// 'phrin las bcol zhing smon lam gdab// mchod pa gtor ma dus drug dbul// bzlas pa sum 'bum tshad du bya// yang na 'bum phrag bcu dang gsum// zla drug mtshan rtags ma byung bar// byang chub 'dod pas rgyun du yang// brtson 'grus drag pos 'bad par bya'o// rim par bsdus te stong nyid gsal// skul bskyed rtag tu de nyid bsam// spro ba'i don du de nyid gsal// cir yang bsam med ngos gzung bral// blo gtad med par gsal bar shar// gnas gsum steng nas hUM 'od 'bar// e yaM khaM saM druM yig las// sa gzhi rgya mtsho ri rab steng// rin chen gzhal yang mdzes par gsal// de dbus hUM gi 'phro 'du las// rdo rje hUM las gsang bdag sku// nyi zla'i steng na 'od du 'bar// oM a hUM gi 'phro 'du las// hUM oM swA hAs dbang bskur// hUM gi 'phro 'dus bsrung par bya// lha bstim che ba'i nga rgyal bskyed// thugs la ye shes sems dpa' gsal// shar lho nub byang phyogs bzhi nas// hUM tra hri a rnam bzhi las// sge mo 'phreng dang glu gar gsal// mtshams bzhir hUM traM hri ho las// bdug spos me tog mar

me ma// dri chab ma la sogs pa gsal// sgo bzhir dza hUM baM ho las// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang// dril bu ma la sogs pa gsal// de kun dkar se dmar dang ljang// sngo ser dmar skya ljang khu'o// sgo ba rigs las shes par bya'o// phyag na me long 'phreng ba dang// pi wang phyag gnyis gar sgyur byed// spos phor dang ni me tog 'phreng// mar me dri yi dung phor bsnams// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang// dril bu tho bas gsal bar bya// byin brlabs dbang yang bskur bar bya// spyan drangs bstim zhing mchod pa bya// bzlas pa bstod bshags dngos grub blang// 'phrin las bcol zhing smon lam gdab// sems can kun don dge ba sngo// spyan drangs gshegs la bskyed pa bsdu// stong pa'i ting 'dzin gsal bar bya// skad cig mos pas sku rdzogs bya// byin brlabs dbang bskur lus bsrung bya// spyod lam kun tu de la gnas// 'gro ldog ci tsug ji ltar yang// yi dam lha dang 'bral mi bya// yi dam lha la rtag gnas na// sa dang gser du gnas pa bzhin// skyon dang yon tan 'dres gnas pa// skyon gsal yon tan rgyas shing 'phel// zhes gsungs so// las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ zhi ba sgrub pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas mgon po nag pos gsol ba/ kye ho gsang bdag rdo rje bsnams// sems can bsam pa tha dad pas// zhi bas mi 'dul khros pa la// khro bo'i bsgrub pa bstan par zhu// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// mahA ka la khyod nyon cig/ khro rgyal gtum po'i sgrub pa zhig/ nga yis khyod la legs par bstan// skal ldan dpa' bo skyes bu yis// dus dang gnas dang bsod nams tshogs// maN+Dal mchod bsham tshogs bsag dang// mtshams gcad dmigs rten dgos pa dang// mchod sogs byin brlabs shes par bya// dngos po sna tshogs sems su zhi// cir yang smra med blo gtad bral// rnam dag bde chen nyid du gsal// rang nyid mthing kha 'od du 'bar// 'phro 'du rdo rje brtul zhugs can// sku ni sngon po sngon po che// zhal gcig phyag gnyis zhabs gnyis bgrad// phyag g.yas rdo rje chen po 'phyar// g.yon pa sdigs pa'i mdzub mo bcas// gyen du skra brdzes sbrul gyis brgyan// spyan gsum rtsa dmar sdang mig gzigs// shang ni gnag cing 'bur yang che// zhal gdangs tshems gnyis mche ba gtsigs// smin ma ag tsom 'bur bas brgyan// khros pa'i gnyer ma brtsegs mar gnas// stag lpags 'gong gi sham thabs can// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la 'gying// ye shes me 'bar dkyil na bzhugs// rims bskyed gzhal yas dbus na brjid// byin brlabs dbang bskur lus bsrung dang// lha bstim che ba'i nga rgyal

bskyed// bskyed pa spyan drangs mchod pa bya// gsal ba gsum dang ldan pa yis// bzlas pa rtag tu 'bad par bya// 'phrin las bcol zhing smon lam gdab// dge rtsa bsngos la bskyed pa bsdu// dmigs med chags dang bral la gnas// rdzus nas bskyed tshul lhar bskyed de// byin brlabs dbang bskur lus bsrung bstim// nam yang de dang 'bral mi bya// bsreg sbyangs sngags kyis gzung 'dzin bral// g.yo med sang nge sa ler gsal// nyi zla pad stengs hUM 'od 'bar// 'phro 'dus rdo rje gtum po'i sku// mthing nag drag po 'jigs 'jigs 'dra// phyag g.yas rdo rje 'bar ba 'phyar// phyag g.yon sdigs mdzub dril bu bcas// sbrul dang stag lpags thod pas brgyan// rim brtsegs gzhal yas nang na 'gying// g.yon du hUM gi 'phro 'du las// rdo rje gtum mo brjid bag can// sku mdog mthing nag 'od du 'bar// g.yas pa dril bu yab la 'khyud// phyag g.yon dung dmar gtso la stobs// 'jigs pa'i rgyan cha kun gyis brgyan// byin brlabs dbang bskur ldan par bya// spyan drangs mchod dbul gnyis med bstim// 'khor lo'i tshul du bzlas pa bya// bstod bshags dngos grub gsol ba gdab// 'phrin las smon lam dge rtsa bsngo// gshegs dang bsdu ba'i don shes bya// rtog med cir yang gnas mi bya// dran pa tsam gyis lha mchog bskyed// byin brlabs lus bsrung dbang bskur bya// lha bstim che ba'i nga rgyal bskyed// mgo dang lus po bral gyur kyang// yi dam lha dag 'bral mi bya// rmongs pa gang dag yi dam bral// nyes mang legs pa 'byung mi srid// yid bzhin nor bu sus rnyed pa// dbul 'phongs skyon bral longs spyod rgyas// rtag tu yi dam sus bsgom pa// nyon mongs skyon sangs bde legs rgyus// zhes gsungs so// las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ khro bo bsgrub pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas mgon po nag pos gsol ba/ kye ho gsang bdag rdo rje bsnams// mchod pa'i byin brlabs rim pa bzhin// bdag la legs par bstan par bya// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// ma hA ka la khyod nyon cig/ mchod pa'i byin brlabs rim pa bzhin// nga yis khyod la legs par bshad// las kyi dri chab nang dag tu// zla dkyil a yi 'phro 'du las// sbyang zhing byin bsdus 'od du zhu// nyes pa kun dag bdud rtsi 'khyil// oM sarba d+harma swa b+ha ba bi shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ yon chab nang du rdo rje 'bar// baM gyi 'phro 'dus bdud rtsi phab// kun kyang 'od du rgya mtshor 'khyil// sngags bzlas ye shes bdud rtsir 'bar// oM pra wa ra sad ka ra hUM/ me tog la sogs rang sngags kyis// mchod rdzas lha mo'i rang bzhin can// mnyen lcug 'khril

ldem mdzes tshul can// phyag g.yas rang rtags g.yon dkur brten// 'gying brjid bde gshegs mnyes mdzad ma'o// oM badzra ne bi te hUM// bshos gtsang lha mo'i rang bzhin can// bdud rtsi zhal zas sna tshogs thogs// bde gshegs rgyal ba brnyes mdzad pa// rgya che ba zab theg mchog la// nyi ma pad+ma 'bru gsum las// 'od zer 'du ba'i sbyor ba yis// bdud rtsi 'dod yon lha mor bsam// oM AHhUM ba li taM/ te tso ma ni/ ba la ba ti/ kun la sa ma ya swA hA/ pad stengs rag dmar rgya mtshor 'khyil// oM gyis skyon spangs 'od du 'bar// de stengs hUM gi 'phro 'du las// rdo rje sgeg mo chags pa'i bdag/ pad+ma'i rA ga rak+tar zag/ chags pa'i bdag nyid thugs rje che// pad+ma'i rak+ta bdud rtsir 'bar// oM AHhUM ma hA' rak+ta dz+wa la swa mu tra hUM/ nyi steng hUM gis skyon sbyangs nas// de stengs nyi stengs maM sngon las// mA ma ki yi sku ru gsal// de las de 'dra grangs med 'phros// yid 'ong sna tshogs bcud bsdus te// kun kyang ma lus 'od du zhu// nyi ma shel ltar rnam dag pa'i// gsol bas ye shes lha la thim// oM mA ma ki ri ki ri/ a ti tiSh+Tha swa maM/ 'dus byas rdzas kyi rnam pa las// byin brlabs dbang bskur ldan byas na// sa bon 'bras bu mnga' 'phel zhing// rgyu chung 'bras bu che rgyas yin// ces gsungs so// las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ mchod pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas mgon po nag pos gsol pa/ kye ho gsang bdag rdo rje bsnams// snyan gsan dbab dang spyan drangs dang// mchod bstod rim pa bshad par bya// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// ma hA kA la khyod nyon cig/ snyan gsan dbab sogs rim pa zhig/ nga yis khyod la legs par bshad// 'di skad tshig tu brjod par bya// hUM skye ba med pa'i chos dbyings chen po nas// skye ba'i cho 'phrul gzugs sku'i tshul ston pa// gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin rgyal 'khor dang bcas// gdug pa 'dul phyir 'gro ba'i don la gshegs// lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog dam pa nas// thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don du sku sprul pa// gsang ba'i bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// nyon mongs 'joms mdzad gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan mchog mdzes pa la// gsang ba'i bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// dngos grub stsal dang gdug pa gdul ba'i phyir// brjid bag tshul gyis gdan la bzhugs su gsol// lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog dam pa nas// rig sngags gsang sngags kun gyi bdag po ste// nyon mongs log rtog ma lus 'joms mdzad pa// gsang bdag rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes che ldan gsang bdag gzugs sku la// bdud rtsi bsil

'jam khrus chab 'di phul bas// nyon mongs rnam rtog dri ma dag gyur nas// skyon bral rnam par dag pa'i sku thob shog/ dri med shon tu yid du 'ong ba yi// lha rdzas dam pa'i ar+g+haM 'di// gsang bdag kun la yon chab 'di phul bas// sku drin chen po thob par shog/ yon tan lhun rdzogs gsang ba bdag gzugs sku la// rin chen mdzes pa'i me tog 'di phul bas// log par lta ba'i nyon mongs kun bral nas// lta bas mi ngoms mdzes pa'i sku thob shog/ mchog tu rnam par dag pa mnga' ba yi// gsang bdag sku la bdug spos 'di phul bas// dam tshig sdom pa'i nyes pa kun bral nas// ye shes thugs rjes 'gro ba kun 'dren shog/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsang bdag gzugs sku la// mun pa gsal byed mar me 'di phul bas// ma rig thib po'i mun pa kun bcom nas// sangs rgyas spyan lnga yongs su rdzogs par shog/ snying po lnga nyid 'bras bu lhun rdzogs pa'i// gsang bdag sku la dri chab 'di phul bas// mya ngan gdung ba'i zug rngu kun bral nas// 'od zer mtha' yas 'gyed pa'i sku thob shog/ longs spyod zhal zas ro mchog brgya ldan 'di// gsang bdag sku la bshos gtsang 'di phul bas// rdzas su spyod pa'i gdung ba kun bral nas// bsam pa'i longs spyod yongs su rdzogs par shog/ sil snyan pi wang gling bu la sogs pa// sgra snyan yid dam rnams la phul ba yis// ma snyan ngag gi sgrib pa dag pa dang// snyan pa'i dngos grub myur du grub par shog/ mnyam nyid yon tan kun rdzogs gsang bdag la// ye shes bdud rtsi gtor ma 'di phul bas// dbul 'phongs bkres skom sdug bsngal kun bral nas// ting 'dzin longs spyod yon tan rgyas 'phel shog/ kun mkhyen chags dang bral ba'i gsang bdag la// skyon rnams rnam dag rat+ka 'di phul bas// zhen chags gdung ba'i rnam pa kun bral nas// 'khor 'das chos la thabs kyis dbang sgyur shog/ las rnams mthar phyin don grub gsang bdag la// 'bru bcud dpag med dza gad 'di phul bas// nyon mongs log rtog gdug rtsub kun bcom nas// bdud bzhi dgra las rgyal ba'i sku thob shog/ mchod pa'i bye brag sna tshogs 'byor tshad dbul// hUM lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog dam pa nas// 'gro ba'i mgon po bcom ldan rdo rje bsnams// 'gying bag brjid tshul gdan la bzhugs pa ni// srid pa gsum las khyad par 'phags pa'i rtags// sku mdog ljang sngon 'od zer 'phro ba ni// 'phrin las lhun grub 'gro ba'i don mdzad rtags// phyag g.yas rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams pa ni// ye shes lnga ldan dug lnga spangs pa'i rtags// phyag g.yon dril bu dku la bstan pa ni// rten pa'i 'khor la gsung dbyangs chos ston

rtags// rin chen rgyan mdzes sna tshogs spras pa ni// yon tan lhun grub 'gro ba 'dren pa'i rtags// sku smad pa ti sham thabs mdzad pa ni// mdzes tshul mkhyen pa'i bye brag gsal ba'i rtags// zhabs gnyis sems dpa'i tshul bzhugs phyed skyel ni// rang don lhun grub gzhan don mthar phyin rtags// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyab rten mdzad pa ni// sdug bsngal gdug bral thugs rje bsil ba'i rtags// 'od kor rgyab yol 'ja' tshon rnam lnga ni// rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi byin rlabs rtags// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni// shes rab thabs ldan nyes pa'i skyon bral rtags// 'gro ba'i mgon po gsang bdag rdo rje bsnams// bdag gis khyod bstod bdag kyang de 'drar shog/ hUM chos nyid mnyam pa nyid la rab zhugs kyang// thugs rjes gtan du mya ngan mi 'da' zhing// 'gro ba'i don phyir mtha' yas gzugs mnga' ba'i// dpa' brtan rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo// log rtog dgra 'joms dpa' ba'i cha byad can// srid gsum drag po'i dbang phyug tshogs 'joms shing// bla med byang chub gnas mchog 'god mdzad pa// khro rgyal bgegs kyi gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod// gang gi sems la chags sdang rnam bral yang// 'dul ba'i don phyir 'gro la khro ba dang// 'dod chags can la chags can ltar ston pa// khyod kyi dngos grub ya mtshan chen po rnams// bskal pa yun ring bar du mi bzhag par// shin tu myur bar dus 'dir bdag la stsol// lus ngag yid gsum sdom pa nyams pa dang// nyes byas ma lus bdag gis so sor bshags// gang 'dod don la gsol ba btab// dmigs pa'i 'phrin la drag tu bcol// zab pa'i smon lam rgya cher gdab// dge tshogs byang chub chen por bsngo// gshegs dang bsdu ba shes par bya// yi dam rtag tu mchod par bya// rgya mtsho'i gling nas nor longs mi// nyes bral legs dang ldan pa bzhin// yi dam lha la rtag mchod na// skyon bral yon tan phun sum tshogs// zhes gsungs so// las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las// mchod pa 'bul ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas mgon po nag pos gsol ba/ kye ho gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin// sa chog las kyi rim pa bzhin// bdag la legs par bstan par zhu// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal ba// ma hA kA la khyod nyon cig/ sa blang la sogs rim pa zhig/ nga yis khyod la legs par bshad// 'dod pa'i gnas su phyin byas la// mchod rdzas gsang sngags byin brlabs bya// dran pa tsam gyis rang lhar bskyed// paM las sa yi lha mo ni// btso ma gser gyi mdog brjid ldan// phyag g.yas gser bum rin chen bkang// phyag g.yon mchod sbyin phyag rgya can// de la byin brlab

dbang bskur bya// rin chen sa gzhi mdzad pa yi// rang bzhin sa yi lha mo dang// 'gro ba'i mgon dang skyabs mdzad pa'i// dus bzhi'i lha mo 'khor bcas rnams// spyan drangs bstim ste mchod pa bya// 'dzam gling spyir gnas mthu chen dbang bsgyur ba'i// dbyar dgun ston dpyid nam zla dus bzhi la// rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs gtong zhing kun la 'tshe// sa bdag rgyal po lto 'phye chen po dang// hal khyi rtsang kun rtsang btsan 'khor ba dang// ho phan the se be sna lag chen dang// sa bdag sa srin la sogs mchod pa dang// gang gnas yul phyogs 'di la dbang phyed dang// gangs ri ri brag rtsi shing la gnas dang// bskor khang ldum ra skyed mos tshal gnas dang// lha khang khang stong phug dang dben gnas dang// thang la lam srang gling chen brag la gnas// rgya mtsho'i chu bran lu ma dang// chu mig rdzing la sogs par gnas pa dang// mtshe'u khron pa ne'u gsing gnas la sogs// spyan drangs mchod pa dbul ba bya// rgyal ba shAkya thub pa yis// rnam bzhi bdud kyi dpung btul te// rgyal srid chos kyi dbu btsugs nas// sa gzhi 'di stengs sangs rgyas pa// de bzhin du ni bdag gis kyang// nges par bya phyir pho brang 'debs// sa yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// bden pa'i tshig brjod bgo bar bya// gtor ma bkye la bskrad par bya// sa yi lha mo 'od du zhu// sa gzhi ye shes rang bzhin can// rin chen phye mar gyur par bsam// legs brko skyon bsal bstan par bya// sbyang dang byin brlabs bsrung gzung bya// bran 'khol mgu na las 'khol bzhin// bar chod skyon bral bkra shis phyir// 'jig rten pa yang mchod pas mnyes// zhes gsungs so// las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las// sa'i cho ga bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas mgon po nag pos gsol pa// kye ho gsang bdag rdo rje bsnams// sku gzugs la sogs rab gnas kyi// rim pa bdag la bstan pa zhu// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// ma hA kA la khyod nyid cig/ sku gdung la sogs rim pa zhig/ nga yis khyod la bstan par bya// rtag tu lha skur gsal byed pa'i// nyams dang byin rlabs gdeng can gyis// dgos pa'i rdzas dang yo byad bsags// sngon 'gro bsnyen pa yan chad bskyar// de nas sku yi gzugs brnyan la// ba yi lnga dang snum gyis byug/ tshig sha rtsa sngags 'di yis bya// kA ya bi sho dang d+ha ni swA hA/ oM AHhUM bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ sarba d+harma bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ sarba ru pa bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ de nas bskyed pa'i rim pa yis// rang nyid sku ru gsal byas te// byin brlabs dbang bskur srungs la bstim// thugs las hUM 'thon gzugs brnyan dang// gnyis med gyur pas lha ru bskyed// de la byin brlabs

dbang bskur bya// bden brjod rjes mthun smon lam gdab// ye shes spyan drangs gnyis med bstim// dbang po la sogs skyon rnams bsal// thur mas snyan bzhar smang tsher dang// ljags bzhar tshems shing rdul yab dang// dung gi so mangs thogs te bya// tshigs bcad dang bcas dbye ba dang// skyon rnams rim pas bsal byas la// rjes la bde brjod smon lam gdab// spyan dbye ba la sngags 'di brjod// oM badzra tsak+Shu pra be sha phaT/ che ba'i yon tan rgyas pa yi// rgyan gyi mnga' gsol dbang bskur bya// phyag la hUM muM 'phro 'du las// rdo rje dang ni dril bu bsam// tshig dang sngags kyi dbang bskur bya// ma hA gu r+ya badzra sarba At+ma ko\u0f85haM// ma hA gu r+ya muM girti swa b+hA ba at+ma ko\u0f85haM// bden pa'i stobs brjod smon lam gdab// oM hUM traM a hri'i 'phro 'du las// dbu rgyan cod pan sngo dmar bsam// oM ma hA gur+ya badzra bud d+ha pra dz+nyA karma sa man ta swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ ma hA gur+ya d+harma rA dza swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ traM las rin chen snyan cha dang// mgur chu do shal gsal bya ste// ma hA gur+ya rat+na ba thi ma ta swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ ma hA gur+ya radan bi du swA b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ sha dang sa yi 'phro 'du las// dbu rgyan phyag gdub zhabs gdub gsal// ma hA gu r+ya rat+na bi pi sha swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ ma hA gur+ya rat+na bi du swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ sha yi 'phro 'dus ba ti sam thabs gsol// ma hA gur+ya su mun gan+d+hA+e swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ a dang a hUM sa hraM ha/ 'phro 'dus zla ba'i rgyab brten dang// 'od kar rgyab yol 'ja' tshon gsal// ma hA gur+ya tsaN+Da maN+Da la swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ ma hA gur+ya gu na pany+tsa swa b+hA ba at+ma ko\u0f85haM/ a pa ma las nyi zla pad+ma gsal// mahA gur+ya pad+ma tsakra sur+ya maN+Dal swa b+hA ba at+ma ko\u0f85haM/ tshig dang bcas pas mnga' gsol zhing// bden pa'i stobs brjod smon lam gdab// rdo dang tra las seng ge sogs// rin chen khri rkang shes par bya// khro rgyal 'jigs byed chen po las// tuM haM raM gi 'phro 'du las// sbrul dang sta lpags me dpung gsal// tshig dang sngags kyis mnga' gsol bya// oM badzra ro nye ba shaM hUM/ oM badzra be kri su ka hUM/ bden pa'i stobs brjod smon lam gdab// lug ngag gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// bdag bsil bum pa'i khrus chu gsol// dngos dang yid sprul mchod pa 'bul// rjes thogs bden stobs smon lam gdab// bstod cing sdig bshags smon lam gdab// bskor ba bya zhing me tog gtor// smon lam rgya cher gdab par bya// tshig dang sngags kyis brtan bzhugs bya// kA ya bA ka tsit+ta stiSh+Tha badzra hUM/ dmigs rten bde gshegs mngon du dmigs// gzugs brnyan rab gnas ldan byas na// gser la nag tshur btang ba bzhin// byin che zhal dro bkra shis

shing// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rim rdzogs 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las// gzugs brnyan rab gnas bya ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas mgon po nag pos gsol pa/ kye ho gsang bdag rdo rje bsnams// slob ma dbang bskur rim pa zhig/ bdag la legs par bstan par zhu// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// ma hA kA la khyod nyon cig/ slob ma'i dbang bskur rim pa bzhin// nga yis khyod la legs par bshad// thos mang gdeng ldan shes rab gsal// chags sdang chung zhing thugs rjer ldan// phyin chad bkra shis slob dpon gyis// mi 'dul gus med nyes sgo dang// nyes dmigs can la dbang mi bskur// dad ldan zhi des che ba dang// rtog med brtson 'grus che ba dang// shes rab gsal zhing brtul zhugs che/ yon tan ldan la dbang rim bskur// skyon bral bkra shis nyams dga' bar// sa bslang la sogs bzung byas la// khru bzhi brgyad dam bcu gnyis sam// bcu drug nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i tshad// dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum yin te// ting 'dzin me tog rdul tshon rnams// rab 'bring tha ma'i don du bya// maN+Dal me tog mdzes byas la// rin chen mdzes pa'i bum pa'i nang// chu gtsang sman lnga 'bru lnga dang// rin chen lnga dang snying po lnga// dri lnga blugs la bcud ldan bya// ras gtsang ma nyams mgul bcings bcings// 'bras bu can gyi kha rgyan bya// las kyi bum pa ma gtogs pa'i// lha yi grangs dang mthun pa 'am// de yi nang du lha rnams bskyed// las kyi bum pa'i nang du ni// hUM las bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bskyed// oM big+h+nan ta krid mr-i ta kun+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ spyan drangs bstim mchod bzlas pa bya// bstod pa bshags gsol gdab 'od du zhu// chu nyid ye shes chu ru 'gyur// slob ma dri chab khrus byas la// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa// slob ma bde ba'i don 'dod pas// gtso la gsol ba gdab par bya// gu ru slob ma dran byas la// bgegs bskrad sdig bshags lhar bskyed bya// byin rlabs lus bsrung ldan par bya// dngos grub bar chad bgegs bzlog phyir// srad bu sngon po byin brlabs la// bsrung sngags brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas// bdun nam rtsa gcig mdud pa bya// dpung pa g.yon par ga zhar gdags// bzang ngan rigs rnams brtag pa'i phyir// sor brgyad tshad ldan so shing bya// sos bzung maN+Dal steng du brud// ke re bzang rab shar nub bzang// gzhan 'bring lho nub mtshams ni bskyar// rmi ltas bzang ngan brtag pa'i phyir// ku shas sngags byas g.yas phab nyal// bzang na dbang bskur ngan na bzlog/ rdul tshon dkyil 'khor bri 'dod na// gnam thig sa thig rnam pa gnyis// pad+ma

dkar po'i rgyud pa dang// shing bal rgyu la thig skud bya// kha dog lnga dang gsum ldan pa// yig 'bru lnga dang gsum ldan pa// yig 'bru lnga gsum byin brlabs bya// oM badzra be ga tra ma a zhes pas// sngar bskyed lha tshogs mkha' la 'debs// lha tshogs mchod pa gsol ba gdab// ji ltar 'dod bzhin legs par bya// pho brang zlum po le'u tshe dgu// gru bzhi gru chad sgo bzhi dang// sgo rgyan ldan pa snyoms par gdab// tshon la 'bru lngas byin gyis brlab// byang shar mtshams su re ga gcig/ dbus dang shar lho nub byang du// sngo dkar ser dmar ljang khu dgye// lho shar la sogs mtshams bzhi la// sngo ser dmar skya ljang khu dgye// gru chad ser po re ga lnga// bris te sgo bzhi rigs mthun bri// sgo rgyan mdzes tshon lcags ri sngo// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma dgod// bum pa bkod pa rgyan gyis bskor// byin ldan bkra shis mchod rten dgod// mchod pa'i rdzas dang yo byad bsar// mtshams bcad la sogs bskyed rim gsal// bum pa'i lha grangs gsal bar bya// mkha' la btegs pa bkug la bstim// spyan drangs bstim la mchod bstod bya// yol bas bar du bcad byas la// slob ma khrus byas mig bkab la// ci la dga' zhes dris lan bya// kun gyi gnang ba dri bar bya// dkyil 'khor 'jug par gsol ba gdab// spro bskyed drangs la bgegs bskrad bya// sdig bsreg lhar bskyed ye shes dbab// oM a be sha ya/ du de sa de/ badzra ga ma/ ma bu ta raM/ oM a be sha ya/ a be sha ya/ to pa ya to pa ya/ ra ra tsa le ha tsa le/ hUM A hAM swA hA/ dam tshig phog la dam chu blud// dam bsre me tog dkyil 'khor dor// sha yi mig dbye ci mthong dri// mtshan ma bstan phyir kha dog lnga// rang ka gsal dang mi gsal las// nyon mongs yon tan don gyi rtags// traM las me tog 'phreng ba gsal// tshig dang sngags kyis mgo la gdags// oM rat+na ma le/ badzra a b+hi Shin+tsa hUM/ bden pa'i stobs brjod smon lam gdab// dkyil 'khor don rtags lha ngo bstan// dbang bskur ba yi gsol ba gdab// bum pa yig 'bru lnga rim gsal// spyi bo mgrin sogs gnas lnga las// sku gsung thugs sogs rnam pa lnga// dngos grub thob par bya ba'i phyir// oM sogs lnga ldan bum pa yis// mchog dang thun mong dbang bskur ro// tshig dang ting 'dzin sngags ldan bya// oM kA ya badzra a bi She ka maM swA hA/ hUM tsit+ta badzra a bi She ka maM swA hA/ sa gu na badzra a bi She ka maM swA hA/ a bag badzra a bi She ka maM swA hA/ ha ka ra ma badzra a bi She ka maM swA hA/ bden pa'i stobs brjod smon lam gdab// dbu rgyan 'bru lnga'i ye shes lnga// hUM muM hUM las rdo rje dril bu ming// tshig dang ting 'dzin sngags ldan bya// oM

dz+nyA na badzra a bi She ka maM swA hA/ ha karma badzra a be She ka maM swA hA/ hUM badzra a badzra a badzra a bi She ka maM swA hA/ muM grir ti ho badzra a be She ka maM swA hA/ bden brjod smon lam kun la brjod// phyag rgya dam tshig brtul zhugs dang// dbugs dbyung lung bstan phyir mi ldog/ bstan par byed pa'i yan lag go/ bum chu spyi bo dbu rgyan bskon// rdo rje dpral ba dril bu kha// ming ngam rdor dril lag tu gtad// phyag rgya'i bdag po'i phyag rgyar bsgom// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa// dam tshig bla na med pa'o// spro ba sems bskyed brtul zhugs so// yon tan brjod pas dbugs dbyung pa'o// gzengs bstod pas ni lung bstan no// de nyid bstan pas phyir mi ldog/ 'phreng ba yi dam lha yi dbang// bum sogs lnga ni rigs lnga'i dbang// gzhan gyis bstan par byed pa yin// brtul zhugs kyis ni me tog dbang// phyag rgya dang ni dam tshig gis// bum chu dbu rgyan gsal bar byed// lung bstan dang ni dbugs dbyung gis// rdor dril dang ni bdag por bstan// phyir mi ldog gis kun kyang bstan// 'phreng bas ma dad dri ma med// mos spyod sa yi sgrib pa sbyang// 'dod pa'i lha mnyam dngos grub nye// mthong ba'i lam ni gnas par byed// gzung 'dzin dpa' bo'i bdud rnams 'joms// chu dang dbu rgyan dbang gis ni// 'khor 'das dri ma rnam par dag/ sa ni dang po'i sgrib pa 'byang// rdo rje'i rigs dang rin chen rigs// bdag po byed cing dngos grub 'grub// bsgom lam la gnas nyon mongs bcom// rdo rje dril bu'i bdag po yis// g.yeng ba lnga yi dri med dag/ sa gnyis brgyad po'i sgrib pa 'byang// pad+ma las kyi de bzhin rigs// bdag po byed cing dngos grub 'grub// mthar phyin pa yi lam la gnas// 'chi bdag bdud bcom tshe la dbang// bstan byed dbang gi rim pa yis// g.yeng ba phra mo'i dri ma bdag/ sa bcu'i sgrib pa 'byang bar byed// kun kyang brtan byed dngos grub 'grub// sangs rgyas pa yi lam la gnas// lha yi bu yi bdud bcom mo// dngos por snang ba'i chos rnams kun// stong par rnam par rtog par byed// lus kyi nyes pa kun dag nas// sku yi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// nus pa shin tu che 'gyur zhing// dris pa tshig gi gleng slong la// snga rtags lngas su de la bstan// bud+d+ha ka la sha a bi She ka maM/ zhes pa'i tshig brdas dris lan bya// rnam rtog ngag gi dri ma 'dag/ 'dod pa nyi shu lnga lon pa// skyon bral yon tan mang po'i gzugs// gnyis ka yid dang 'thad pa btsal// khrus byas rgyan chas brgyan byas te// bza' btung yo byad mchod pa bsham// cha shas gu ru nyid la dbul// dbang bskur chos bshad byin brlab bya// yol bas

bar bcad snyoms par 'jug/ zlog cing bde gshegs mchod byas la// za ma tog tu bdud rtsi dbab// shi sha dgab pa yol ba gdab// drangs te brtul zhugs dam tshig dbog/ me tog dor la yon yang dbul// lha mos mig dbye ci mthong dri// lus kyi 'khor lo bstan par bya// hUM dang oM gyis 'og du 'bar// ting nge 'dzin dang sngags ldan pas// a ho su kha lce la bstim// gu ya badzra a bi she ka maM swA hA/ nyes skyon rnam dag 'od bu 'bar// ye shes bdud rtsi rang bzhin des// rtog bral ngoms shing tshim par 'gyur// dkar dmar sbrel ba'i las// shu tra zhes bya bum chu'i dbang// tshangs sgor mi bskyod dbu rgyan dbang// lce la rdo rje dbang// a ho su ka ming gi dbang// dam tshig lce len brtul zhugs dbang// blta bar lung bstan bstan pa'i dbang// longs spyod gtsang sbyar phyir mi ldog/ me tog bde thob dbugs dbyung pa'o// de gnyis la gnas phyag rgya'i dbang// mi smra gsang ba'i dam tshig go/ ngag sgrib dag cing gsung mchog thob// sangs rgyas pa yi sgrib byang nas// de nyid la ni gnas par 'gyur// bdud bcom chos kun skye med rdzogs// dri ba'i tshig ni gleng slong ba// mtheb srin mnyam sbyar bstan par bya// gu ya a bi She ka maM// zhes pa'i dri lan blan par bya'o// ye shes rab gnas thob 'dod pas// nyes skyon rdul tsam med pa yi// mtshan shi sha gus ldan pas// lo grangs bcu gnyis bcu drug dang// nyi shu nyi shu lnga lon pa'i// btsal de khrus byas dri yis phyug/ mdzes pa'i chas dang rgyan gyis brgyan// me tog bkram pa'i maN+Dal bya// bza' btung yid 'ong mchod pas mchod// yol bas bar bcad 'jug rim bya// brtul zhugs dam dbog me tog dor// shes rab sangs rgyas spyan dbye bya// pad+ma sems kyi dkyil 'khor bstan// dbang bskur spro ba'i chos bshad pa// byin brlabs byas la bu la gdags// bde ba rgyas pa'i thabs kun bya// rims kyis mnyam par sbyar byas la// 'khor lo bzhi la bde chen sbyar// dga' ba dang ni mchog dga' dang// dga' bral dang ni rnam bzhi la// dga' bzhi'i rtags dang sbyar ba las// lhan skyes gnyis shor gnyis mnyam dbul// sna tshogs bde stong gnyis su med// pradz+nyA dz+nyA na badzra a bi She ka maM swA hA/ de nyid ye shes don gyi mchog/ lus sems bde myong 'od du 'bar// skal ba med pa'i sems can la// sba 'gog pas kyang myong 'gyur na// chags pa'i mtshan nyid 'phreng ba'i dbang// chu byung mtshan khrus bum chu'i dbang// bag btsub sgra gzung dbu rgyan dbang// pad+ma rdor bcug rdo rje'i dbang// de nyid bskyod pa dril bu'i dbang// dam tshig lnga skad ming gi dbang// ltas pas dga' bskyed brtul zhugs dbang// 'khyud

pas dam tshig chen po'i yin/ kha sprad ku tsa nye ba ni// de yi dbugs dbyung nye ba yin// pad+mar bcud byas phyir mi ldog/ sems kyi nyes dag thugs mchog thob// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sbyin pa sbyang// de nyid 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// bdud bzhi bcom zhing bde chen rtogs// 'di la rtsom tshe mgo gnan pa// de snyan tshig tu 'di skad brjod// pradz+nyA dz+nyA na a bi she ka maM/ zhes pas dri dang lan blan bya'o// yang dag don chen 'dod pa yi// gsum pa'i don la gnas pa'am// shes rab la rten dbab bzlog dang// yid kyi gzugs la sbyor ba dang// gtum mo sbar cing dbab cing bzlog/ don chen nges par bstan pas dka'// yang dag tha snyad kun las grol// don gyi rim snang rtog yul bral// sna tshogs rim par rang dbang sgyur// ma bskur ye nas dbang mchog rdzogs// sgrib med rnam dag ye sangs rgyas// 'dir rtogs ma bskur ma bsgyur rdzogs// sna tshogs chos nyid rang brdar bstan// rgyu mthun rang gnas dbang bskur thob pa min// dbang bskur thob pa'i slob bu rnams// sgo gsum nyes pa rnam dag cing// tshe ring bde skyid phun sum tshogs// mi smras btsan cing ci bsam 'grub// yon tan sna tshogs rgyas shing 'phel// brtsams pa'i las rnams thogs med 'grub// mtshon cha til mar ngar brtags bzhin// nus mthu khyad 'phags bde gshegs mtshungs// rgyal bu blon gyis dbang sgyur bzhin// 'khor 'das chos la dbang sgyur byed// sa thob rnams dang skal ba mnyam// rgyal ba kun gyi sras su dgongs// slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing// dbang rnams thob par ma gyur cig/ gzu lum ra chod rang byin gyis// sngags brjod bsgrub pa brtson byed pa// sgyi dam rtas par khal 'gel lam// rkyal ma 'byongs par chur 'jug bzhin// legs pa'i don med phung ba'i rgyu// dbang ma thob la sngags bshad na// ngan song gsum du be'u sbrel bzhin// lce la zhing rmo lkug par skye// des na dbang bskur gces don byed// dbang bskur ster ba'i slob dpon la// dar zab na bza' sna tshogs dang// gser dngul rin chen sna tshogs dang// rta dang glang po yul mkhar dang// bran dang chung ma bu nor dang// ci bzhes yid 'ong sna tshogs 'bul// dmus long sman pas mig phye ltar// ma rig mun pas sgrib pa la// mkhas pas dbang bskur mig phye bas// don rtogs byed phyir dbang bskur ro// zhes gsungs so// las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ slob ma dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// mgon po nag pos yang gsol ba// kye ho gsang bdag rdo rje bsnams// dam tshig bsrung sogs rim pa zhig/ bdag la legs par bstan par zhu// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal

pa// ma hA kA la khyod nyon cig/ dam tshig bsrung tshogs rim pa rnams// nga yis khyod la bstan par bya// dkon mchog gsum dang yid dam lha// bla ma rdo rje slob dpon la// sgo gsum skyon spangs rtag tu bkur// dam tshig 'brel ba'i spun grogs la// zol med rtse gcig gdung sems bskyed// gsang sngags bzlas brjod rgyun mi gcad// rtag tu lhar bsgom snying po bzlas// ting 'dzin phyal bar mi btang zhing// sngags la mi tshig lhad mi gzhug/ rgyal ba'i bka' la the tshom spang// dad spros yid ches nges pa bskyed// gtsang zhing mdzes pa'i mchod rdzas dang// rnam rtog gnyis chang le lo dang// nyon mongs 'du 'dzin g.yeng ba skyur// mchod par 'os pa'i rnam pa la// mi smad brnyas par mi bya'o// mi 'gom mi gtsang sar mi bzhag/ khrus dang gtsang sbra skabs las shes// mi gtsang phyogs la chags pa skyur// nyams grib can dang kha mi bsre// khas blang dam bcas dor ba min// sems can don la rtags gnas bya// mdor na rnam pa thams cad du// rang gi sgo gsum la bsgrib bya ste// legs nyes dge dang mi dge la// blang dang dor ba'i dam tshig bya// dam tshig ldan pa'i rnal 'byor la// mkha' 'gro gnod sbyin sde brgyad sogs// grogs byed bran bzhin ci smras nyan// 'khor dang longs spyod rgyas shing 'phel// tshe 'phos rgyal ba nyid dang mtshungs// yon tan 'byung zhing sa bzhi bzhin// ma rigs bag med nga rgyal gyis// log par phyogs te nyams gyur na// tshe 'phos med pa tshong la phyin// mi 'dod sna tshogs dpag med 'byung// ya nga'i nad sogs sdug bsngal mang// bka' yi byin rlabs 'byung mi 'gyur// nye 'khor spu gris bskor ba bzhin// 'khor dang longs spyod yid 'ong bral// yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs 'byung// dus min tshe zad sdug bsngal myong// nyams pa rtags med legs snang na// tshe zad tha mar rang sdug min// nyes pa bshags par 'dod pa ni// rang gis nyes pa gang byas pa// slob dpon la sogs spyan sngar bshags// mdo klag sku gdung gdab pa dang// sbyin sreg tshogs mchod 'khor lo dang// yi dam bde gshegs kun dmigs te// pus btsugs thal sbyar mchi glogs la// gang nyes tshig tu smra bas bshags// brgya pa'i bshags mchog rtag tu bzlas// chos nyid bde chen ngang gnas na// nyes dang nyams pa ci byas pa// chags sdang rang bzhin med par gsal// nyi ma'i 'od kyis mun gsal zhing// de don rtogs goms nyes pa med// rgya mtsho nor len dpa' bo dang// me chu so mtshams mkhar bzhin du// thub mi thub kyi nyes legs 'tshig/ de phyir rab tu 'bad par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// las// rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ dam tshig gi le'u ste dgu pa'o///

mgon po nag pos yang gsol// kye ho gsang bdag rdo rje bsnams// sbyin sreg las kyi rim pa zhig/ bdag la legs par bshad par zhu// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// ma hA kA la khyod nyon cig/ sbyin sreg las kyi rim pa zhig/ nga yis khyod la legs par bstan// sbyin sreg las la rnam pa bzhi// de dus dbyar dgun ston dpyid dang// snga dro nyin dgung dgongs nam phyed// de dag las dang sbyar bar bya// ri dkar rtse 'am chu glang dkar// dkar 'jam gnas su zhi ba brtsam// nags tshal sman ljong me tog tshal// ser snum byin cher rgyas pa brtsam// gsum 'dus chu 'dus lha khang stong// dmar la gdangs par dbang las brtsam// dur khrod phung shul 'jigs pa'i sar// nags rtsub ngan song drag po brtsam// dkyil 'khor lha yi khang pa yi// phyogs ni rim par bya bar shis// rdo rje rgya gram bris brtsigs dbus// lte bar las ni gang byed dbyibs// khru gang khru phyed rgya dang zabs// bsdus na mtho mdzub gang du bya// bsreg par bya ba'i shing rnams ni// dkar ser dmar nag 'dug pa'i shing// rtse mo yal ga sdong po dang// rtsa ba las rigs sbyar bar bya// shug pa tsan dan dkar po dang// u dum wa ra 'o ma'i shing// sor brgyad yang na bcu gnyis tshad// zhi dang rgyas pa'i yam shing ngo// 'bras chen 'o ma dngul phye dang// me tog dkar po'i gtor ma zhi// chan dang ldong ros zho dang phrum// gser phye me tog ser po rgyas// gro dang bu ram mar zangs phye// ram bu rak+ta me tog dbang// sran can lcags phye sha dang khrag/ me tog nag po'i gtor ma drag/ mar dkar til dkar nas dkar chan// mngar gsum tsan dan dkar po'i shing// zhi bar byed pa'i sreg rdzas so// mar rnying zho dang bu ram sbrang// rgun 'brum star ka nyungs kar dang// dri zhim ser shing rgyas pa'o// tsha ba'i mar dang zar ma dang// ske tshe shang rtse dmar ba'i shing// dbang sdud 'gugs pa'i sreg rdzas so// mar nag tshil chen rnams// ske tshe yungs nag khrag sna dang// dug dang thal chen phye ma gsum// dug shing nag po tsher mas gsod// dmigs pa med de bdud rtsis dbul// shing rnams ye shes mos bskyed do// ling ga spra tshil shing shun la// ci 'dra dbang po 'dod pas bya// rin chen shing las mi mthun shing// phur pa sor brgyad bcu gnyis tshad// rgya mdud rtse mo las dang sbyar// byin gyis rlabs dang ldan pa yis// dkyil 'khor la bskor gzungs la gdab// ral gri tho ba'i las yang bya// rin chen la sogs shing rnams la// gzar bu mtho bzhi las dang sbyar// yang na rnal 'byor lag pas bya// rgyan gos las bzhin phyogs su bsdad// rdzas bsag la sogs gsang bar bya// lha bskyed mchod bstod rdzogs

pa dang// sngags dang rlung yab bsreg shing gis// me spar mtshan ma bzang ngan brtag/ oM ag+ne ye/ oM ag+ne ye ra tsa ya/ ti pa ti pe/ pa ra pa ra/ ha na ha na phaT raM dz+wa la raM/ ab bya/ kab bya/ tim bya/ ti tsa na tsa ya/ phaT dz+wa la raM/ tshe dang yungs kar sngags pas sbar// de dbus raM las me lha bskyed// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// g.yas gnyis dbyug pa bgrang 'phreng 'dzin// g.yon gnyis ril ba skyabs sbyin can// spun po drang srong cha byad can// rwa skyes kham pa'i steng na gnas// sku mdog sal bzhin shes par bya// ye shes me lha spyan drangs bstim// oM ag+ne rA dza/ dza hUM baM ho// yam shing mar til 'bras chen dang// nas gro zar ma sran ma sogs// rim pa bzhin du dbul bar bya// oM badzra ag+ne ye swA hA/ shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ puSh+tiMku ru swA hA/ pa shaM ku ru swA hA/ ma ra ya phaT/ las kyi rim pa bzhin du sbyar// bstod dang gsol gdab 'phrin las bcol// de nyid me 'bar gnyis med gsal// de dbus bskyed rim gsal byas la// spyan drangs bstim la mchod pa dbul// sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa yis// gnas nas rgyud phyung bstim ste bsreg/ phur gdab gris gtub tho bas brdung// rtsa sngags las sngags btags la bsregs// dul zhing rnam dag mngon du bya// ci 'dod brdung zhing 'phel bar dmigs// zhen chags sems kyis 'du bar bsam// gtum zhing khros pa'i sems kyis bsgral// bstod dang gsol gdab 'phrin las bcol// lha gshegs pa yi rim pas bsdu// sbyin sreg bya ba'i rim pa'o// las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ sbyin sreg bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// mgon po nag pos yang gsol pa// kye ho gsang bdag rdo rje bsnams// sku gdung gdab pa'i rim pa ni// bdag la legs par bstan par zhu// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// mahA kA la khyod nyon cig/ sku yi gzugs brnyan gdab pa zhig/ nga yis khyod la legs par bstan// lha yi sbyor bas gsal byas te// yid 'ong sa la rin chen 'dar// tsan dan spos chu rnam lngas spru// thugs kha'i sa bon 'od zer gyis// skor phor 'dag pa'i rtogs pa sbyang// a las skor shes rab dbyings su// traM las bi bi rin chen gyur// nyi zla pad stengs oM A hUM// 'od zer 'phro 'du sngags ldan pas// sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor gsal// na mo b+ha ga ba te bai ro tsa na/ pra b+ha ra dza ya/ ta thA ga t+ya/ ha ra ha te b+h+ya/ saM myag bud+d+hA ya/ oM suk+Sh+me/ sa me sa me ye/ sA mA mA/ sA mA ro be/ an pa ro me/ ta raM pa ya she ma hA te tse/ nil ku le/ nir ba ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta hri ta ye/ i tiSh+thi na a tiSh+thi te swA hA/ ri dgas khri rnyan lta bu'i sems// byams dang snying rje ldan pa yis// 'khor ba'i sems can ma lus kun// sdug

bsngal las grol bde dgod phyir// bde gshegs sku gzugs bzhengs gsol dmigs// rtsa sngags rten 'brel ldan pas bdag/ ye d+harma he tu pra b+hA ba/ he tun+te Shan+ta thA ga to/ h+ya ba dat+te Shan+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM ba ti ma hA sha ra ma Na: thabs dang shes rab ldan btab pas// bde gshegs sku yi ngo bor gsal// bsod nams las grub rten dang ldan// ma legs pa rnams bskyar la gdab// de ltar sku yi ngo bo des// nam mkha'i khams kun khyab gyur nas// byin rlabs dpag med 'gro don dmigs// spyan drangs bstim la mchod sogs bya// bskor zhing phyag rgya me tog gtor// smon lam 'gro don gsol ba gdab// gshegs dang brtan bzhugs shes par bya// oM badzra muM/ kA ya bA ka tsit+ta tiSh+tha badzra/ tshe rings nad byang dpal bskyed cing// nyes pa'i skyon byang yon tan rgyas// skye ba snga phyi dran par 'gyur// sku gzugs phra rab rdul grangs kyi// bsod nams rab ldan rgyal po skye// sgrib pa ma lus byang gyur nas// tshogs chen rims kyis rdzogs byed mchog/ sku gzugs 'debs la rab brtson na// sman pa mkhas pa'i sman bzhin du// tshegs chung bas ni don chen 'gyur// 'dod pa'i don rnams 'grub par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ sku gdung gdab pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// mgon po nag pos yang gsol pa// kye ho gsang bdag rdo rje bsnams// phan 'dogs sngags kyi rim pa zhig/ bdag la legs par bstan par zhu// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal ba// ma hA kA la khyod nyon cig/ phan gnod sngags kyi rim pa zhig/ nga yis khyod la legs par bstan// oM tsan+Da ma hA ro Sha na hUM phaT/ 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal po ste// lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis kyang// sdig pa thams cad nges par bsreg/ 'dod pa'i don rnams 'di las byung// phan gnod kun gyi rtsa ba yin// gsang sngags 'di rnams bsnyen pa yis// bsgrub pa'i dus su dgos pa yin// dur rta bag+h+rin sarba gra ha bi nan/ a tra ma ti tiSh+ta/ gats+tsha gad tsa tre sha nan/ u tsa ta ya/ his ma ban+d+hA ku ru hUM phaT/ oM swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he sarba d+harma swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+ho haM/ aM sa ma ya/ maN+Dal ma de/ a gad dza ya/ a gad dza ya/ pra be sha ya/ ti ta ya ti ta ya/ a ba lo ka ya/ a ba lo ka ya/ hUM phaT swA hA/ oM pus paM badzra swA hA/ oM di paM badzri swA hA/ oM gan+d+ha ma badzri swA hA/ oM ni bi ta badzri swA hA/ oM bA liM i daM/ g+h+rin grih+na/ kha hi kha hI/ bak+Sha ni swA hA/ oM ba ling i daM/ grih+na grih+na/ khA hi khA hi/ buny+dza to/ rak+ta to// rak+ta ba pa to/ a ti kra ma saM ye swA hA/ gsang sngags 'di rnams byin rlabs kyis// gzhan gyi drag sngags gtad zlog byed// che ge mo a pa ta pa/ pa ra bid ta na/ tshe ta paM/ man tra tri ta ka kho

d+hi ta nan/ pra yo ga dushatha/ sarba bA la nan/ pra yo ga dushatha/ sarba bA la nan/ ba la na sha ya/ pra ya ka na tshe da ya/ sarba dur ni mi ta nan/ sarba a maM ga la nan/ ba la shig+haM/ b+h+ya brta ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra pA Ni ga ru Da/ nA ga sa ra sa ra/ ma ra ma ra/ shag+ti shig+hi/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ thun tri/ pri tra pa shra ya/ ra kri a kar+sha ya/ sa ma ya bag sha yA/ ra tri thun zlog zhu tri thun zlog/ ba tra ba tra thun zlog/ dgra bo rak+sha snying la thun zlog/ gsang sngags 'di rnams byin rlabs kyis// gang bsrung 'dod pa srung bar byed// a mu ka s+ye/ kA ya bA ka tsit+ta a yu s+ye/ ci ba s+ye/ shri ri ti tsa/ swa b+ha swa rba/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ badzra dza ra nan/ sarba bya ti nan/ sarba a ra ga nan/ tsha li pa phe li pa/ tshe d+ha ya/ na sha yA/ pa ka yA bya brda ya/ shan+tiM ku ru swA hA/ na mo tre na tre na/ myi na myi na/ saM ka ra ra/ sha nam cha myi so byung/ bya kag la ar gyi/ dz+nyA na ti/ zhang mang po/ maM ga la/ yi li ya/ ha tra ni phu swA hA/ pi pa yan+ti/ ga na sarba/ pra mo ka na/ bya brta ya hUM phaT/ badzra dza ra nan/ sarba byi ti nan/ sarba ro ga nan/ sarba gra ga bi ga nan/ sarba pra ko nan/ sarba pra mo ka na/ na sha yA na sha yA hUM phaT/ oM badzra bo d+hi tsit+ta/ ku sa ku sa/ ku ru sha ku ru so/ bA hri sen men yeM swA hA/ kro ta kro ta/ sarba dun tra nan/ ma tsi ra na/ ma ga na sha ya/ du sta tshe da ya/ pa kha yA/ na sha yA/ bi ri sha yA/ du sta staM pA yA/ mye ga sha yA/ ba ri sha ya/ tshe d+ha ya/ oM gad+ha haM/ sarba tsa la tsa la swA hA/ me ga snyan swA hA/ d+ha ra gri na/ oM ka lu me lu staM bA yA/ sha la bar shaM du sha ra bar shan tsa lu tsa'i swA hA/ pa ni tshe da yA/ pa ka yA/ bya brta yA/ na sha ya hUM phaT/ oM he he/ tiSh+ta tiSh+ta/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ni ru dra ni ru tra/ lhas byin mur tsa ya ni swA hA/ a sho ti tho/ hU lu hU lu ya tra por ni tho/ hU lu hU lu/ tre kha'i ba ma tsa yA/ hU lu hU lu swA hA/ oM gu ru ra tsakra bA ti/ si tu d+ha ra ra tsa haM/ sa bong bA khA/ tra mo ro la hUM/ ba ru ra ko bi la/ hi mgo la dza/ oM rog sog sod/ bya te pa tra sod/ rak+sha ti sod/ shan te kye ya sod/ gzhung dril gzhung dril sod// gsang sngags 'di rnams byin rlabs kyis// sdug bsngal gyis gnod gso bar byed// 'bru bcu pa/ pa pi shan+ti nA ga be sha sarba tsa li pa phe li pha/ nA ga tro ta na sha ya/ u ta tsa ya phaT/ pi pa yan+ti/ nA ga tre shad ma ra ya rbad/ beM ga li su tra ba sha a li dung dzi ti/ oM ka ri kha dza hi/ tha ga ri dza hi/ a ra tha ra tsa hi be sha/ ha ru ha ru ha ba sha ban+d+ha da hi na be sha ru mi ru mi be sha ya/ d+he kho ma hi ga ru ra/ kra ta ma ga nya na d+he bi b+hi sho/ gag shitha ti/ ban d+ha he ra/ ni bi sha na la kan+d+ha kan+d+ha hiM/ dzi ra 'u dza/ ba ra bi sha hi/ oM hi saM ha sa/ ka ling ha sa/ karma dzi/ ma hA d+he bi la srungs/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba ti ba le kha phur/ a tar phur/ bri phur sod/ mA ra ya mA ra ya sod/ la tsi

sod/ badzra pa ni pa ni sod/ hred d+h+re hred d+h+re sod/ ti ka dz+nyA na sod/ na ma du ru sod/ bu tsa yo gi ni sod swA hA/ oM braM ze lo na lo na/ thu na thu na/ ma snyad dang rgyab na ga d+ha ba hub/ ha bi lhab zangs ma/ rtsal gsum har ra rbe/ zhi na rang du zhi/ du na rang du du/ nad kyi phal tso/ oM ha ra ye phu/ pad+ma ha ti/ phu ra sar par nam nam/ bya shi byir shi/ b+h+yi ling b+h+yi ling/ shing phur phaT phaT swA hA/ oM ma tsa li/ mo tsa ye/ mak+Sha ya/ che ge mo dzi baM sa ra de swA hA/ oM ta ra ni/ ta ra ya mo yA/ mo k+Sha ni mo k+Sha che ge mo dzi baM pa ra de swA hA/ oM aM pa ra ni/ dzi baM ti ye swA hA/ oM kI li ki li na ya swA hA/ oM big shi big shi swA hA/ big shi big shi swA hA/ oM ha ra ha ra/ kha ra kha ra swA hA/ srid braM ze pa ma me pra ma sod/ gsang sngags 'di dag byin rlabs kyis// dgos 'dod rnams ni 'grub par byed// sarba saM po ka s+ye/ puSh+tiM ku ru/ pa shaM ku ru/ pa tra hri/ oM ka ma la ba si ni/ ka ma le ma hA la k+Shar dzo mo ti/ to pa ta re swA hA/ che ge mo a kar sha ya hri dza/ pa shaM ku ru hri/ oM sa bud+d+ha ri ni/ he hi d+ha d+ha pha ma swA hA/ oM be mo he/ hri da ya/ ma pa ta ni hUM phaT swA hA/ the tho ba sha ku na ta/ A rai yang mo sha nan/ a yu dz+nyA na yu/ tshe a ba na ya bruM swA hA/ kA ya wa kA tsit+ta gu na karma sarba sid+hi hUM/ gsang sngags 'di dag byin rlabs kyis// pra dang rmi lam 'grub par byed// oM na ma b+h+yi la tsan+d+ha ya/ de ba bu tra ya/ de ba bu tra ya/ tri sad de/ lo ga sa r+ye na/ pa ri gi ha ba te/ sad de na/ da ma ti ho/ lo ga sad haM/ ma ma sa na ta naM/ bud+d+ha sha dar ma sha saM ga sha gu sha gar/ a nen sang t+ya/ ba kye na k+Shi pra/ ma bi sha dar pu ni/ tad+ya thA/ oM sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ me ru nan/ ra pra ti ka sha a be sha ya/ a be sha ya/ ke la sha ku tra pra na ma/ oM yar mi bar te/ de ba na na ga li/ sta badzra a pa sha ya/ a be sha ya/ e sha ya/ oM na ma sarba ta nan/ saM myag saM bud+d+ha ki ni nam/ tad+ya tha/ oM tsa le tsu le tsan+d+ha/ ma hA d+h+ye d+h+ye/ sa ha ba ti ni/ ka ta ya ka ta ya swA hA/ gsang sngags 'di yi byin rlabs kyis// char pa 'bebs dang gcod par byed// ba ri shwa yA/ pa ta ya pa ta yA swA hA/ ba ra sha yA/ staM pa ya staM pa ya/ ba tra yi ni ba ga'i theb tho yu ba/ na ga na ga na ga ba ri sha ya/ ba ri sha yA/ pa ta ya pa ta ya swA hA/ gsang sngags 'di yi byin rlabs kyis/ bgegs gzir mnan sdom bcad bskrad byed// che ge mo aM gu sha dza/ dza hriM dun a/ hUM tri tri ma ra ya/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ ma hriM gu h+ya gAm ma rag sha dun tshe/ tsaN+Da li ma ra ya dza dza/ che ge mo staM pa ya nan/ sha truM a mu ka ku ru laM/ ma ma ar ni shan/ ya ma oM ni shan/ ya ma oM ni shan/ du ru rag ni shan/ tsakra kha raM sa sa sil/ shig shig nan/ phaT nan/ tad+ya thA/ ma ma trag rak+Sha/ ma ma tsa snying kha rag nan/ na ga na

ga naM phu staM pa ya nan/ badzra ra tri tri ya nan/ ra tsi trig shog baM rmugs/ ra tsa ku li/ tshu 'u thuM tshu 'u thuM swA hA/ kha ta kha ta/ ya ma tsan tri nan/ 'gong pa yang tri nan/ 'byung po nan/ rtsa dmar rtsa dmar nan/ me ru tse me ru tse nan/ badzra ta ra ya/ ma ra ya shi ti ki tri/ da ra ya sod ya/ pra la shan+tiM ni/ ya tu tri dzra nan/ ta na tri dza ya stam pa ya/ hUM badzra ma ra ya tri dza/ ma tri ya/ ma zhung tri yA/ ma zhung tri yA/ dza dza nan/ srin mo bi dza yA/ hUM hri tha ya/ b+hin+d+ha ya/ sarba g+ha g+ha ni/ shi ba shi ba na ni sa ra sa ra/ sa ra byi sa ra byi/ sa ra sarba duSh+tan nan/ byi ti ni sho sha na ni nan/ dang lam tri ya nan/ ma zhu ma zhu ya nan/ daM tri phri ma ra ya tra ma ra ya rbad/ U mu khaM duSh+tan big+nan/ sarba gra yo ga tra big+nan/ a gra ma ti tis+tha/ gats+tsha gats+tsha tra sha nan/ sarba gra ha big+nan/ u tsa tha hUM phaT/ gsang sngags 'di yi byin rlabs kyis// 'gal ba cham la 'debs par byed// oM he he ti sta ti sta/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha d+ha ra ya d+ha ra ya/ ni ru d+ha na ni ru d+ha ni/ lhas byin ur na ma ni swA hA/ hri tri mi tra tris sta/ ban+d+ha sid sta tas kar ram ha tha ma ban+d+ha la/ yo lam 'de se sad/ drug de sod/ dun tse sod/ bi paM sod/ zhing thun ri li ri la sod/ bi kyi ri pi kyi ri/ tig rig tig rig mon la ra zer/ zar ta ni zar ta ni phaT/ ma hA kro d+ha/ sarba ru ti na/ gra ha shaM g+haM/ dza la ya ya/ sarba ru tri ni/ i lan da ti/ ma tsa ra na/ gri ha ban d+ha ya/ na sha ya/ b+ha mi ku ru phaT/ a mu kaM sha truM b+hak+Sha na rak+sha/ lhas byin lu tsa ta ya hUM phaT/ lhas byin dang sngo sangs 'bid de sha ya hUM phaT/ lhas byin gyi tsag d+huM tsa la pa se li pa/ ngan sha ya hUM phaT/ lhas byin grih+na grih+na/ a kad ta ya/ a kad ta ya/ a ka ri sha ya hUM phaT/ ma hA kro d+ha lhas byin gyis/ de ba sarba pra be sha ya/ ha sa ya/ ha ha ya hUM phaT/ lhas byin a be sha ya/ a be sha yA/ pra yo sha hUM phaT/ bi pa yan ti da ra gi na/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/ badzra shi ka le/ b+han+d+ha ya/ mo ha ya ku ru hUM phaT/ ma ma sarba sha truM lhas byin gyis ma tsa me ha ha ha sa ma/ ma sa dzi ba pu kaM/ ro tri ra phri yaM b+hag ni/ ba ling i dam grih+na grih+na/ khA hi khA hi/ rak+ta pi ba to/ a ti kra ma sa ma ye swA hA/ a mu ka s+ye/ pi pa yan+ti/ a kar ri sha ya/ d+ha ra a gad d+ha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ mo ha ya mo ha yaM ku ru/ lhas byin d+ha ra kha ta phaT ta ya/ tshe ta ya mA ra ya/ tshin+d+ha ya/ lhas byin a kar+Sha ya/ gri na hA na ban+d+ha/ ta ta ya/ shi tra graM ha na ya/ dza la pa ya/ a be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya ma tsi ra na/ karma ku ru hUM phaT/ lhas byin mA ra ya/ shi raM staM pa ya/ ki ni mu ka staM pa ya/ hri da staM pa ya/ pa da staM pa ya/ ka la ye sta hUM phaT/ ma hA kro d+ha/ sarba ru tri na/ lhas byin la byi sha bya ti ro ga sarba/ A be sha ya/ A be sha ya/ ma tsa ra na/ karma ku ru hUM phaT/ lhas byin mA ra ya/ ki la ya ta hUM phaT/ sha rang gil ye te hUM

phaT/ ma ku ki la ye te hUM phaT/ pa taM ki la ye ta hUM phaT/ ma ma sarba sha truM a ma hi ham ki la ye ta hUM phaT/ a du khruM bruM/ rag sha phraM phraM sig ni mye/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ su ru me sa hUM phaT/ hab tshal shri g+hi gur sha du phroM te rgyab gzer nan/ a na yo ta ya/ da na pany+tsa yA/ a su ru/ a brag byi ta ma chuM hUM phaT/ a mu kaM dz+nyA na dza le ne/ da ha da ha na sha ye hUM phaT/ a mu ka s+ye/ badzra mud ha re na/ mud kha dan te na/ ha na ha na/ ta thA ya ta thA ya hUM phaT/ lhas byin da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa ba smyi ku ru hUM phaT/ sarba ru tri na/ ma tsa ri na/ lhas byin ka ya a yu/ dzi baM ta thA ya/ na sha hUM phaT/ mahA kro d+ha/ lhas byin dzi baM tshe da ya na sha ya hUM phaT/ lhas byin ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ bi ta ya/ staM pa ya staM pa ya/ oM laM hUM laM/ na ga sha shu pa rgya pa ki tsi te shu lu gus ta ra swA hA/ nA ga naM pu lhas byin tsit+ta shad shad/ sti sta rbad/ thuM ri li li/ nA ga gur li ma snying phrag pa mo rul// nA ga snying khrag baM rmugs nA ga badzra dam staM dza/ na ga nan/ nag hUM ya nan/ sri byi dur sha dza ha ha/ nA ga ri dung/ ha na ta dun sha thob/ nA ga phroM shi phob/ rmugs thibs ling shar phro phro du phroM/ dra thun sri sha phob/ a phri sha ha re phroM phro shar/ ma shi nA ga le hab sha nag po drag du phro/ du ya du ya dza sha ta ga ya ma phra du nan/ oM ga pi nag po/ tsi to tsi to/ rag tho rag tho/ bu lu bu lu/ du na du na/ rag sho rag sho ya rag sho yu ya/ rag kho yu/ si pa ya si pa ya/ phaT phaT/ phyi phyi hUM hUM phaT phaT/ shar shar b+h+yo/ trag rag mo dril shag rbad/ se ra hil shar/ oM sa ma ya b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu/ ma ma trag rag sha hril hril b+h+yo/ oM shu ke ra hUM la hUM shag hril b+h+yo/ oM ser khrag mu shum rngubs swA hA/ oM raM traM thun thun shag hril ri shar b+h+yo/ oM ya ma tsa raM hril shar raM raM/ oM nA ga hril sen shag pa dun/ sa ma ma hril b+h+yo/ kus ta star pa ku tsi/ te he rag sha dun tri ya thing thing/ pa ra ta tri da khong tri da ra da ra hUM phaT/ a ma ga la ni sman me ya/ dur ni mi ta sarba/ lhas byin la a be sha ya/ gsang sngags 'di rnams byin rlabs kyis// sdig bzhin las bzhin rgyun gcod cing// ngan song sbyong bar byed pa'i mchog/ sarba pA paM/ rma bar rna shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ na mo rad na tra yA ya/ kaM ka ni kang+ka ni/ ro tsa ni ro tsa ni/ tro ta ni tro ta ni/ tra sa ni tra sa ni sa ni/ pra ti ha na pra ti ha na/ sarba karma pa raM pa ra ne ye swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ sarba durga ti/ pa ri sho d+ha ni/ ra dza ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ a ra ha te/ saM myag saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ni/ sho d+ha ni/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni/ shud+d+he bi shud d+he sarba karma/ A pa ra Ni bi shud+d+he swA hA/ gsang sngags 'di rnams bstan pa yang/ las kyi dus su shes par bya// a mu ka s+ye/ sarba sha du nan/ sarba big+h+nan/ sarba badzra dza ra nan/ sarba bya ti nan/ sarba ro ga nan/ sarba bi sha nan/

sarba du tri mi ta na/ sarba ka laM ga le nan/ sarba pA paM karma parna nan/ shAn+tiM ku ru na ma swA hA/ a mu ka s+ye/ sarba gra ha bi ga nan/ sarba badzra rA dza nan/ sarba bya ti nan/ sarba ro ga nan/ sarba a maM ga le nan/ sarba pA paM karma ba ra nan/ ka ya byi te/ nan+te b+h+yo ba/ tshil li pha/ phe li pa/ a re sha ye hUM/ a mu ka s+ye/ su na s+ye/ shri s+ye/ te tsa s+ye/ a yu s+ye/ dzi baM s+ye/ sarba la s+ye/ sarba saM pa ka s+ye/ puSh+tiM ku ru hUM ma na swA hA/ a mu ka s+ye/ ka ya bA ka tsit+ta/ a yu s+ye/ dzi baM s+ye/ shi te tsa/ sarba rak+Sha rak+Sha/ a mu ka se/ pa ta yan+ti/ sarba gra hA bi ga nan/ a ka ri sha ya/ a mu ka s+ye/ d+ha ra ag da ta/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/ his ma ban+d+ha ku ru/ badzra shi ta kha le na/ b+han+d+ha ya/ ma hA ku ru/ pa shang ku ru haM ho/ a mu ka s+ye/ sarba gra hA big+h+nan/ ki la ya mi/ traM pa ya mi/ a d+ha ma hA pa shaM ku ru haM haM/ a mud ka re na/ mud kha dan de na/ tad+ya thA/ ha na bi tsi da tra/ pra ha re bya/ ha na ha na/ da ra/ khad ta/ phaT/ tshe d+ha ya/ mA ra ya/ a mu kaM/ ma hA kro d+ha dza la ne ne/ da ha da ha/ b+hasmi ku ru swa hUM phaT/ ba ra pa te/ na tshe d+ha ya/ man+t+ra tri ta ku/ kharta ni nan/ pra mo ku ru sta/ sarba pa la nan/ sarba te tsa nan/ bya ba ta hUM phaT/ a mu ka s+ye/ a gad+ha ya/ a ri shi ya/ pha Ta ya/ tsan d+ha ya staM pa ya hUM/ a mu kaM durta big+h+nan/ sarba gra ha big+h+nan/ sarba badzra ra gra yo ta big+h+nan/ a tra ma tri ti sh+ta/ gats+tsha gats+tsha/ tre sha nan/ sarba gra hA big+h+nan/ u tsa ta ya hUM phaT/ a mu kaM a tra pa ya/ gra ha big+h+nan/ ba la me la ka sarba bi po ta ya/ tro ta to ta/ sarba ru tri nan/ ma tsi ra na/ karma ku ru hUM phaT/ gri na ha sa ya/ ra tri nan/ dz+wa la pa sha/ A be sha ya/ tsan da pin ta ya/ kra na ha na/ swA hA pa ra smi/ badzra ma pa tsa ra ru/ ma smi pa shaM ku/ ma ma dz+nyA na ka ra/ a naM du sti/ ma mi ka ra yA/ phra pa pa ya/ pa ka du sta ka ta/ sarba pra mo ka/ na sha ya/ du sta ki ni/ pra ma ka na/ dur pi ti na/ a pa na yA/ a pa ro tse/ kri hri ta gri ha ga tsha/ sarba bud+d+ha/ sta na gri na/ ha na mi/ pa tsa pa tsa ra/ sa sti d+ha ya hUM phaT/ rtsa sngags bye brag gzungs sngags dang/ drag po la sogs bstan par bya// oM badzra pA ni hUM/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ oM nI laM ba ra d+ha badzra pA Ni hUM phaT/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na badzra pA Ni hUM phaT/ oM pusta spusta ma hA kro d+ha hUM/ sid d+hi sid d+hi/ s+pho Ta ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+taM du ga ha na/ da la pa tsa hUM phaT/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma tsan+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ oM tsaN+Da be ga d+ha re/ sa ra sa ra bi re/ tu tu tu mu le/ sa ma ya bi re/ hu ru hu ru hUM/ sti sta sti sta/ po ban na/ ge hen+t+ra/ pa sa ra du/ ma hA kro d+ha ra dza/ spu sta spu sta bi re bi re/ sa ra sa ra/ sa man+tu ni/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM badzra tsaN+Da li hUM/ oM badzra lA se hUM/ oM badzra mA le hUM/ oM badzra gIrti hUM/ oM badzra nri te a/ oM badzra d+hu pe hUM/

oM badzra puSh+pe traM/ oM badzra A lo ke hri/ oM badzra gan+d+he ho// oM badzra aM ku dza/ oM badzra pA sha hUM/ oM badzra s+pho tra baM/ oM badzra g+han+De ho/ oM big nan ta krita a mri ta kun+Da la ha na ha na hUM phaT/ na ma sa man+d+ha/ kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzra nan/ badzra kro d+ha ya/ ma hA daMSh+ta ya/ ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu sa la/ pa ri shud d+he/ ha sta ya/ oM a mri ta kun+Da la// kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gardza gardza/ pho Ta ya pho Ta ya/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+h+nan/ bi na ya ka nan/ ma hA ga na pa ti dzi bi ta nan ta ka rA ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ grih+na grih+na hUM/ grih+na pa ya grih+na pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga bAn/ bi d+ya rI dza hUM/ gsang sngags 'di yi byin rlabs kyis/ nyes pa ma lus dag cing byang// 'dod lha rtag dgyes dngos grub myur// oM badzra sa twa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra sa twa twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dri D+ho me b+ha ba/ su po sha yo me b+ha ba/ a nu ra g+to me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+hi me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me tsit+ta shre yaM ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho// b+ha ga bAn/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra ma me muny+tsa badzri b+ha ba/ ma hA sa ma ya satwa a/ yid bzhin nor bu rin cha? \u0f7ana la// bkur zhing mchod na 'dod dgu 'byung// ngas bshad gsang sngags zab mo la// brtan 'gyur byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// ces gsungs so// las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ phan gnod sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas mgon po nag pos gsol pa/ kye ho gsang bdag rdo rje bsnams// gal te sngags pa nang 'gras na// bzlog pa'i thabs ni bshad par zhu// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// ma hA ka la khyod nyon cig/ sngags pa nang 'gras 'byung ba'i tshe// de bzlog las kyi rim pa zhig/ nga yis khyod la bstan par bya// gru gsum mchod rten dbyibs 'dra la// phyi nang dur khrod sol bas byug/ sbrang rtsis sam ni grogs mkhar sa// gdug la 'phen pa'i ling ga bca'// ras sam shog shog shing shun la// khrag chen ming rus bzlog sngags br-i// snying khar phur te gru gsum gzhug/ rang nyid las mchog gsal byas la// thugs kar sa bon 'od zer gyis// gdug byed bkug bral gzugs la dbab// seng ldeng gdug shing sor bzhi la// rtsa ba'i sngags la lhas byin ngag/ rta pa ya mi 'am ldan byas

pas// smra byed dkyil du dbab par bya// rang nyid lhar gsal bzlog sngags zlos// gsum mam lnga 'am bdun du bskyal// dus bzhi tshe 'am rtag tu bya// gru gsum lcags khang sgo med nang// gdug byed gang yin gnas la dmigs// nus mthu rdugs nas rang rlags bsam// gzugs ma gru gsum pho brang ngam// sbal pa de stengs ri rab bskyed// de stengs pho brang gsal bar bya// bskal par thar pa'i dbang med bsam// khro rgyal chen po'i zhabs 'og tu// mkha' lding klu rgyal rigs bzhi'i klus// gang gnad klu dang gdug byed gzugs// klu rnams rim pa'i ling ga de// gnod pa'i klu gzugs gdug byed gzugs// yan lag bzhi la sngags gzer gdab// gzugs de thod pa'i ril por gzhug/ 'jigs byed chen po gsal byas la// nyungs kar dug khrag bsngags cing gdab// rims bzhin gzir zhing brlag par dmigs// gang gnod sa'am gnas phyogs mnan// nag po klu yi gtad zlog byed// mchod rten khru gang khong stong la// phyi nang dur khrod sol bas byug/ rab gnas byas la rten 'brel gdags// bag zan rgyu las ling ga bcas// rkang pa'i 'og tu ming gsal mnan// ming rus bris la snying khar gzhug/ phur gsum snying kha spyi bor gdab// rgya mdud phyir bzhag dbal rnams bstan// mchod rten nang 'og gzhug par bya// mchod rten 'gros kyis rtsal bskyed bya// gnan te lus na mgo phyir gnon// rnam par shes pa dgug gzhug bya// phur pa rang gzugs sngags rang bzlog/ mchod rten la brubs gsal bar bsam// nya stong la sogs rtag tu yang// chos gos mgo mjug bzlog bgos la// phyir bzlog bskor zhing sngags pa de'i// kho yi nus pa ci yod pa// chu yis me bsad bzhin du dmigs// mchod rten ling kha mi bstan sba// 'di slob mi bya rnal 'byor nang mi 'thab// gnam lcags yur mo brdung ba bzhin// gnyis ka chag pa'i nyen yod pas// be sbrel g.yang la gnyis ka lhung// yul med drag sngag 'dod na ngan pa ste// byang chub sems ldan rnams la 'tshe ba dang// rnal 'byor rang la brnyas na bzlog par bya// shin tu yul dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor sngags// mi mngon nor ngo grags ngor zlog byed na// ngan song glen lkug mtha' 'khob kla klor skye// 'jig rten 'di yang nyes skyon sna tshogs 'byung// de phyir kun gyi bzlog par bya ba min// zhes gsungs so// las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las// bzlog pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas mgon po nag pos gsol pa// kye ho gsang bdag rdo rje bsnams// dkar po'i phyogs la dga' ba la// bsrung ba'i las rim bshad par zhu// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// ma hA

kA la khyod nyon cig/ dkar po'i phyogs la dga' ba dang// sngos dang longs spyod bsrung ba zhig/ nga yis khyod la bstan par bya// sngags dang dam la gnas pa yi// grags 'dod med par phan sems bskyed// shog shog gro ga shing shun la// rdo rje gram 'khor lo'i dbus// oM phaT ming dang bsrung sngags bri// rwa bzhi tsan+d+ha la sogs brgyad// rwa rtse mu khyud zlum pos bskor// mtshams la rtse ming bsrung sngags bri// mu khyud bsrung ba'i bcol ba bri// maN+Dal mdzes ldan steng du bzhag/ tshogs bsags la sogs bskyed rim gsal// 'khor lo hUM las rdo rje'i sku// spyan drangs bstim la mchod sogs dbul// rtsa sngags ming dang bsrung sngags bzlas// bstod bshags bcol la smon lam gdab// 'khor lo lha yi rang bzhin te// brtags pas gnod byed bsrung pa'i mchog/ mi la byin rlabs srung byed pa// khrus byas bgegs bskrad lha ru bskyed// byin rlabs spyan drangs bstim mchod bzlas// bstod bshags las bcol smon lam gdab// 'khor lo brtags la'ang smon lam gdab// byin rlabs dbang bskur bstan par bya// yams nad bsrung 'dod 'di ltar bya// ga bur gla rtsi gu gul dang// gser dang shing kun mu si dang// shu thag bo nga sgog skya dang// bya rgod spos la sngags byas la// khyim pa lus gdags sna la bdug/ rdzas sngags sgrub na mchog tu 'gyur// gang rung gis kyang nus pa 'byin// na ga bsrung phyer 'di ltar bya// gla rtsi gu gul mu zi dang// btsan dug spyang dug bya rgod spos// sha chen thal chen a mr-i ta// ra thug lug thug ra khyi'i spu// ra dug thar nu re lcag pa// sgog skya lcum rtsa spru yi rtsa// rgya tshil du ba zon lham dag/ rtsa sngags las sngags 'brel bar gdab// lha bskyed mkha' lding spyi bor bskyed// rdzas phur lus bsrel dri yal spos// las la 'jug na ri ser dus// ngas bshad sbyor ba ldan gyur na// dug pa'i klus su tshugs mi 'gyur// phyugs gor bsrung phyir 'di ltar bya// bzlas pa rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// lung pa gol bar phyugs ded la// bgegs la glud byin bka' bsgo bya// 'khor rnams mchod la stong grogs bya// man+Dal legs byas bum pa bzhag/ bskyed rim rang lha bum pa bskyed// spyan drangs bstim mchod srung sngags bzlas// bstod bshags bden bdar bcol ba bya// gla rtsi shu thag shing kun dang// gu gul dkar nag mu zi gnag/ sgog skya sngags gdab phyugs la byug/ phyugs tshud skar ma sha ba dang// nam langs phyugs ma thon par// rtsa sngags las sngags spel bar gdab// phyugs la rdzas sngags dud pas bdug/ yungs kar gsang sngags bzlas la gdags// sngon mar bzlas bskor phur bus gdags// zhag ni bdun gnyis

bdun gsum bzlas// thob dkar bum chus phyugs la gtor// cis kyang tshugs pa med par bsam// spyang bsrung don du 'di ltar bya// sran chung sbyang tsheng yungs kar dang// byis sa dang ni spang rgyan dkar// de rnams sbyar la zhag bdun bzlas// nang nub sngags bzlas dus shes bya// rdzas phur rdzas de gnya' bar gdags// rgyab re bor nas slar yang bskyar// kyi la gsad par mi bya'o// ser ba srung phyir 'di ltar bya// gro ga shing shun shog shog la// rdo rje rgya gram 'khor lo bri// rab rtse mu khyud bskor bar bya// rwa stengs rtsa sngags bsrung sngags bri// mtshams su gcad sngags mu khyud bskor// rang dang 'khor lor 'dod lha bskyed// spyan drangs bstim la mchod pa dbul// srung ba'i sngags bzlas bstod bshags dang// bden bdar las bcol bka' bsgo bya// kham sa rin chen sna lnga bdar// par pu legs pa gnyis sbyar te// seng ldeng phur bu sor bzhi dang// gong gi 'khor lo 'ja' tshon 'brel// kham sa'i par pu'i nang du gzhug/ yungs kar gcod sngags bzlas la blugs// zhag gsum bar du bsnyen pa bskyel// de nas bar du kha sbyar te// ri yi rtse 'am 'ong sar khyer// de yang lha bskyed mchod bstod dbul// par pu de sba bdar bcol bya// ser ba'i 'go lo rgod pa na// long ba kun nas phyogs bzhir bya// par pu gzhal yas khang bsgoms pas// 'og tu srung yul chad par bsam// bde gshegs mang pos bsrung bar bsam// de nas ser ba gcad pa ni// rang nyid 'dod lha mchog tu bskyed// gong gi rten sar yang bskyed la// bdag gi sngags brjod 'od zer las// sprul pa grangs med dbyung nas ni// sprin gtor ser ba gcod par bsam// gcad sngags rtsa sngags mjug la gdags// yungs kar yungs nag thal chen gtor// gal te chod pa mi 'dra na// gla rtsi gu gul nag po dang// mu zi tshil chen bda' ngas bsre// me la sreg cing du ba btang// ngas bshad pa la ma 'gal na// yul khams rengs pa srung yang thub// sad bsrung 'dod na 'di ltar bya// sngon du bzlas pa tshad du bskyal// ri rtse khang thog gab med du// maN+Dal dang po'i lugs bzhin bya// dkyil du rin chen bum pa'i nang// chu sman la sogs blugs byas te// ting 'dzin lugs dang mthun par bsgom// spyan drangs mchod dang mchong gtor sbyin// bdar bcol byas te bzlas pa bya// rtsa sngags dag gis drang ngo bya// kham phor so ma btang ba'i nang// dur khrod thal bas sngags bzlas gtor// yul lha bdag sngags bzlas 'od 'phros// mkha' la sprin phung chags pa bsgom// bzlas pa khri phrag tshad du bya// gsad bgegs dag la phur bas gdab// de ni sngon du bya ba ni// sprin

bsdu ba mo sdom par byed// chu bsrung bya ba 'di lta ste// mchod rten legs pa khru gang la// khong stong 'khor lo ldan par bya// shog bu shing shun gro ga la// rdo rje rgya gram 'khor lo bri// lte bar rtsa sngags chu srung bri// mtshams su hUM bri mi khyud bskor// seng ldeng phur pa sor bzhi dang// 'khor lo 'ja' tshon 'brel byas te// mchod rten nang du gzhug par bya// de rnams byin gyis brlabs byas la// zhag gsum bar du bsnyen pa bskyal// de nas mchod rten chu rags ra// gsal bar byas te spyan drangs bstim// mchod gtor phul la bdar bcol bya// skyed mos tshal lam zhing dag gis// longs spyod la sogs bsrung bya na// byi ba sbrang bu srin bu dang// ri bong bya bye'u la sogs mang// bsrung ba'i don du 'di ltar bya// thal chen dang ni yungs kar gnyis// kham phor so ma btang bar blugs// sngags bzlas gnod pa'i sa ru gtor// byi ba sbrang bu la sogs pa// kha tham 'gyur bar byed pa yin// srin bu cha ga ba la sogs// gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur ro// rdo leb dag la sngags gzong gis// brkos te bris nas 'dug pa yi// ri dwags rnams sam gcan gzan gyi// grong ngam grong khyer gar 'dod par// mche ba 'ching bar byed pa yin// slar phyis na ni grol bar byed// rde'u la sogs bzlas gtor na// mche ba can rnams mche ba 'ching// khyim gyi rtsibs la legs byas par// thod lo skor la sngags bris la// sbrul rnams med par byed pa yin// mgul dang dpung par sngags btab nas// g.yul du zhugs nas mtshon gyis gcod// ga sha'i tha mar sngags mdud bya// gsang sngags mngon par dran byas nas// lam du chom rkun med par byed// yungs kar thal chen sngags bzlas gtor// thog bsrung thog ser kha char gcod// thal chen las sngags mgul la bcing// skyugs pa gcod par byed pa yin// mthe'u chung rtse mo'i sen mo'i gsum// skyigs bu byung na sdom par byed// ras la sngags bris sgo la gdags// shu ba la sogs byung ba gcod// grong khyer me shor bsrung bar bya// lha mchog ting 'dzin gsal byas la// me yi phyogs su kha bstan de// snyim par chu la lan bdun bzlas// gtor na khyim gang srung 'dod thub// me yis tshig gam me las thar// 'thab mo kha ngan rgya 'dre dang// gnod ltar 'jigs pa byung ba la// sngags bzlas de dag zhi bar 'gyur// chang zho za chus ni bsrung bya na// 'dod lha'i ting 'dzin ldan byas nas// phabs rde'u chu la byin rlabs bya// sngags pas gnod pa med par bsam// rdzas kyis yi dwags bsrung bya na// gu gul gla rtsi mu zi nag/ btsan dug spyang dug dro sog thal// ra thug thar nur re lcag pa// thal chen yungs kar rta

bon po// seng ldeng phur bu mi bsad mde'u// phag pa'i rna dang ze ba dang// tsa ri'i khab khrab zab snying zho// stag gi sder mo pho rog mchu// ya 'khyal skra dang zhab ma gnyis// gnod pas 'jigs pa'i lus la bsrel// yi dwags dbang shing mi gnas 'bros// sngags pa dam la gnas pa yis// bsrung ba'i sbyor ba gang brtsams pa// rgyal po'i 'khor dang nor rdzas bzhin// kun gyis mi gnod bde legs rgyas// zhes gsungs so// las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las// bsrung ba bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas mgon po nag pos gsol ba// kye ho gsang bdag rdo rje bsnams// sems can sdug bsngal gzir ba la// de dag gso ba'i las cig zhu// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// ma hA kA la khyod nyon cig/ gso bar bya ba'i rim pa zhig/ nga yis khyaud la bstan par bya// byis pa ma sos gso 'dod ni// ma btsas rum na yod gang du// zla gcig gong du sngags bsnyen bskyal// ma la byin rlabs bsrung ba bya// de nas byis pa btsas ma thag/ kham phor gsar pa legs pa'i nang// rtsa sngags srung sngags byis pa'i ming// dkar po'i rdzas kyis bris byas la// byin rlabs byas la sgo glegs gdags// sngon du bgegs bskrad sbyor ba bya// pha ma snying po zlos su gzhug/ gdug pa klu nad gso bya na// dang po klu gnod rmi lam 'byung// sbrul dang nya dang sbal lcong dang// rta nag po dang lug nag rmi// byis pa mdzes po rgan mo dang// sdig pa sdom dang tshangs pa dang// phung pa sbrang bu 'bu srin dang// nags tshal shing chu na rdzab dang// gzhan yang sprul pa sna tshogs rmi// de nas lus ni sha 'gul 'khrig/ shu ba srin dang thor bo dang// tsha dang sbrid dang sha ro dang// chu sgangs smra ser mi sos dang// bas blags sha bkra sha khol dang// rus sul na dang nyams stobs chung// snying 'phyo mi dga' ngu snying 'dod// 'phye sgur ngan 'khrungs gzhog skams 'ong// mdze yi nad kyang 'byur bar 'gyur// mdze la gso ru mi rung gnyis// zin sa rnam pa brgyad brgyad yod// skam mdze gsher mdze rnam pa gnyis// de ltar rnam pa bco brgyad do// de dag gso rung rnam pa brgyad// mkhur tshos skye mjing dpung mgo dang// tshigs bzhi nya shul rgyab sha na// mgo skra byi dang bol zin rnams// gso ru rung ba dang du blang// gso mi rung ba rnam pa brgyad// spyi gtsug smin mtshams sna rtse dang// snying lte mtshan ma mthe bong rnams// rnam smin zin pa rnam bzhi la// spyi gtsug rkang mthil smin mtshams snying// rnam smin ngas yang 'tsho mi srid// skam mdze zin pa'i mtshan nyid ni// chu ser rus ba la gnas pas// sha skam sha 'dar kha mig g.yo// yan lag skam la mig chu 'dzag/ gso dka' klu rnams

bden ma mthong// gal te gso na sngags sman no// gsher mdze dag gi rang bzhin no// lus kyi sha skrangs sha mdog rgod// lus kyi sha slo gso ba sla// klu yi gnod tshul gsum yod do// rgyu dang gnas bcings lus zhugs la// rgyu yi dus ni rnam pa bzhi// mtho dang kha rlangs bsam reg dug/ rgyal rigs mthong du zin gyur na// lus rnams thams cad lci zhing 'thibs// lus kyi sha 'bab mdze yun ring// ra ba bzhi dang bco lnga dang// nam gung nyin gung gnyis na na// rje rigs kha rlangs zin pa'i dug/ lus rnams thams cad bsil zhing grang// sha mdog skya bo sbob por 'ong// tshes grangs brgyad dang snga dro na'o// bram ze bsam dug zin gyur na// lus za sha dmar tshe yang thung// dgongs ka nyi ma rmas shing na'o// dmangs rigs dug tu zin gyur na// lus 'dar lus sha rnam par g.yo// sems rgod kha nas shus 'debs byed// dgongs ka'i grib so nub nas na'o// sngags dang sman sbyor mthun pas bcos// klu yi gnas su bla bcings pa// klu mchod glud rjes gcod bya'o// tshe dang bla dgug sbyor ba bya'o// lus la klu gnas mtshan nyid ni// lus ni glo ba brgyangs pa 'dra// lus kyi sha yang rnam par g.yo// mig rtsa shin tu dmar ba la// gdong pa mi la yang mi bzod// de la cho ga'i sbyor ba ni// sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs pa yis// maN+Dal mchod gtor bshams byas la// 'dod pa'i lha mchog mchod par bya// klu la mchod 'os gtor ma btang// de nas mtshams gcad sbyor ba bya// zangs sam 'khar ba'i gzhong pa ru// ra lug ba yi mngar gsum blug/ bag zan las byas klu gzugs btsal// zan la glang gi gzugs byas te// khong par rin chen sna lnga gzhug/ snying par klu yis snying po gzhug/ mgul tu rten 'brel snying po gdags// 'khar gzhong dbus su bzhag par bya// khrus bum byas shing yang dag gsar// nad pa'i lus la rdzas rnams gdags// bdag nyid ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// byabs shing thogs la lus kun khyab// sngags bzlas phyung la rten la bstim// rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng dag tu// klu gzugs stegs la gnod par bskyal// skabs su nad pa bum chus bkru// de nas thub dang mi thub brtag/ bzang rtags ngan zhing rlag pa 'byung// rtags ngan bzlas pa bskyar la bya// dad ldan brtson pas mi thub med// de rtags bzang ba byung na yang// rten sar gtor ma gzugs byas te// khru gang thur du brkos pa'i dong// zhal zhal legs mor byas pa'i nang// gtor ma gzugs byas blug par bya// klu rnams de ru gzhug par bsam// dga' mgur bde thob yid gnod gsal// g.yam pa rgya gram bris pa dang// 'byung ba bzhir bris

dong kha bcad// de stengs mkha' lding bskyed la bzhag/ nad pa dri chu gla rtsis byug/ bsrung ba'i rdzas gdags byin rlabs bya// bsil pa'i zas bza' sha chang nyal po spang// bshal btag a ru ra'i sman mar btang// mu zi seng ldeng ram nye ba'i// sman mar bza' zhing khrag ngan gdon// rje rigs chu yi dug la ni// tsha ba'i sman rten drod bag rten// rtag tu lha bsgom bzlas pa bar mi gcad// de ltar yang dang yang 'bad na// sngon gyi rnam smin ma gtogs pa// mi 'tsho ba yi dogs kyang med// des kyang zhi bar ma gyur na// khro bdag chen pos gsad par bya// 'brub khung nang du klu gzugs bya// phyung zhing bkug la gzugs la bstim// bcu pa'i rting la gsang sngags brtags// mi mthun rdzas tshogs kun gyis khrab// gang dag gnod pa rlag par bsam// de nas thub rtags byung ba dang// phur bus gdab cing mtshon gyis gtub// sbyin sreg gnan pa mang du bya// btsan dug gu gul gla rtsi dang// shu thag de rnams sna ru bdug/ nya dang ba glang mkhris pa dang// sha chen shing kun gla rtsi ltor// tsit+ta mu zi bya rgod spos// gu gul gla rtsi tshil chen byug/ srung ba'i rdzas rnams lus la srel// gtsor ni ting 'dzin bzlas pa gces// klu rnams rlag 'gyur tha tshom med// dug nad dag ni gso bya na// phya tshan gla rtsi ldum bu dang// zangs phye sbyar te gtang bar bya// dug nad kun la rdo rje bzhin// khyad par btsan dug dag la ni// ldum bu bil ba shu dag dang// rgya tsha hong len spang rgyan dkar// zhib btags khrag dang chur blugs te// mnyes la khong du gtang bar bya'o// dro gong tsam du bzhag byas la// gsad cing lus la rtags byung na// smon pa'i sman btang slon du gzhug/ ma skyar skyar na slon du bcad pas// rdo rje sngags kyis gdab par bya// chu la btab cing khong du btang// sgros yang lus la khyab par bya'o// lhog pa dag ni gso bya na// rdzas dang ting 'dzin sngags kyis gdab// me rlung lta bur bsreg cing gtor// sbrum ma gso phyir 'di ltar bya// sran ma nas dang mar khu la// mngon par sngags la byugs na bde bar btsal// bcings pa rnams la kha bltas la// grangs bdun bdun du bsngags pa'i chus// snyim pa bdun bdun dus gsum gtor// bcings pa rnams ni grol bar 'gyur// gro ga la ni gur kum dang// go ro tsa nas ming bris te// bcings pa'i spyi bor bzhag na grol// rtag tu bzlas na bcings las grol// 'dir yang lan bdun bsngags pa'i mar// mar khu mar byugs sbrum sder btsa'// lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i chu// snyim pa gsum gyis sbrum ma bde// btsa' mi 'dod pa bde bar btsa'// chang dang shin khung bu ram dang// gdung ma'i steng gi sa dud

rnams// skol te sngags bzlas sbrum ma la// ltor btang 'phral la bde bar btsa'// rtag tu bzlas na rang ngam gzhan// bcings pa las ni grol bar 'gyur// nad phran gso phyir 'di ltar bya// chu gtsang khrag 'thung shu ba sel// byang hung sngags byug shu ba med// gdungs pa dang ni 'brum bu dang// dom la sogs pa'i rma rnams la// yung nga spos dang a ru ra// sngags bzlas byugs na 'tsho bar 'gyur// sman la mngon par sngags bzlas nas// nad pas zos na nad rnams 'byin// mar la lan brgya sngags bzlas te// yan lag gang la byugs pa 'tsho// 'bru mar sngags byugs mgo gzer 'tsho// gdug pa'i rma la chu brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas/ bu mi 'tsho la khrus chus 'tsho// sgro chu gnyis kyis ling thog sel// lo mar sog sbubs so srin sel// sga dang ka ras cham pa sel// sbrang rtsi lcam pa mu zis mes tshig sel// dam la gnas
