pa'i sngags pa yis// snying rje'i sems kyis gso byas na// sman pa shin tu mkhas pa bzhin// sdug bsngal kun 'tsho bde skyid 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ gso bar bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas mgon po nag pos yang gsol ba/ kye ho gsang bdag rdo rje bsnams// longs spyod bsgrub la sogs pa yi// gzhan yang dgos 'dod bsgrub pa yi// rim pa bdag la bshad par zhu// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// ma hA kA la khyod nyon cig/ longs spyod dgos rim don bsgrub zhig/ nga yis khyod la legs par bstan// longs spyod nor bsgrub 'di ltar bya// sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang// maN+Dal bum pa legs par bsham// bskyed rim rang lha bum pa bskyed// spyan drangs bstim la mchod sogs dbul// rtsa sngags las sngags 'brel bar bzlas// longs spyod mngon sum bum ba'i nang// 'phel zhing rgyas nas dbang byed bsam// bstod byed bden bdar bcol ba bya// thon kar bum pas rang dbang bskur// longs spyod mchog rnams 'phel bar byed// yid 'ongs bu mo thob 'dod na// sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang// maN+Dal legs byas bskyed rim gsal// spyan drangs bstim la mchod pa 'bul// rtsa las sngags bzlas bdar bcol bya// mngon khugs rang dbang med par gsal// me tog 'bras bu spos la bstim// gtor sbyin lha rnams rab tu shis// smra byed sngags byed lham gos la// gtor ram phur ma byas la bzhag/ gzugs bcas dgug dang bstim pa bya// rang nyid dgongs phyogs skur bskyed de// chu yi dkyil du khrus byas nas// gsang sngags stong phrag bzhi brjod na// mngon par dga' ba'i bu mo thob// 'gro ba'i yid 'ong bya ba 'am// gang dag mi dag dga' 'dod na// bya gong nas su tho

rangs dus// lan gsum mngon par bsngags pa'i chus// kha gdong bkrus na 'gro kun dga'// pad+ma dkar po'i skud pa la// skar ma rgyal la bab dus su// brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas byas nas// de yi ming la bgo byas na// bud med kun gyi yid 'phrog byed// me tog kha 'bus tsan dan sbyar// rgyal dus brgya rtsa brgyad sngags na// dri yi thig le byas pa na// rgyal po mi dga' dga' bar byed// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas pa na// skye 'gro kun gyi yul dbang byed// 'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba gsum// mar dang bu ram sngar ltar btang// dpal med dpal skyed byed pa'i mchog/ tshe zad tshe nyams bsring 'dod na// mtshan ldan rin chen mdzes pa'i ga 'u ru// 'bru bcud snyingapo sman lnga blugs// zla rgyas kha bcad stegs su bzhag/ mda' dar me long btags la gzugs// traM las ga 'u rin chen nang// zla dkyil tshe yi snying po bsam// lha bskyed spyan drangs mchod bstod bya// rtsa sngags tshe snying 'brel par bzlas// sngags dang ye ge'i 'od zer las// lha mo bum chu grangs med pas// bde gshegs sku gsung thugs byin dang// lha dang mnyam pa la sogs pa'i// tshe bsdus ga 'ur gar dmigs// mnyam las khyad 'phags yi dam lha mchog gi/ sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa dpag med kyis// phyogs skyong sde brgyad bgegs tshogs thams cad kyi// tshe dang bla khugs mdzod ces zhib tu brjod// sprul pas tshe dang bla bkug nas// ga 'u'i nang dang lus la bstim// tshe bsten gu ru bstim par bya// lus sems tshe rgyas til gang zhing// tshe sba sems kyi dkyil du sba// zhag gsum lnga 'am zhag bdun sogs// dus su sbyar na tshe sring mchog/ mi gtsang nad dang sdug bsngal kun// bum chus bkru phyir 'di ltar bya// maN+Dal dris byugs mdzes ldan steng// rin chen mdzes ldan bum pa'i nang// byis pas blang ba'i chu gtsang dgang// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bcud ldan bya// kha rgyan mgul chings gzungs thag gdags// bum pa gzhal yas rgya mtshor bsam// zla dkyis a dkar sngags kyis bskor// rang lha bum lha gsal bar bskyed// spyan drangs bstim la mchod pa bya// rtsa sngags chod nyid rnam dag sngags// la sngags bzlas pas yig 'bru la// bzlas pa'i sngags kyi 'od zer gyis// ye shes chu rgyun 'bab cing 'dres// de nas bum lha bdud rtsir zhu// snod kyi rim pa shes par bya// ye shes lha mchog byin rlabs pa'i// chos nyid ye shes bdud rtsi'i chus// rigs kyi bu 'di khrus byas pas// mi gtsang nad dang sdug bsngal kun// skad cig mod la dag gyur cig/ mi gtsang ba dang nyes skyon kun// chu yis rdzas bkrus me bsad bzhin// reg pa tsam gyis 'dag par dmigs// zhag gsum

lnga 'am bdun du bya// dam tshig ldan pas dus bzhin bkru// nyes skyon ma lus dag byed mchog/ ci 'dod dngos grub bsgrub pa'i phyir// tshad ldan rin chen mdzes pa'i nang// dmar ser ba yi 'o ma mar// snying po sman lnga bcas pa blugs// traM las rin chen snod nang du// nyi stengs dpa' bo 'bru lnga bsam// lha bskyed spyan drangs mchod pa bya// rtsa sngags dngos grub 'dod sngags bzlas// yig 'bru lnga la 'od 'phros pas// bde gshegs kun gyi sku gsung thugs// yon tan 'phrin las ci 'dod rnams// bsdus nas rten la phab par bsam// ye shes lha mchog byin rlabs dngos grub can// mthu stobs byin rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pas// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las dag/ ci bsam dngos grub dus 'dir bdag la stsol// ces brjod rang 'dod dngos grub rnams// lha mchog mngon du byon nas byin par bsam// dngos grub rten du bzhag pa'i rdzas// khol lam lud dam rlangs pa 'am// 'od du 'bar na rang nyid kyis// yid gnyis med par longs spyod bya// ye shes chen po'i bdud rtsi des// ji ltar 'dod pa'i don kun 'grub// 'chi med mkha' la 'gro 'dug pa// sa 'dzul chu la mi 'bying dang// smra can mes mtshon mi gnod dang// rkang mgyogs mig gnon 'dod dgu 'grub// dam ldan rgyun du 'bad na 'grub pa 'byung// khyad par can gyi spyod yul las// kun gyi thun mong de ma yin// de phyir de bsgrub rab tu dka'// grub na yon tan brjod las 'das// lha gsal mchod sogs gzhung bzhin mchod// brtson ldan dam tshig ma nyams pas// gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnam pa bzhin// rgyal ba'i sku 'gyur thag mi ring// 'dir yang bsam pa sna tshogs 'grub// ces gsungs so// las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las// dgos 'dod bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas mgon pos yang gsol pa// kye ho gsang bdag rdo rje bsnams// pra rtags rmi lam nye ba yis// rim pa legs par bshad par zhu// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// ma hA kA la khyod nyon cig/ pra rtags rmi lam nye ba rnams// nga yis khyod la legs par bstan// lha'i bu legs ldan dri med zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten srung ba'i bden pa dang// yongs su bzung ba'i bden pa dang// 'jig rten chos ldan bden pa dang// bden pa'i tshig ni 'di dag gis// da lta nyid du mngon mthong shog/ rdo rje'i sngags kyang gdab par bya// bdag gis dgos pa'i bsam pa gang// bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don// dge dang mi dge gang yin pa// de nyid kho na nyid du smra// sa gnas shin tu gsang ba ru// nang pa sngar langs maN+Dal bya// bum btsugs mchod pa rgyas par bya// me long

la ni mngon par bzlas// khrus byas gtsang ma'i gos gyon la// tsan dan dkar pos yan lag byug/ dri zhim me tog 'phreng gis brgyan// khyim gyi chos kyis ma smin pa'i// shin tu legs bcas khye'u bu mo la// khrus byas phang mdun du bzhag/ bden mthong brjod na smra ba po// ji ltar bsam pa'i dgos pa rnams// mi slu rab tu rtogs par byed// dgongs ka dgos pa'i gos sbrugs te// maN+Dal byi dor byas nas ni// lha yi bu la mchod bya ste// brgya dang rtsa brgyad sngags bzlas nas// thub par nyal bar byas pa na// ji ltar bsam pa'i rmi lam rtogs// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas nas ni// 'jig rten gsum gyis spyod pa yi// dngos po'i gtam kun smra ba'o// sngon du brjod pa'i cho gas ni// me long ral gri chu snod la// gtam ni smra bar byed pa yin// 'phral du pra bran dbab 'dod na// byis pa gtsang ma mdun du bzhag/ mchod rten sku gzugs nyi zla 'am// me long me tog sems gtad bya// sngags gdab ci mthong gtam kun dri// la nye brtag par 'dod pa na// sngon du bden bdar dmod bcol bya// sngags dang nye ba'i rtags brtan par// bum sogs snod rnams gang ba dang// bkra shis rdzas dang sgra snyan dang// skyes bu bud med bza' dga' dang// bus pa snyan pa'i gtam smra dang// legs mthong sgo ston gus pa dang// de dag bzlog na ngan pa ste// bzang dang ngan pa'i rtags shes bya// bya rtags la nye'i rim pa yang// 'jig rten nang gi bya ba bzhin// som nyi med na nges par 'grub// yid gnyis can gyis 'grub mi 'gyur// de phyir yid ches nges par bskyed// rno mthong gzhan dga' rtogs par 'gyur// ces gsungs so// las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ pra rtags la nye'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas mgon po nag pos yang gsol pa// kye ho gsang bdag rdo rje bsnams// sems can kun la phan gdags phyir// char dbab las rim bshad par zhu// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// ma hA kA la khyod nyon cig/ char dbab las kyi rim pa ni// nga yis khyod la legs par bstan// bla gab med pa'i sa gnas su// sa la ma lhung ba yi lngas// maN+Dal rgya sor bcu drug la// rngams su sor bzhi legs byas la// pad+ma 'dab brgyad sgo ldan bri// rgyal po 'am ni bram ze'i rigs// thod pa dag bkru dri chus byug/ de la gur kum chu yis su// klu gzugs sbrul mgo bdun pa la// thal chen smad ni sbrul du 'khyil// bris la maN+Dal steng du bzhag/ gtor ma gtang la bden pa bdar// rang nyid khrus byas dris byugs te// ras gyon dam bsrung zhing lngar bskyed// thod par phu las klu brgyad bskyed// spyan drangs mchod bstod bcol ba bya// rtsa gcig gdab sngags yungs kar brdeg/ sngags bzlas 'od 'phros sprin du chags// de nas na ga mgo lnga pa// kha nas glog 'gyu char chen 'beb// klu rnams bka' nyan char chen 'bebs// gal te de dus ma phebs na// rang nyid gtum khro 'bar bar bskyed// sngags bzlas klu rnams 'jigs sreg dmigs// gu gul dud pas thod pa byab// des phebs gal te ma phebs na// zangs bu dreg pa brud pa dang// rtsa ra kham pa'i ril ma dang//

ri bong ril ma sngags la gtor// des ni nges par phebs par 'gyur// lhag par char chen gcod 'dod na// yungs dkar sbyin sreg thal chen la// bcad sngags bzlas gtor 'chad par 'gyur// sngags pa dam tshig snying rjer ldan// char dbab las ni gang brtsams kyang// rgyal po'i bka' la gus nyan cing// klu rnams bka' nyan char rgyun 'bebs// 'gro kun bde skyid rgyas pa smin// ces gsungs so// las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ char dbab cing bcad pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas mgon po nag pos yang gsol pa// kye ho gsang bdag rdo rje bsnams// sems can kun la gnod byed pa'i// bgegs rnams gzir dang mnan pa dang// rtab sdam 'grul bcad bskrad pa dang// bdag la legs par bshad pa zhu// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// ma hA kA la khyod nyon cig/ bgegs rnams bskrad cing gnan pa dang// rtab sdam 'grul thag bcad pa dang// bskrad par bya ba'i rim pa zhig/ nga yis khyod la legs par bshad// bgegs rnams gzir bar bya ba ni// bgegs ni chen po btab pa na// sngon du bgegs mchod bden pa bdar// de nas bsnyen pa rdzogs par bskyal// 'brub khung gru gsum gting du bru// nang ni dur khrod sol bas byug/ ra sogs grog mkhar sa la ni// gnod byed bgegs kyi ming gzugs bya// thod pa'i nang gzhug 'brub khung gzhug/ bkug bstim 'ja' tshon sna lnga dkri// bda' ngas skras cing g.yag rtsid gdags// tshigs ring phur pa dag gis gdab// rang nyid khro rgyal chen pa yi// sngags bzlas thun gyis brab par bya// thun rdzas yungs dkar yungs nag dang// dug chu rdo phye lcags zangs phye// skye tshe thal chen mi mthun tshogs// thun mtshams dag tu g.yam pa la// ri rab rdo rje rgya gram bri// kha bcad rdo rje dril bus mnan// sngags zlos dus su g.yam pa bsal// nad zhi rtags byung thod pa gzugs// mchod rten rgya gram dag mnan// gu gul btsan dug sha chen dang// gla rtsi khrog pa'i rtsa ba yis// nad pa'i lus la byug pa bya// des ni bgegs rnams zhi 'gyur ro// rdo rje 'dzin la bgegs gnas pa// mchod rten dbab par bya ba yin// bgegs kyi ming dang gzugs bcas pa// mchod rten zhabs su gzhug bya ste// bdag gi thugs las 'od 'phros pas// bde gshegs khro bo spyan drangs te// mchod rten dag la bstim pas su// mchod rten nag po 'od 'bar bsam// 'od zer yang 'phros bgegs bkug ste// mchod rten 'og tu gnas pa yis// de dag rmongs dang mnan gzir bsam// rnal 'byor pa dang dge 'dun dang// srog chags ku la 'tshe ba yi// ma rungs gnod cing bgegs byed

la// rtsa sngags las sngags bzlas bya zhing// bdar bcol bya zhing gnas su sba// bgegs rtab sdam par bya ba ni// rabs chad nag ba'i thod pa'i nang// rin chen sna lnga mngar gsum dang// me tog sna tshogs kha ru tsha// 'bru sna tshogs dang chang phud dang// sne'u rta sha sbrul gyi sha// btsan dug dang ni ra dug dang// thar nur de lcags thang phrom blugs// 'dre gdon gang gnod ming gzugs na// gro ga shog shog bris la gzhug/ ting 'dzin ldan pas dgug bstim bya// yungs dkar yungs nag ske tshe la// sngags bzlas thod pa'i nang du blugs// 'dre gdon gang gnod phyogs su mnan// bya mo nag po'i gsob sgong du// sha sna khrag sna snying sna dang// 'bru sna mngar sna chang phud dang// a mr-i ta la sogs pa blugs// gzugs bcas dgug pa bstim sngags bzlas te// byang shar mtho yi rtse la mnan// kham pa'i ga'u gru bzhi'i nang// sbrul lam sbal pa'i pags pa'i nang// dkar gsum mngar gsum 'bras chen dang// gro yos 'bru sna sna tshogs gsal// gzugs bcas dgug bstim tshon skud dkri// mkha' lding gzugs bzhin phyogs bzhir bzhag/ sngags bzlas gnod pa'i sa ru mnan// skyu ka'i gsob bam thod pa 'am// pho rog dag gi thod pa ru// sha khrag dmar dang 'bras yos 'bru// dar nag dril la thod pa gzhug/ gzugs bcas dgug bstim sngags bzlas te// nub byang mtshams su gnan pa bya// rta dang mdzo yi thod pa'i nang// gu gul sran ma'i me tog dang// ra dug spyang dug nang du gsal// 'bru sna brgyad la gzugs byas la// snying khar e dbyibs gru gsum bya// de nang mi yi snying khrag la// rta snying glo ba dang bcas pa/ yungs kar yungs nag ske tshe dang// dgug bstim sngags bzlas gnod sar mnan// 'ug pa bya 'tshal thod pa ru// khrag sna 'bru sna 'bru mar dang// le brgan dar dmar dug khrag blugs// gzugs bca' dgug bstim sngags bzlas la// de nyid gnas pa'i brag rtsar mnan// kham pa'i slu gu nag po'i nang// nyungs nag rgya tshil 'bab chu blugs// gzugs bcas dgug bstim sngags bzlas la// re'u rul zhig gam chu gling mnan// ngang pa'i sgo nga'am thod pa ru// 'bru sna mngar dang chang phud dang// gu gul mu zi rgya tshil blugs// gzugs bca' sngags bzlas gnod sar mnan// g.yag ru g.yas pa'i nang du ni// sha khrag sha rul spyang dug dang// gu gul mu zi gzugs bcas gsal// dgug bstim sngags bzlas gnod sar mnan// bsen mo srid pa'i 'dre mo dang// chu dri la sogs rta bsdam na// lag bsnyal slu gu'i nang du ni// skyi ba sne 'u'i bu ram dang// tha rams yungs nag skye tshe dang// gu gul zi ra nag po la// gzugs nag

ral pa can cig bya// gang gnod ming bris snying khar phur// dgug bstim sngags bzlas zam sna 'am// rgya gram lam du mnan pa bya// bzlas pa khri yi tshad du bya// rta las gnyan zhing do med pas// gang yang 'dir ni ma 'da' brjod// bgegs ni rgyu 'grul gcad par bya// zhing sas gzugs bris dgug bstim bya// seng ldeng mchog phur byin rlabs bya// sngags bzlas btab na rgyu 'grul 'chad// bgegs bskrad pa ru bya ba ni// rang nyid khro bdag chen por bskyed// bgegs kyi snying khar mnan par bsam// thugs las khro ba'i sprin bkye ba'i// bgegs rnams thams cad bkug par bsam// hUM las ri rab gnan par bya// lce la hUM gi 'phro 'du yis// rdo rje nag po sbu gu can// de nas 'od zer me 'dra 'byung// gang gnod sar btab bsreg par bsam// 'od zer rlung 'dra byung ba yis// thams cad gtor bar bsam par bya// rdo rje gsor ba'i 'od 'phros pas// rdo rje phra mo grangs med byung// bsgrub bya'i spyi gtsug rkang mthil 'bigs// sku las khro bo grangs med byung// ba spu'i bu gar khrag 'jibs bsam// sku las me byung sreg par bsam// thal mo drag por brdab sngags brjod// thams cad dngangs shing rgyal bar bsam// ting 'dzin phyal bar mi btang zhing// sngags la mi tshig sel mi 'jug/ dper na dngul chu brub pa bzhin// ma nyams drag tu brjod par bya// gnod byed dag la gdon byung na// dper na srin po'i ngur skad bzhin// tshig mi gsal bar don gsal bar// yid brtan drag tu bzlas pa bya// zhes gsungs so// las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ bgegs bskrad pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas mgon po nag pos yang gsol pa/ kye ho gsang bdag rdo rje bsnams// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig pa dang// dkon mchog dbu 'phangs smod pa dang// 'gal byed cham la ji ltar dbab// rim pa bdag la bshad par zhu// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// ma hA kA la khyod nyon cig/ 'gal byed cham la dbab pa yi// rim pa de dag ma lus pa// nga yis khyod la legs par bshad// gzhan dag bdag la zhal che 'dzugs// rje mkhan lag pa bskrus pa la// lug thug dag gi gzugs byas la// gro ga ras sam shog shog la// rdo rje rgya gram 'khor lo bri// yung ba'am ni ldong ros la// lce bar ming bris spra tshil phur// lug gi snying khar bcug byas la// bkug bstim sngags kyis gdab par bya// khro dang zhal mche 'dzugs pa yi// kha sdom rmongs par byed pa yin// yang na grog mkhar sa la gzugs// byas te sngags ni snying khar gzhug/ lce la tsher ma bdun po gdab// phur pa btab ste mngag gyur na// kha ni bsdam par gyur pa

yi// yang na kham por dag la ni// thod lo skor gyis sngags ming bri// thal bas bkang la kha sprad na// ngan pa smra ba kha bsdams 'gyur// dpung gnan ba ni 'di ltar bya// dur khrod dag gi ro ras la// sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram bri// sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus lte la// sngags dang pha rol dmag dpon la// dpa' bo rnams kyi ming bri'o// sna tshogs rdo rje'i pha rol tu// yi ge laM brgyad bri bar bya// de ltar bris la gnyis byas la// sa yi dkyil 'khor la yang bri// gong gi gnyis po kha sbyar la// tshogs kyi bdag po'i gzugs byas te// gsum po gong gi 'khor lor gzhug/ rabs chad nag po'i thod par gzhug/ pha rol sde yi so mtshams gnan// yang na dur khrod dag tu sba// bkug bstim gsang sngags 'bum phrag gcig/ sngon du bzlas par bya ba yin// grog mkhar sa la gzugs byas la// rkang mthil dag tu sngags bcug nas// lam gyi bzhi mdor sba bar bya// 'gro dang 'ong ba sdom par byed// thal bar bsngags las gtor byas nas// gzhan gyis 'tshe ba zlog byed pa// slar phyung nas ni phur mi byed// sbrum ma dag ni bsdam bya na// dur khrod ras la rgya gram bri// lte ba dag la sngags ming bri// sbrang rtsis dril te thod par gzhug/ bkug bstim sngags bzlas dur khrod sba// des ni sbrum sdom par byed// slar phyung 'o mas bkrus byas nas// chu la bkrus na grol bar 'gyur// mi rgod 'jigs pa bcing bya na// sngon du bcings pa 'bum tsho bzlas// de nas mi rgod 'ong 'dod na// lag pa g.yas pa rgya mtshor bzlas// byung nam the bong chad par bcang// ma btang bar du bcings par 'gyur// brnyas byed zhing la rngan byed na// rdza ma che chung ci 'byor du// rta chu bul tog bya ba lam// ti tsha mu zi nag po dang// lan tshwa nag tshur zhib byas la// ldum bu'i dus su ci 'dod gzugs// zho chu than pa'i dus su bya// rta chu ma 'byor zil pa'o// yang na ske tshe shang tse la'o// yungs nag dug mo nyungs dang ni// rtan par zhib mor brdungs gtums la// sngags bzlas zhing la drud par bya// glang ma'i byang bu'i ya rtags dang// bdag gi rkang pa la brtags te// zhing la drud cig sngags bzlas te// bye ma'i sa bon gdab par bya// rtsangs dang rjes la gzugs gsum bya// ting 'dzin gsal byas bkug bstim la// sngags dang las sngags brab par bya// gzugs gcig ra bal gyis// dkris la e yi nang du gzhug/ gcig la tshe btsugs gyo mar sngo// thal ba 'bab chu dag la bskur// gcig la skye ka'i sgro btsugs te// chu la bskur la khus gdab bo// nya gsum nam phyed dag la bya// 'gal byed dag gi khyim sgyel na// rgya gram 'khor lo'i dbus dag tu// 'bru bcu'i sngags dang las sngags bri// sa nag

bag zan gti mug gzugs// 'khor lo sbra tshil 'bur byas te// dur ra bdag gi thod par gsal// bya rog tshang sbur dur khrod me// bsregs dang yungs kar bsngags shing blugs// lha bskyed mchod gtor dbul byas la// rtsa sngags las sngags btags la bzlas// gru gsum dbus su bsgrub bya dgug/ 'bum tshogs khyer la sbe'u rmang gzhug/ du ra dag gis bsgyel bar bsam// mchod pa bya zhing chos gos brdab// zhag gam zla ba lo dus su// ngas bshad pa la the tshom med// 'gal byed yul las dbyung 'dod na// sbrang rtsis gzugs byas thod par gzhug/ rang nyid gsang bdag bskyed byas te// sngags las sngags brtags la bzlas// sngags kyi 'od zer dag gis su// kha bskrad gzhan du 'khyams par bsam// bzlas pa sum 'bum dag tu bya// rtags ma byung bar gnas su sba// pho mo gnyis ni dbye 'dod na// gro ga ras sam shing shun la// rdo rje rgya gram 'khor lo bri// lte bar rtsa sngags ming dang sngags// bris te rta dang ma he'i ltor// phur te de nyid e nang gzhug/ lhar bskyed rtsa sngags ming dang sngags// 'od zer dud pa 'dra ba yis// lus sems 'khrugs par bsam par bya// thun gyis brab cing bzlas pa bya// 'gal byed lus dang dbral 'dod na// gsad pa'i maN+Dal dbus dag tu// sbrang rtsi ling ga sor bzhi'i tshad// ci 'dra dbang po dod par bya// rang nyid lhar bskyed dgug bstim bya// sngo dmar skud pas phur dang sbrel// rtsa sngags las sngags bzlas pa bya// tsher ma bsngags shing mig la gzugs// sngon du mig dbang phyung par bsam// bzlas pa 'bum phrag tshad du bya// de nas ling ka thod par gzhug/ byang lha'i phug tu mnan par bya// yang na grog po phugs rdugs su// gnan te rgya gram la sogs bcad// 'gal byed bsgral bar bya 'dod na// sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs par bskyal// dkyil 'khor chag chag brdab byas la// khru gang tshad du thig gdab cing// rdo rje rgya gram pad+ma bri// lte bar e dbyibs mdzub gang bru// rtse mo lho ru bstan par bya// nang ni dur khrod sol bas byug/ gru bzhi'i phyi rol dmar por bya'o// pad+mar rdo rje sngon por bya// sbrang rtsi'i rtsigs mas gzugs su bya// dmar chen ming rus snying khar phur// sngo dmar skud pas phur pa sbrel// gzugs ni ga gon e yi nang// rang nyid khro rgyal skur bskyed de// 'gal byed bkug nas phral byas la// gzugs dang gnyis med bstim par bya// sna tshogs gtor ma bzung zhing bstim// gsad pa'i sngags bzlas yungs kar brab// dgra rtags byung nas las la sbyar// lcags phye zangs phye rdo phye dang// yungs kar yungs nag skye tshe dang// khrag dang dug ni sna tshogs dang// rab chad thod

par bcug ste brab// phur pas gnas lnga dag tu gdab// phyi dro thun mtshams phur ba yis// snying khar btab la rgya gram bcad// slar log gsang sngags la sogs pa// rtags ni ma byung bar du brdeg/ tshad ldan rtsang gis bsur bar bya// gdug cing tshad ldan mda' gzhu la// sa brus ldan gros rgyus bcas brdeg/ drag pos ral gri rnon pos gtub// mi rkang rta rkang g.yas pas brdung// gtor ma blugs la sbyin sreg bya// sbyin sreg thal ba de dag ni// rlung chu rgya gram skor gnan bya// sngags dang ling ga gzugs bcas pa// gtsug lag khang gi them 'og gnan// des ni 'gal byed rlag par 'gyur// 'gal byed cham la dbab don du// nA ga'i las kyis gsad bya na// sngon du lha bsnyen rdzogs pa yis// gsad pa'i 'brub khung e dbyibs la// phyir rol dur khrod sol bas byug/ gu gul ka la'i ga gon nang// sbrang rtsis gzugs brnyan legs byas te// rgya gram lte bar rtsa sngags dang// ming la sngags dang bcas pa bri// snying khar phur te ga gon nang// rtse med mtho gang tshad la gdags// de nyid e la bsgrub par bya// dung ngam 'khar ba kham phor du// ba ra lug gi dkar gsum dang// mngar gsum la sogs nA ga yis// mthun rdzas la sogs blug par bya// rtsa sngags las sngags bcas shing 'dra// de la rtag tu las la sbyar// rtsa sngags las dang bcas shing brjod// yungs kar bsngags shing gzug la brab// ting 'dzin 'di dag bar mi bcad// rtags byung nA ga'i gnyan sar nan// klu mchod rdzas ni ga gon nang// blugs la phyi rol rtsi sman byug/ 'ja' tshon sna lnga'i tshon skud bcing// chu mig khru gang mar bcal ba'i// brus la ga gon de ru gzhug/ rtse med mtho gang tshad la gdags// rgya gram kha bcad bdar bcol bya// ting 'dzin gnyis dang ldan byas la// lus la khrus byas rma bya gzugs// zung mo byi thur phrag la gzugs// dri ma mi btang gzugs mi brtan// phyi mig ma blta gzungs sngags brjod// bsrung rdzas lus la bsel bar bya// de ni 'gal byed cham la 'debs// brnyas byed cham la 'bebs par byed// nA ga'i las cig yang ngas bshad// ru sbal gzugs gnyis lto sprad de// shog gu 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri// phu brgyad phu'i nang ming rus bri// gong gi sbal pa'i lto bar gzhug/ phu las sbrul mgo bdun pa bskyed// kham phor kha bcad nang bcug la// lcags zangs rdo phye bsngags shing brab// de tad gong ma bzhin du bya// nA ga'i las shing yang ngas bshad// byi la phag pa'i mjug sbu la// ra rgya khri rgya'i snying khrag sbu// 'gal byed rjes dang bsres byas te// lag mthil dril te sngags bzlas so// nyin zhag gcig la dus drug tu// stong dang rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad

bzlas// de nas nyi ma nub ka ru// ra nag ming rus yang rtags gzhug/ mi mi mthong ba'i chu mig dngor// sbas la gu gul thul du 'gro'o// myur du med na blar yang bskyar// lan gsum bskyar na 'brub par nges// ngas bshad pa la the tshom med// rang bsrung ba ni sngar bshad bzhin// dam tshig kun yang de dus bsrung// nan ltar bstan la 'jig nges na// na ga dag la thabs 'dis bstan// klus khyer ba yi ga gon nang// 'gal byed dri chu dri chen dang// rjes dang chab mal la sogs dang// gu gul khyi lud klus khyer sha// ra lug gi dpre bda' ngas bsre// sbal pa sbrul dang ba glang sha// lan tsha ske tshe yungs nag rnams// 'gal byed rnams kyi ming rus dang// spra ba skam po'i nang phur te// gong gi ga gon nang du gzhug/ nA ga yi gnas su khyer la// phra na mes srog dam par sba// dgra bo 'di yis nyes so byas// byang du bris la zla bzhag bya// rang gi bsrung ba gong bzhin bya// dbyar dus yin na ser ba 'bab// 'di yis rgyal khams sreg byed pas// kA la khyod kyis gsad par gyis// 'gal ba cham la dbab don du// hab sha nag po yang bkol te// thog dang ser ba dbab par bya'o// yungs kar yungs nag til nag dang// dri bo'i khrag dang sha chen dang// ra dug re lcag spyang tsher dang// dur gyi sol ba nya sbrul dang// btsan dug yul gyi rdzings sa dang// yul gyi lo thog snga sngo ngang// yul gyi ming dang dgra bo'i ming// gu gu ka la'i thod par blugs// ske tshe skra nas sngags bsku ba// rang nyid gsang bdag ting 'dzin gyis// gnyid dang g.yal dang sbrid pa dang// 'brug glog ser ba rang gnas 'ong// eg rtse rgyas gdab zhabs mas dril// chu mig kha thur bstan la sba// klu rnams skad ngan 'don par nges// brgya phrag tshad du bzlas pa bya// 'bab sa'i chu mig nyid du sba// ban d+ha dum bu bzhi pa yis// sngags bzlas kha ni sbub par bya// myur du thog ser drag po 'ong// phebs na phur bton rtsis sman gso// 'gal ba cham la dbab don du// gza' mchog bsgol te thog ser dbab// sbrul dang zer mong rta nag glang// mi yi 'o ma bag phye rnams// thod pa bre bo dag tu blugs// khral du rnams la bsngags shing brub// de nas rtags dang sbyar ba dang// ri lu sran ma rgyas gdab bya// mjug tu gar 'dod zor tu 'phang// de dag sngags ni sgo sgor bya// mdzub mo hUM las ra hu la// ka ra bi ra'i rgyal ba g.yas// phyag g.yon tri shul rtse gsum thogs// thog ser drag po 'bebs par byed// 'gal ba cham la dbab don du// lo thog dag la sad dbab na// shog bu rgyal gram dbus yul ming// sngags dang bcas bris sbrang rtsis phur// thod par gsal te gru gsum

gzhug/ gla rtsi rdo dreg yungs kar la// rtsa sngags dang bcas bsngags shing blugs// rtags byung thod pa dar du dril// nya sprin dag la sprin byas dgra'i// phyogs su 'phang zhing thod pa sba// sad ser phebs la the tshom med// 'gal ba dag ni gdul don du// da du ra dang pha la ta ka dang// 'bras dang bcas la kho yi ling kha bcas// thod par gsal de gru gsum nang// bskyed bstim rtsa sngags btang rtags bzlas// bdar bcol bya zhing ting 'dzin phebs par bsam// dgra khyim dag tu cho 'phrul 'od kyang 'ong// zhes gsungs so// las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ 'gal ba cham la dbab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// mgon po nag pos yang gsol pa// kye ho gsang bdag rdo rje bsnams// bsnyen bsgrub las la sbyar ba yi// ting 'dzin bya thabs dang// rtags rnams ji ltar 'byung ba yi// rim pa bdag la bstan par zhu// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// ma hA kA la khyod nyon cig/ ting 'dzin bya ba'i rim pa zhig/ nga yis khyod la legs par bshad// spyan drangs dus kyi ting 'dzin ni// sngon gyi dam tshig dbang gis su// 'khor bcas byon nas bzhugs par bsam// me tog la sogs mchod pa'i tshogs// mkha' dang mnyam pa dmigs byas te// sku dang spyan dang shangs byugs dang// phyag ma zhal du dbul bar bsam// gtor ma bdud rtsi rgya mtsho dang// ljags kyi 'od zer drangs par bsam// bdag gi snying po brjod pa yi// thugs ka'i sa bon 'phro 'du las// lha mchog mnyes nas thugs dam bskul// sgrib byang dngos grub gsol bar bsam// bsgrub pa'i dus kyi ting 'dzin yang// bdag gi sngags las 'od 'phros pas// rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng bzhag nas// lcags kyu zhags pas bkug par bsam// 'khor rnams kyi 'ang bkug par bsam// sngags brjod 'od zer kha sbyor phye// lha kun gcig kyang mi gnas sam// gu gul la sogs dud pas 'dug/ sngags brjod 'od zer dag gis su// ling ga dag la gnyis med bstim// de nyid de ru gsal bar bsam// sngags kyi 'od zer kho bcings te// lcags sgrog bcings nas 'gros thabs med// bdag gi dbang du byas par bsam// 'ja' tshon lcags sgrog bsam te dkri// gtor ma de nyid 'gal byed kyi// klad pa sgal tshigs mchin rgyu ma// sha khrag rus par bcas pa rnams// 'khor dang bcas pas gsol bar bsam// 'gal bar byed pa de dag ni// mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs pas// lus ngag tshe srog rdul bzhin rlag/ gsad nas gong bzhin gsol bar bsam// gsad pa'i sngags dag brjod pa yis// shes pa mar me 'dra ba la// rlung dus lta bus gsad par bsam// nye

bsnyen dus su 'ong tshur bsam// thun sngags brjod pa'i 'od zer gyis// dug ni na bun nad rims bzhin// lha dang pho nyas phab par bsam// phur pa hUM las zhal zur gsum// kho yi snying khar btab byas na// kho yi snying kha dag na ni// tshe srog 'od dkar til 'bru tsam// de la lhan gyis thebs pa yis// phur pa la 'dus phyung byas te// 'od de bdag la thim par bya// kho ni 'od med ro gdong bzhin// de ltar bsam la gnas lngar gdab// hUM hUM 'phro 'dus rtsangs mda' bsam// rtsa gnad don snying phur par bsam// ha yi 'phro 'dus ral gri bsam// tshe srog lus rnams gtubs par bsam// muM gyi 'phro 'dus tho chen bsam// lus kun rdul phran rlag par bsam// spyin sreg lha bskyed pa yi zhal// dgra bsod thal ba rlags par bsam// kho yi tshe srog rdul rlag nas// rlung gis ma lus khyer bar bsam// chus kyang de bzhin shes par bya// kho bcings ri rab 'og tu mnan// steng du pho brang btab byas pas// bskal pa'i bar du mi thar bsam// gzhan dag nus mthu skyed pa tsam// gsad pa'i ting 'dzin bya thabs las// kA la khyod kyis nan tan gyis// grub pa'i rmi rtags ngas bshad bya// bsnyen pa'i dus su 'di ltar bya// sku gzugs la sogs mthong ba dang// a tsa ra dang mon pa dang// slon dpon ban de btsun pa dang// mi chen gtso bo skya bshar dang// grub pa'i rtags su ngas bshad do// bsgrub pa'i dus kyi rtags dag ni// dgra bo dngos su gsol ba dang// gcan gzan ri dwags gsod ba dang// bya bye gsod cing rmi ba dang// rta nag ra lug gsod pa dang// de rnams khrid nas 'ong ba dang// kA la khyod kyis las la sbyor// spyi rtags bzang ngan bstan pa ni// gzhan dang phrad de rgyab pa dang// nad sos btson las thar pa dang// gcan gzan thar las bcings grol dang// gyen du 'gro zhing 'dzeg pa dang// bka' la rtags dang mang pos bkur// rgyal por gyur nas bskos 'debs dang// ral gri la sogs rnyed pa dang// rin chen nor bu thu ba dang// grong khyer nyi ma shar ba dang// glu dbyangs snyan po thos len dang// rgyan gyis lus la brgyan pa dang// dkar gsum yid 'ong zas za dang// yid dga' rnams ni bza' ba'i rtags// nyi ma nub nas sa sros dang// thur la 'bab cing rmi ba dang// na dang btson bzung khur bkur dang// sbrid de gzhan dag rgyal ba dang// gcan gzan ri dgas gnod byed dang// rta phra g.yag glang rdung ba dang// rang yul 'das nas 'gro ba dang// mi mdzes lus la 'dags pa dang// mi dga' yul sar 'dug pa dang// 'dam du chu dang chus khyer dang// gnas khang zhig nas chus khyer dang// me yis tshig dang

yid mi dga'// de ni rmi rtags ngan pa yin// gzhan yang rmi rtags bzang ngan rnams// kA la khyod kyis rtags dang sbyor// zhes gsungs so// las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ bsnyen bsgrub dus kyi ting nge 'dzin dang rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o//// de nas mgon po nag pos yang gsol pa// kye ma gsang bdag rdo rje bsnams// drag po'i las rnams bya ba yi// thebs dang ldog pa'i dus chod dang// gdam ngag nan tan bstan par zhu// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// ma hA kA la khyod nyon cig/ thebs ldog gdam ngag nan tan rnams// nga yis khyod la legs par bshad// dpyid zla ra ba'i tshes bcu bzhi// 'bring po'i bcu drug tha chungs kyi// nyi shu gnyis la thebs par bshad// dbyar zla ra ba'i tshes brgyad dang// 'bring po'i nya la thebs pa'i dus// tha chungs la ni las mi bya// ston zla ra ba'i nya gsum dang// 'bring po'i bcu drug gnam stong bar// tha chungs brgyad nas stong gi bar// thebs pa'i dus su shes par bya// dgun zla ra ba'i bcu gsum nas// bcu drug dag gi bar du dang// 'bring po'i nyi shu gnyis nas su// gnam stong dag gi bar du dang// tha chung nyi shu dgu la thebs// dpyid zla ra ba'i bcu bdun dang// bcu dgu 'bring po'i tshes gcig dang// nyi shu brgyad dang tha chungs kyi// gnam stong bzlog pa'i dus yin no// dbyar zla ra ba'i gnyis dang lnga// 'bring po'i tshes drug tha chungs kyi// tshes bcu gcig na bzlog pa'i dus// ston zla ra ba'i nyi shu lnga// 'bring po nyi shu gsum dang ni// tha chungs nyi shu gnyis la bzlog/ dgun zla ra ba'i tshes bco brgyad// 'bring po'i nyi shu tha chungs kyi// nyi shu bdun la bzlog pa'i dus// sngags pa'i skyon kun de las byung// khyad par klu la gtad pa yang// thebs dang bzlog dang 'khyam pa'o// de la thebs pa'i dus bstan pa// dpyid zla tha chungs nyi shu lnga// dbyar zla ra ba'i tshes brgyad dang// bco brgyad dag la thebs pa'o// 'bring po nyi shu gnyis dang ni// dbyar zla'i nyi shu lnga la thebs// ston zla ra ba'i bcu dgu la// 'bring po bco lnga tha chungs kyi// tshes gcig bcu gcig nyi shu gcig/ dgun zla ra ba'i bco brgyad la// 'bring po'i bcu bdun nyi shu la// thebs pa'i dus de gtad par bya'o// dpyid zla ra ba'i bco lnga dang// 'bring po'i brgyad dang nyi shu bzlog/ dbyar zla ra ba'i nyi shu dang// 'bring po'i bco lnga tha chungs kyi// bcu gcig bzlog pa'i dus yin no// ston zla ra ba'i bco lnga dang// 'bring po drug dang tha chungs kyi// tshes dgu bcu dgu bzlog pa'i dus// dgun zla ra ba'i tshes bcu dang// 'bring po'i drug dang nyi shu drug/ ldog dus yin pas spang par bya'o// dbyar zla 'bring po'i tshes brgyad dang// dgun zla

'bring po'i tshes brgyad dang// dgun zla tha chungs tshes brgyad pa'o// phan gnod med pas las mi bya// dbab pa'i dus ni brgyad yod de// klu dang srin du tshogs pa'i bu// gdug byed ming sring lnga ru byung// de yang shes can khros pa nas// gdug byed bsgral nas mgo lus dang// yan lag dbang po mju mar phral// ri rab phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhir gnas// de las sprul pa'i gza' brgyad yin// de yang mgo lus sprul pa ni// bya tri pa tra bya ba ste// bya rog mgo brtsegs bya bar brtags// lag g.yas drang song ra hu la// mig stong mche ba snying gsum pa'i// sprul pa sgra gcan 'dzin du btags// lag g.yon du ba mjug rings btags// dpung g.yas khyab 'jug chen po yin// mjug ma byi nu ra tsas bya// chu so tsa ra ka kha zhes bya// dpung g.yon ljang sngon drag pos bya// de ltar brgyad ni dus brgyad rgyu// tshes bzhi mchod la lnga la dbab// tshes grangs lnga yi sod dag la// dpung pa g.yas pa ma mor sprul// nub nas shar du rgyu bar byed// ling ka shar du bzhag nas kyang// ma mo'i drag sngags nub nas brdeg/ ma mo'i las rnams grub pa'i rtags// sprin yang kham nag 'phang stod nas// 'khrug cing ser ba dum bur 'ong// tshub na chen po g.yo bar byed// brgyad mchod dgu la dbab snga dro// lag g.yas dgra bla'i rgyal mor sprul// shar lho mtshams nas nub byang rgyud// ling ga byang nub mtshams su bzhag/ drag sngags shar lho mtshams nas brdeg/ de yi grub rtags bstan pa ni// nam mkha' mtha' skya dpal sengs nas// sprin yang lug gi lto tshil 'dra// ser ba nya mig 'od du 'ong// thog dang ser ba myur du 'bab// bcu gcig mchod la bcu gnyis dbab// nam 'jing chu so bdud du sprul// byang nas lho ru rgyu bar byed// ling ga lho ru bzhag nas ni// drag sngags byang nas brdeg par bya// de yi grub rtags bstan pa ni// sprin yang shing lo gzhibs pa 'dra// mthing nag sems can gzugs su snang// ser ba ngam nag zur gsum dbyibs// drag tu 'bab cing 'tshub ma ldan// bco lnga ki kang mchod byas la// bcu drug ki kang dbab par bya// tshes grangs bcu drug nyin phyed na// mgo bo srin por sprul byas nas// lho nub mtshams nas byang shar rgyu// ling ga byang shar bzhag nas ni// srin po'i drag sngags lho nub bzlas// bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// sprin yang kham nag gud du 'khyil// g.yag dang mdung shing bshar bar 'dra// rlung dmar thog dang ser ba yis// rtsa dmar thog gnag mchong zhing 'ong// bco brgyad mchod pa bcu dgu dbab// tshes grangs bcu dgu nam phyed nas// mjug ma dmu bdud chen por sprul// shar nas nub tu rgyu

bar byed// ling ga nub tu bzhag nas ni// shar nas dmu yi sngags kyis brdeg/ sprin yang phying pa brgyangs pa 'dra// nam nag nam mkha' 'khrug cing btud// ser ba gong gsum 'phyong bya zhing// bya 'phur 'dra zhing gong gsum 'phyong// nyi shu gnyis mchod gsum la dbab// nyi shu gsum gyi snur chen la// lag pa g.yon pa gshin rjer sprul// nub byang mtshams nas shar lhor rgyu// ling ga shar lhor bzhag nas ni// gshin rje'i drag sngags nub byang nas// sprin yang dmar nag hral hral po// sems can sna tshogs gzugs su snang// tshub nag drag por bcas nas 'ong// nyi shu lnga mchod drug la dbab// nyi shu drug gi tho rangs kha// skya rengs dang po shar tsam na// dpung g.yas klu btsan dgra blar sprul// lho nas byang du rgyu bar byed// ling ga byang du bzhag nas ni// klu btsan drag sngags lho nas brdeg/ sprin yang char skye dril ba 'dra// rlung dang 'dres pa'i ser ba 'ong// spra tshigs dril ba bzhin du 'ong// nyi shu dgu mchod stong la dbab// gnam stong nyi ma bsnur chung la// mig dang che ba snying dang gsum// byi na ya gar sprul byas nas// byang shar mtshams nas lho nub rgyu// ling ga lho nub mtshams su gzhag/ drag sngags byang shar mtshams nas brdeg/ sprin ni dud kha mgo bo che// lhag par bar snang kun bkang nas// khrug cing thog ser myur du 'bab// 'brug sgra drag pos stong khams khengs// drag po'i las rnams bya ba yang// dpa' bos nos thob sran che bas// sngar btsam bar chod 'byung ba'i rgyu// yi dam brtan rdzogs bya ba las// ma rtogs don med yid 'byung rgyu// gdeng dang ldan pa bya ba las// gdeng med tom bcol rang rlag 'gyur// brtan pas 'jig na bya ba las// phan tshun ngan song ltung ba'i rgyu// zhes gsungs so// las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ thebs ldog gdam ngag gi le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o//// de nas mgon pos yang gsol pa// kye ma gsang bdag rdo rje bsnams// tshe 'phos 'das pa'i sems can dag/ sgrib sbyang bde la ji ltar dgod// de don bdag la bstan par zhu// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal ba// ma hA kA la khyod nyon cig/ khyod kyi dris pa de legs so// tshe 'phos 'das pa'i sems can dag/ sgrib sbyang bde dgod rim pa zhig/ nga yis khyod la legs pa bshad// yid dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu// maN+Dal lugs bzhin byas nas kyang// rin chen bum pa bcud ldan bzhag/ ku sha dag la tshe 'das gzugs// legs byas bzhin bsgyur rgyan btags te// ming rus skyabs gsol bris pa dag/ de yi snying khar glan par bya// las sgrib rgyun gcod spyi bor gdags// lte bar ngan song sbyong byed gdags// lho phyogs maN+Dal steng du bzhag/ de

yi mdun gyi maN+Dal steng// mtho gang tshad la gzhu yi dbyibs// sor ra'i bur stod sor re brtsigs// de la tshon dgye yang ni bra// chag gam tshad ldan hom khum gzugs// de nas dkyil 'khor lugs bzhin bskyed// bum pa'i nang yang gsang bdag bskyed// spyan drangs bstim la mchod pa dbul// thugs kha'i sa bon 'od zer gyis// tshe 'das bkug la gshed bgegs bskrad// gzugs la bstim la gzungs thag gdags// dkyil 'khor 'jug rim tshul bzhin bya// bzlas pa'i 'phro 'dus bskul sdig sregs// bstod bshags bden stobs smon lam btab// rgyun gcod ngan song sbyong byed bzlas// mthun mjug hom khung me sbar te// hUM zhe sdang 'joms mdzad bcom ldan gos sngon rdo rje bsnams// ye shes 'bar ba'i me yi dkyil 'khor 'dir// las dang tshe med nyams pa'i sems can 'di// zhe sdang snar sems sdig sgrib bsreg tu gsol// de skad tshul mthun zhib tu brjod// mar dkar til dkar bsreg byas la// sngags rnams kun gyis bsreg par bya// dug sogs sa bon bsreg byas pas// de dag skye rgyud chad par bsam// bde stobs mthun pa'i smon lam gdab// de nas bum lha 'od du zhu// hUM/ ngan song sbyong mdzad bcom ldan rdo rje bsnams// ye shes chu rgyun mi dge dag byed 'dis// las dang tshe zad 'das pa'i sems can 'di// mi dge'i sdig sgrib ma lus dag gyur cig/ sngags kun bzlas shing bum chus bkru// sgrib pa dag bsam smon lam gdab// de ltar yang dang yang byas nas// de dag lha ru bskyed byas la// 'tsham pa'i dbang bskur byin rlabs nas// bzlas pa sgrib byang dngos grub stsol// bden pa'i stobs brjod smon lam gdab// 'jug bum lha yi thugs kar bstim// 'og min gnas su gshegs su gsol// phung po 'das bcas rnam pa de// bsreg sbyang byas te mchos rdzas kyis// bde gshegs 'khor dang bcas pa mchod// de nas phung po sreg 'dod na// dri zhim chu yis bkrus byas te// yi ge bkod pa rtsa gzugs mtshungs// shes pa bkug la gshed bgegs bskrad// rol la bstim ste lhar bskyed la// shing khang bde gshegs pho brang du// bcug la sbyin sreg lugs bzhin bya// gong gi rtsa gzugs de yang bsreg/ rus pa btus te sku gdungs gdab// de ni sdig sgrib byang par 'gyur// bde thob nges par ngas bshad do// zhes gsungs so// las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ tshe 'das pa sgrib pa sbyang zhing bde ba dgod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//// de nas mgon po nag pos yang gsol pa// kye ma gsang bdag rdo rje bsnams// 'khor ba bral nas bde thob pa'i// de thabs gang la brten par bgyi// rim pa bdag la bstan

par zhu// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// ma hA ka la khyod nyon cig/ khyod kyis de dris mchog tu legs// sngon du ngas bshad rim pa rnams// gang dag dad bskyed zhen bzlog nas// bde la bkod pa'i don du bshad// de yang 'khor bral bde thob cig/ nga yis khyod la legs par bshad// sems kyi rang bzhin ma shes na// cis kyang mya ngan 'das mi thob// shes kyang ma bsgoms ma bsgrub na// des kyang thob par ngas mi bshad// de ltar sems kyi mtshan nyid ni// 'khor 'das rtag chad kun gyi bdag/ nam mkha'i rin chen rgya mtsho bzhin// sna tshogs snang yang sems nyid snang// sna tshogs 'dus kyang sems su 'dus// thams cad pa yi sngon rol tu// mtha' yas brjod kyis mi lang ba'i// rang byung ye shes rdo rje shar// bdal khyab chen po chos kyi sku// phyogs ris med pa byang chub sems// yin min dgag dang sgrub tu med// sems nyid kyi ni dngos gzhi la// phyogs sam rigs sam 'di kho nar// nga 'am rgyal ba kun mi brjod// ming du btags chags 'dzin pa rnams// dngos der bden pa'i gtan tshigs med// de phyir de ni bden ma yin// sems nyid sna tshogs bdag nyid de// rang bzhin gcig tu ma nges pas// sems can bsam pa tha dad pas// gang goms bag chags mthu rtas pas// ji ltas bstas bzung de ltar gnas// dngos po brtan par yod ma yin// sems nyid yul 'drar snang ba las// logs su chad pa gang yang med// rmi lam sgyu ma mig yor bzhin// de dag bden par grub med par// thams cad sems las byung bas na// sems de kun shes kun rab mchog/ de ltar gang gis ma rtogs pas// sems nyid ye nas sangs rgyas te// rang la yod kyang ngo ma shes// bden pa mthong yang ngo ma shes// dbul po'i nor dang gyad nor bzhin// rtog pas bsgribs pas don ma mthong// rgya mtsho'i rnyog ma ji bzhin no// ma rig rang byung rang nyid bsgrubs// srin bu'i kha chu ji bzhin du// zhen rtogs rang byung rang nyid bcings// ma rig zhen rtog zhen dbang gis// thog ma med nas khams gsum 'khor// 'gro drug bde 'bral sdug bsngal myong// bden pa'i don med rtog par yengs// de las ldog par bya don du// 'jig rten zhen pa'i snying po ni// ting 'dzin mchog gis zhi bar byed// mu nag dag dang ci bzhin du// mi gnas rang dag byed pa'i mchog/ blo yi rtsal 'phangs khyad par gyis// rim dang rdzogs par ngas su bshad// yid dang mthun pa'i sa phyogs su// dgos pa'i gnyen 'brel thag pa gcad// bsod nams tshogs sogs 'dod par bya// maN+Dal la sogs mdzes par bya// yid rten mdun gzhag sems rten bzung// rim dang

gzugs brnyan rang du snang// yang dang yang du goms par bya// de nas bskyed rim ji bzhin du// rang bskyed mdun yang de bzhin te// spyan drangs bstim la mchod pa bya// me tog la sogs mchod gtor dang// gzhan yang sman dang shing tog sogs// bza' btung bca' mur 'jig ldag 'drar// yid 'ong sna tshogs btud byas te// bsreg sbyangs byin rlabs byas pa ste// lha mo'i tshogs kyis lha la mchod// rnal 'byor longs spyod lhag pa yis// gnod sbyin mkha' 'gro la sogs la// 'bangs kyi tshul du sbyin par bya'o// de ku rang sems cho 'phrul yin// bzlas dang gshegs sogs smon lam gdab// sku ni 'ja' tshon tshul bsgom te// brag cha'i tshul bsgoms bzlas 'od 'phros// zhen rtog med par rang gsal bya// de ltar rgyun du 'bad pas ni// mtshan rtags rmi lam drod rtags 'byung// skyon yon mtshan ma ci byung yang// dga' drod mtshan ma'i re dogs gcod// sems kyi cho 'phrul yin pas na// mnyam nyid snyoms par rang zhir gzhag/ de ltar 'bad pa'i 'bras bu ni// sgrib sbyang tshogs rdzogs 'bras bu 'grub// rigs 'dzin sa la gnas nas kyang// mngon shes 'char la cho 'phrul ston// las mthar rdo rje 'chang chen dang// mnyam 'gyur de la the tshom med// sna tshogs sgron nas rim klog pa// blo chung rnams ni khrid pa'i thabs// byis pa brid thabs bstan pa 'dra// drod rtags zhen pa'i dngos po rnams// seng ge'i khog pa rang 'jig ltar// stong nyid rang gis ma shis na// gzhan gyis gzhig par mi nus so// tshig tu yang dag don brjod kyang// ma bsgoms don thob ngas mi bshad// blo chung rtog pa nyi tshe bsgoms// rig sngags log par bsgrub pa yin// bde 'dod sdig par sogs pa'i rgyu// gang dag mi blo yul med pa// rtogs chen yin par ngas su bshad// gang yang 'du shes 'jug byed na// 'bras bu bde 'byung ngas mi bshad// gang bsgoms 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang// yul sems yod med gang yang ma grub pas// cir yang mi bsam blo rten mi 'char bar// lus sems mi rngam khong glod bde ba ru// gsal la mi rtog til mar rgya mtsho bzhin// sems ni de ltar zhen pa med par bzhag/ skyon yon mtshan pa ci byung yang// re dang dogs pa'i sems med par// rang sems yin pas mnyam snyoms bzhag/ bying rgod sprod dang skyo ba med// mnyam par dag las langs pa'i tshe// gzugs snang sgra ru grag sogs pa// gzugs brnyan brag cha la sogs rtag/ zhen med dge ba sna tshogs bya// de ltar yang dag gang goms pa// mtshan rtags rmi lam drod rtags 'byung// dga' brod mi bya brtson par 'bad// des ni bde ba smin pa ru// ngas

bshad pa la the tshom med// mi rtog gsal ba mtha' yas pa// ma bkag rang dag phyogs gzhan med// cir sna cir grags cir bsam kyang// rang byung ye shes rdo rjer shar// de don gsal bar ma zhen par// brjod med blo la rgyun du bsgom// de don kun gyi rtogs par dka'// don de rtogs nas bsgoms nas ni// nga 'am bde gshegs kun dang mnyam// yon tan sna tshogs de la 'char// khyung dang seng ge'i phrug gu bzhin// lus po rgyal ba'i skur gyur te// dpag bsam shing dang rin chen bzhin// 'gro drug cis 'dul dam chos ston// zhes gsungs so// las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ 'khor ba dang bral nas bde ba thob pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o//// de nas mgon po nag pos yang gsol pa// kye ma gsang bdag rdo rje bsnams// zhal nas gsungs pa'i bstan pa de// gang zag ji lta bu la bstan// de don bdag la bstan par zhu// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// ma hA ka la khyod nyon cig/ kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyi gzugs can// rdo rje 'chang chen ngo bo las// 'dul ba'i don phyir sems dpa'i tshul// phyag na rdo rje mthu stobs bdag/ nga yis bshad pa'i bstan pa 'di// ma hA ka la khyod la gtad// nga yis bstan pa zab mo 'di// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' dang// rgya mtsho rin chen nyi ma bzhin// nyes bral legs pa'i ngo bor gnas// bde gshegs kun gyi rgyud 'chog yin// bde gshegs rgyal ba gang la yang// 'di las bstan pa lhag pa med// nga yis bstan pa'i nying khu 'di// ma hA ka la khyod nyon la// blo yis the tshom med par spyod// log lta ser sna med pa dang// sdig bstod dge la smad pa dang// spu zhag dad pa chung ba dang// g.yeng ba grags 'dod rang phyogs can// tshe 'di'i ched byed tsam la brdar// theg dman dam med gzhung la gol// de la bstan par ma byed cig/ de lam las su log pa dang// rang ched mi byed dkon mchog ched// 'di don mi byed byang chub don// skyon med yon tan bstan pa la// ka la khyod kyis ci dga' bar// gdam ngag nan tan gyis te ston// nga yis de skad bshad pa rnams// ka la khyod kyis tshul bzhin sgrubs// ci 'dod 'bras bu 'byung ba ru// ngas bshad pa la the tshom med// ces gsungs so// de nas mgon po nag pos dpal gsang ba'i bdag po la bstod pa 'dis bstod do// lcang lo can gyi pho brang nas// gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje bsnams// sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa po// dbang bskur mchog la phyag 'tshal bstod// gdug cing gtum la brjid bag ldan// sna tshogs las rnams mdzad pa'o// thogs med yid bzhin nor bu'i sku// rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal

bstod// ji ltar bsam pa'i dngos po kun// khyod las byung bas mi zad gter// sna tshogs yid bzhin 'phrul po che// gsang ba'i bdag po phyag 'tshal bstod// nad dang rims kyi gshed po mdzad// dgra dang bgegs kyi gnyen po mdzad// nor dang rdzas kyi bdag po mdzad// 'jigs pa skyob mdzad khyod la bstod// dpa' bo khyod kyi yon tan tshad med las// shin tu phra ba'i tshul can bdag bstod na// bdag gi mngon sum dmigs nas khyod bstod pas// bar chad dgra bgegs bcom nas bde thob shog/ ces bstod nas mi snang bar gyur to// phyag na rdo rje las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa ste tha ma'o//// gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje gtum po'i las rgya mtsho'i bsgrub pa'i rgyud ces pa rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ badzra pA Ni tsaN+Da kro d+ha mu la ma hA tan+tA nA ma// bod skad du// phyag na rdo rje gtum po khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po zhes bya ba// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad 'byung ba'i yum btsun mo'i yum btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs te/ de nas gnod sbyin bye ba phrag bcu dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na drag cing gtum po'i rigs ji snyed pa thams cad dang thabs gcig go/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das drag po rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//// yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das drag po chen po/ gtum po lus bskal pa'i me chen po ltar 'bar ba// srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba// nyi ma stong gi gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas stong rtsa brgyad la dbang sgyur zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bor gnas pa/ thugs rje'i stobs gyis khros pas sems can skrag par byed cing sdug bsngal dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ lha rnams skrag cing gnod sbyin rnams 'dar cum cum khol du khol ba/ 'og klu gnyan sa bdag la khros pas de rnams snying 'gas shing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yo zhing kun tu 'khrug pa/

bar bdud dang lha ma srin la khros pas de kun kyang brgyal log log skad 'don zhing zhabs la phyag byed pa/ a la la zhes pa'i sgra sgrog pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams na ma rungs pa thams cad kyi mig 'drul zhing dbang du sdud pa/ khro bo chen po'i cha byad du bzhugs so// de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ dpal dgon po nag po 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma hA ka la de/ rang gi stan las langs nas bskor ba lan gsum byas/ phyi nang gsang gsum gyi mchod pas yang dag par mchod nas// de nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ des pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// kye ma bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang// gtum po khros pa zhe sdang 'joms// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med can// rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal stod// gang zhig rnal 'byor sgrub pa yis// sngags dang lha ni mchod pa'i tshogs// dbang dang dam tshig phan btags pa// tshar gcad pa ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan khro bos bka' stsal pa// legs so dpal ldan mgon po khyod// legs par nyon la yid la zung// yi ge gnyis kyi sbyor byed pas// lnga ldan gdags par shes par gyis// rigs lnga gtum po ye shes can// lha yi 'khor lo bsgom par bya// phyi nang gsang ba mchod pa'i mchog/ smin byed bsrung dang phan pa'i sems// tshar bcad pa ni khyod kyis gyis// phyag na rdo rje gtum po khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas ma hA ka la yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// bcom ldan rdo rje khro bo yis// sngags kyi bye brag bshad du gsol// bcom ldan khro bos bka' stsal pa// a li ka la'i sbyor ba yis// sku gsum yon tan 'phrin las lnga// rab tu grags pas rnam par bshad// oM badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ oM ni lam ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra pA ni hUM/ badzra ro Sha na ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+taM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ oM badzra pA Ni sa maN+ta karma rag sha tsit+ta badzra nA ga sa ma ya ta hUM phaT/ rigs lnga gtum po gsang sngags der// rim pa yis ni shes par gyis// de la gdags pa'i drag sngags ni// sbyor ba yang dag bshad par bya// oM ha a k+ShaM sod sngom na ri tha rbod/ za pu raM rbad/ muM rig muM ma ra ya shig/ sog tshig na Na rbad/ lus rul la nA gA ma ra ya phaT/ raM raM dz+wa la dz+wa la shig shig ma ra ya/ rdul bung rbad sod/ oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tan krig nan/ e hur thums dza mA ra ya rbad/ nA ga tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ yak+Sha tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad// ru kri tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ ra tsa tsit+ta ma ra ya rbad/ rag sha tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ tsa ra tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ haM shaM tsit+ta ma ra ya rbad/ badzra

sa du tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ mus mun tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ ma ma ri tsi tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ oM nyi ma sad la nan/ klad pa nan tsit+ta gu li nan/ ku la shig tsi tra mu tra bzlog byer// a mo ka shig a mo ka bzlog/ a mo ka mgo la nan/ che ge mo tsit+ta mA ra ya hUM phaT/ gdug pa rnam gsum gsad bya ba/ thog mar shes dang gtso la sbyar// dregs pa bcu ni 'dul byed pa// gong ltar mthun dang par pa bzung// bsrung zhing zlog par byed pa ni// 'dres kyi tha mar shes par bya// gzhan yang sngags kyi sbyor ba ni// 'di ltar nga yis bstan par bya// oM na ma tsaN+Da badzra pA ni ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ya/ sarba sha truM/ oM ag+ne ye dz+wa la raM/ shAn+ti ku ru ye swA hA/ puSh+tiM ku ru ye swA hA/ pa shang ku ru ye swA hA/ ma ra ku ru ye swA hA/ me lha'i cho ga rdzogs byas la// de yi gzhal yas drag po ru// bcom ldan cho ga legs pa yis// thun sngags drag las kun la sbyor// oM ag+ne ye su r+ya/ na ga phu me sa tra/ nA ga rak+Sha tshal raM/ mA ra ya phaT rbad/ oM nA ga sa kra phu me/ nA ga rag sha rak+ta/ mA ra ya phaT/ oM kI li kI la ya/ nAg sa kra/ phu me rak+Sha/ sarba big+nan baM hUM phaT/ oM bi sha ru ru// nA ga sa kri/ phu me rak+Sha/ tsa ra ma ra ya phaT rbad/ a mo ka ma ya phaT rbad raM raM/ gang gnod klu yi rigs lnga la// rab tu 'bar ba'i khro gtum gyis// khro bo lnga dang sngags 'di sbyar// gsad cing gtsar bcad pa ru 'o// oM nA ga rA dza b+han dur mA ra ya/ nA ga thuM ril ril/ nyogs nyogs rbad/ nA ga ma ra ya phaT/ oM nA ga na ya trig naN/ nA ga du duM ma ra ya dz+wa la rbad/ di ri di ri/ phung phung sod/ oM ru ti mA ra ya/ thuM thuM shig shig/ rbad rbad/ oM ma ti ya nA ga/ mA ra ya thuM ril/ zhung zhung myog/ oM nA ga trig naN/ du du rbad/ pu ra sod/ ma ra ya phaT/ bcom ldan khro bo rigs lnga ste/ thugs las sprul pa'i mkha' lding gis// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams 'dul byed pa// de yi snying po 'di ltar ro// ha pa oM sa khri// rdo rje hUM gis sgra bsgrags pas// 'dul dka' ma lus 'dul byed cing// dregs pa rnam bcu brlag byas nas// sdug bsngal gsum ni zhi bar byed// phyag na rdo rje gtum po khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las/ sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas ma hA ka la yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang mdzad kyis// lha yi rnal 'byor bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// dang po byams pa bsgom par bya// gnyis pa snying rje rnam bsgom zhing// gsum pa dga' ba bsgom pa dang// kun gyi tha ma btang snyoms so// mi rtog ye shes rang rig hUM// bsnol ba sna tshogs rdo rje lte// rdo rje de nyid ra ba dang// gur dang sa gzhi rab tu 'bar// 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor steng na gnas// bruM las

gzhal yas drag po ru// chu skyes nyi zla phyogs kyi gdan// hUM oM traM hri haM/ 'bru lnga gsung gi sa bon las// rigs lnga rang gi phyag mtshan gyur// de gyur sku ru yongs su bskyed// dbus su ye shes gtum po ni// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum khro// phyag g.yas rdo rje bsnun pa'i tshul// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub thugs khar bkan// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum drag tu bgrad// dmar ser smin ma sma ra khro// kham nag gyen brdzes dbu yi skra// zla tshes mched dkar ljags glog 'khyug/ lto 'gros brgyan cing stag sham can// yum dang gnyis med thugs las 'khyud// sprul pas gdug pa'i tshogs rnams 'joms// bgegs chen bsnol ba'i gdan la bzhugs// drag po me dpung dbus na khro// bcom ldan thugs kyi sprul ba las// rigs bzhi gtum po rang gi ngo// shar du rdo rje gtum po ni// bdud las rgyal byed dri za'i gdan// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar// spyan gsum mche gtsigs zhabs bgrad pa// skra ser ltos 'gro stag gis brgyan// g.yas pa rdo rje bsnun pa'i tshul// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub rab tu gdengs// me dpung 'bar ba'i rnam pa can// thugs las rdo rje khyung sprul lo// lho ru rin chen gtum po ni// gzi brjid 'bar ba gshin rje'i gdan// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser// spyan gsum zhabs bgrad mche ba can// skra brdzes ltos 'gro stag gis brgyan// g.yas pa rdo rje bsnun pa'i tshul// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub rab tu gdengs// me dpung 'bar ba'i rnam pa can// thugs las rin chen khyung sprul lo// nub tu pad+ma gtum po ni// rngam pa'i sgra sgrogs klu dbang gdan// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar// spyan gsum mche gtsegs zhabs bgrad pa// skra brdzes ltos 'gro stag gis brgyan// g.yas pa rdo rje bsnun pa'i tshul// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub rab tu gdengs// me dpung 'bar ba'i rnam pa can// thugs las pad+ma'i khyung sprul lo// byang du las kyi gtum mo ni// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba gnod sbyin gdan// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo// spyan gsum zhabs bgrad mche ba can// skra brdzes ltos 'gro stag gis brgyan// g.yas pa rdo rje bsnun pa'i tshul// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub rab tu gdengs// me ri 'bar ba'i rnam pa can// thugs las las kyi khyung sprul lo// de ltar dam tshig bskyed byas la// dza hUM baM ho phyag rgya bzhi// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la// phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing bshags// rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol// dge ba cung zad ci bsags pa// byang chub thob phyir bdag gis bsngo// oM hUM traM hri haM gis ni// rigs lnga ru ni dbang bskur ro// oM dang aHdang hUM zhes pa

ni// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab// snying kar zla dkyil hUM yig ni// rdo rje ye shes tshon gang ba// zla ba hUM ste rdo rje hUM// sngags kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'phro// de ltar lha ni gsal ba las// sa bon rab tu 'bar ba yis// kha sbyar nyi zla'i 'phro 'du las// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis// bde ba chen por gsol mdzad nas// thig le'i rang bzhin mi shigs kyis// bgegs ris stong phrag 'joms mdzad pa'o// phyag na rdo rje gtum po khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las/ lha'i rnal 'byor gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas ma hA kA la yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// bcom ldan rdo rje gtum po yis// mchod pa'i bye brag bshad du gsol// bcom ldan khro bos bka' stsal pa// phyi nang gsang ba mchod pa'i rdzas// yi ge gsum gyis byin rlabs la// hUM dang aM yig sa bon gyis// rdo rje dril bu lag blangs la// stang stabs drag pos bgegs bskrad de// dang pa phyi yi mchod pa dbul// rtsa ba'i sngags la 'di rnams brtags// oM badzra puSh+pe pU dza A huM/ oM badzra d+hu pe pU dza A hUM/ oM badzra dI pa pU dza a hUM/ oM badzra gaN+d+re pU dza AHhUM/ oM badzra ne wi te pU dza aHhUM/ oM badzra argaM ba tIts+tsha pU dza aHhUM/ oM badzra girti pU dza AHhUM swA hA/ na maHsarba ta thA te b+h+yo/ pi sho mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tad khaM uta ga te s+pha ra Na hi maM ga ga na khaM swA hA/ rdo rje hUM gi sku chen gyis// gar gyi phyag rgya brgyan byas la/ ting 'dzin ldan pas dbul bar bya// de yi bsod nams dpag tu med// nang gi mchod pa 'di lta ste// yaM raM kaM dag sa bon las// rlung dang me dang thod pa'i sgyed// a las thod pa'i gzhal yas su// shu bi mu mA rA na go ku d+ha ha/ mi 'chi lnga dang rab gsal lnga// steng du sa bon dgod bya ba// oM traM aM khaM hUM// laM maM paM taM baM/ dpa' mo gsum gyi byin rlabs la// brjod pas dkar dmar dngul chu'i mdog/ ye shes bdud rtsir byin rlabs la// rdo rje khong seng ye shes ljags// hUM mdzad sngags 'dis gsol bar bsam// oM tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye// ma hA ba ling i daM/ grih+na grih+na/ khA hi khA hi/ rak+ta pi pa ti// a mri ta pu dza/ g+ha na pu dza muny+tsa ho// sa ma ye swA hA/ lhag ma rnams ni bsngo bya ba// sngags 'di brjod pas thim par bsam// oM a ka ro mu khaM sarba d+harma naM ar+ya nut+pan na twat+ta/ oM AHhUM/ de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa ni// shes rab yum gyi b+ha ga la// snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba yis// gtum khro 'bar ba'i brtul zhugs kyis// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams sgrol bar bya// sbyor zhing sgrol ba phyag rgya che// rab tu 'bar ba sreg byas la// ri rab gling bzhi'i 'og tu mnan// phyag na rdo rje gtum po khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las/ mchod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas ma hA kA la

yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// ma smin smin par bya ba'i phyir// dbang bskur ba ni bshad du gsol// bcom ldan khro bos bka' stsal pa// dur khrod la sogs gnas chen du// gza' skar dus tshod bzang po la// sa brtags pa dang blang ba dang// me tog dor zhing lha yang brtag/ btso ma gser gyi mdog 'dra ba// rngan pa byin la brko bar bya// sa sbyang ba dang bsrung ba ste// sa yi cho ga rdzogs bya la// maN+Dal yid 'ong dri med khar// dri yi thig le me tog lnga// dam tshig 'khor lo bskyed byas pas// ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs te// lha yi sta gon gnas pa dang// gser la sogs pa'i bum pa ni// lto ba che la mgrin pa ring// las kyi bum pa ma gtogs pa// yon tan ldan pas lha grangs bstan// sman lnga 'bru lnga snying po lnga// bdud rtsi lnga dang rin chen lnga// sha lnga 'o ma chu ni gsal// kha tshar ma nyams ras kyis bcings// 'bras bu can gyi rgyan ldan ni// dri bdug maN+Dal khar bzhag go/ mi dmigs bum pa bdud rtsi yis// rgya mtsho dbus su ri rab che// sprin sgra bsnol ba sna tshogs 'bar// lte ba bruM las gzhal yas drag/ paM las chu skyes dam tshig bskyed// ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs la// phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bstim// sku gsungs thugs kyis byin gyis brlabs// spyan la sogs pa dbang bskur ro// mchod dang bstod pas bstod byas la// gzungs thag ldan pas bsnyen pa 'bum// de nas rdo rje slob ma la// skyabs 'gro sdig bshags byas nas su// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de// sdom pa gsum dang ldan par bya// slob ma'i gnas gsum dag tu ni// rdo rje khu tshur dri yi chus// thig le nyi zla pad stengs su// yi ge gsum gyi sbyor ba las// sku gsung thugs kyis byin gyis brlab// las kyi chus su gtor zhing bsrung// mchod pa lnga yis legs byas la// so shing bying la la nye brtag/ bsrung skud sngon pos dpung pa bcing// ku sha'i stan bting mtshan ma gdab// ltas ngan phur pa'i sbyin sreg bya// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor mkha' la bteg/ gzhon nus srad bu bkal ba la// kha dog dkar ba'i thig gdab ste// oM badzra tsakra hUM/ byed pa g.yon pas gdug byas te// chu shing g.yas pas tshon chen dgod// dpa' bo 'bru lngas byin gyis rlabs// dngas ma gtsug tor zlog pa ltar// kun rigs khro bo zhe sdang che// tshig 'byung rdo rje hUM zhes sgrogs// de lta'i blo ldan rnal 'byor gyis// sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba ru// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi rgyas pa'i mdog/ pho brang gru chad dbang gi tshul// mu khyud rdo rje thod par brgyan// phyi yi gru chad ljang bar bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// kha dog phyogs kyi rigs dang mthun// rin chen pha gu 'dod yon rnams// dra ba

dra phyed rta babs gces// dur khrod la sogs rgyan gyis sgeg/ rdo rje me ri bcas pa bri// de nas sngags 'dis stong par bsgom// oM shu n+ya ta dz+nyA na sarba d+hArma swa b+hA badzra Ad+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de lta bu yi dkyil 'khor khar// sprin sgra'i yi ge bsnol ma las// sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba ru// bruM las gzhal yas bskyed par bya// nang du chu skyes nyi zla'i gdan// dregs pa lnga yi gdan stengs su// oM hUM traM hri kham dag las// phyag mtshan gyur dang khro bo'i sku// de ltar dam tshig bskyed byas la// ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs te// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod byas la// phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bstim// 'bru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis brlab// spyan la sogs pas dbang bskur ro// de nas slob mas khrus byas la// yol bas bar bcad gdong g.yogs bcing// oM badzra na ma mai hUM/ oM badzra na ma trai hUM/ oM badzra na mo na ma hUM/ de nas slob ma phyag byed du gzhug la// bde ba 'dod pa su zhig yin// bla mas de ni dri bar bya// skal ldan bde chen bdag cag la// slob ma'i lan du shes par gyis// de nas bla mas bde ba'i glu// dgyes pas blang bar bya ba ni// oM bud+d+ha d+ha ra pu dza me g+ha ud ga te/ s+phar Na hi maM ga ga na khaM hUM phaT/ de nas slob mas gsol ba gdab// de nas sngags 'dis dam chu blud// oM badzra ta ka hUM/ rdo rje thugs kar bzung byas la// dam tshig khro bo'i nga rgyal gyis// tshigs bcad sngags 'di brjod par bya// di ring phan chod khyod kyis ni// phyag na rdo rje nga yin pas// nga yi bka' nyan gsung bstod pa// khyod kyis byas na dngos grub 'byung// ma byas rdo rje dmyal bar ltung// oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas rdo rje spyi bor bzhag/ khyod kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir// de nyid mi rnams mdun du ni// dus kun tu ni ma smra zhig/ ma smra dngos grub myur ba yin// smras na khro bos mgo 'gems so// oM badzra kro d+ha hUM phaT// sngags 'dis yol ba bsal bar bya// oM badzra pra ti dza ho// lan gsum brjod la mthong ngam dri// dbang thob phyi nas yon kyang dbul// sngags 'dis me tog dkyil 'khor dor// oM ta thu ga te pu dza hUM/ sngags 'di slob ma'i mgo la btags// oM rad na ma le a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ bla ma rdo rje slaub dpon gyis/ lha yi 'khor lo bskur byas la// slob ma'i snying khar gzhug par bya// oM maN+Dal de ba tiSh+Tha ldan/ sngags 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya// oM badzra ba she hUM/ de rnams las kyi bla mas bya// lha ngo bstan la dbang bskur ro// yab yum snyoms zhugs 'od zer las// bde gshegs 'od bskul bum par thim// cha 'dres 'od zhu bdud rtsi de// spyi bor chu yis dbang bskur ro// mi bskyod pa yi spro bsdu yis// tshigs bcad sngags 'dis sbyin par

bya// sku gsung dam tshig las byung ba'i// ye shes bdud rtsi dri ma med// lha yi chu 'di dag pa yis// mi bskyod pa ru dbang bskur ro// oM badzra a dar shu dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ rin chen 'byung gnas spro bsdu yis// tshigs bcad sngags 'dis cod pan spyin// sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal srid do// o rgyan rin chen bla na med// o rgyan rin chen mchog 'gro ba// rdzogs sangs rgyas su dbang bskur ro// oM badzra sa man+ta dz+nyA na rat+na mu gu tra ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM// 'od dpag med kyi spro bsdu yis// tshigs bshad sngags 'di rdo rje sbyin// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang// mi phyed rdo rje gsal ba las// chos rnams kun gyi sgor gyur ba// rdo rje chos kyi dbang bskur ro// oM pradz+nyA a be sha ya dz+nyA na badzra a bi Shiny+tsa maM/ don rnams grub pa'i spro bsdu yis// tshigs bshad sngags 'dis dril bu sbyin// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yin// 'gro don mnyam med byed pa dang// mchod pa'i las rnams rdzogs byed pa// dril bu las kyi dbang bskur ro// oM sti ta a nut+pa na dz+nyA na pa ne badzra a bi Shiny+tsa maM// rnam par snang mdzad spro bsdu yis// tshigs bcad sngags 'dis ming sbyin no// rdo rje ming du dbang bskur ro// byang chub snying po'i bar du ni// cis kyang mi chod mi shigs par// rdo rje'i ming du rab grags shig/ oM bi tri sho d+ha d+harma dz+nyA na nA ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ rdo rje brtul zhugs dbang bskur ro// 'phreng ba chen po ske la bskon// 'od zer 'phro 'du'i byin rlabs las// sngags 'di brjod la sbyin par bya'o// oM a A i I ar Ar u U al Al be she yen dre ba bi shud+hA ni swA hA// de nas lung bstan dbang bskur ni// rdo rje dril bu lag sbyin la// 'od zer 'phro 'du'i ting 'dzin bya// de nas tshigs bcad sngags 'di sbyin// oM haM k+Sha d+harma tsakra pra pa tu ka swA hA// bu khyod rdo rje slob dpon gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo bskor// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma las// 'gro ba drang phyir khyod kyis bskor// de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur te// mtshan ldan rig ma'i b+ha ga la// dpa' bo seng ge bzhin du rol// tsaN+Da li ni rab gsal bas// e baM bde ba haM las 'dzag/ spro bsdu byang chub sems de sbyin// oM a mr-i ta gu na a bi Shiny+tsa maM/ mgrin par gsung la sbyin par bya// de nas a ho su khas btung// de nas shes rab ye shes dbang// mtshan ldan rig ma'i khrus byas la// slob ma dpa' bo'i tshul du rol// A li kA li sbyor ba yis// rkyang ma ro ma gnan ma bstan// sgyil dang zlog dang dgram zhing bstim// dga' bzhi bsdu ba nyams su myong// shes rab gsal ba'i ngang la gnas// oM pra dz+nyA nA a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM// bzhi ba chos nyid mngon rtogs dbang// lhan cig skyes pa bdud rtsi'i ro// mtshon du yod pa ma yin te// srid dang mya ngan

'das la sgrol// phyag na rdo rje gtum po khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dkyil 'khor dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas ma hA kA la yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yi// dam tshig bsrung ba bshad du gsol// bcom ldan khro bos bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// bla ma la gus spyi bor bkur// bka' las mi 'da' som yid spang// stong nyid snying rje rab bsgom zhing// lha dang mi 'bral snying po rgyun// mched la gdung zhing dkon mchog mchod// gzhan la mi smad gdug pa bsgral// gsang ba mi bsgrag snod ldan drang// drod ma thob par las mi 'da'// gzhan la phyag kyang mi 'tshal bar// sems can don byed ma gtogs pa// gtum zhing khros par spyad par bya// 'jig rten lha srin mo mchod par// zas kyi rnal 'byor chen po bya// lam yang bzung bar mi bya zhing// dpa' bo seng ge bzhin du 'gro// gtam gyi lan yang mi sbyin par// mig kyang bgrad cing phyogs bcur dkrug/ gal te gzhan la tshig brjod na// drag cing rtsub par smra bar bya// gzhan gyi mtshan nyid mi rig par// dus tshod shes pa shin tu gces// de ldan dam tshig ldan pa la// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub 'byung// dam tshig nyams par gyur pas na// nad rnams sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur zhing// phyi ma rdo rje dmyal bar ltung// de phyir dam tshig rtag tu bsrung// phyag na rdo rje gtum po khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dam tshig gi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas ma hA kA la yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// 'gro ba rnams la phan gdags phyir// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bshad du gsol// bcom ldan khro bos bka' stsal pa// gza' skar dus tshes bzang po la// sngags pa blo dang ldan pa yis// gro ga shing dang dar dkar shing shun la// gur kum ram sam mthing shun gyis// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi ser po la// lte ba gru chad dmar bar bya// mu khyud dbus ma sngon por bya// tha mar mu khyud nyi rim bya// dkar dang dmar bar kha dog bri// sna tshogs rdo rje lte bar bca'// 'khor lo'i lte bar hUM yig la// thugs kyi sngags kyis bskor bar bri// de mtha' mu khyud sngags 'dis bskor// oM ye d+harma he tu pra b+ha bA/ he dun+te Shan+ta thA ga to h+ya ba dat+te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e paM pA dI ma hA shra ma Na ye swA hA/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi'i rtse mor hUM// sku gsum yon tan 'phrin las bzhi// de bzhin rim pa'i rtsibs la bri// bsrung dang bzlog pa'i las byed na// lnga ldan brtag pa so sor gces// g.yas dang g.yon du shes par gyi// rak+Sha rak+Sha/ ma ra ya rbad rbad/ zlog zlog/ yi ge 'bru bzhis bsrung byas te// gsum dang bzhi la gol du ming// gnyis

ni gnyis su shes par b+h+yo// dgra la zlog tu shes par gyis// de yi phyir rim mu khyud la// bsrung zhing bzlog bye tha mar brtags// mu khyud tha ma 'dis su bskor// a A i I u U r-i r-I l-i l-I e ai o au aM a:/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ k+Sha/ de la 'khor lo bri ba dang// dris bdug maN+Dal khar bzhag go/ dam tshig 'khor lo bskyed byas nas// ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs la// mchod bstod gtor mas mnyes par bya// dam tshig 'khor lo de nyid la// phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bstim// byin rlabs dbang bskur rab gnas bas// bsrung zhing bzlog pa mchog tu bshad// khrus byas sems bskyed byas la gdags// gzhan yang phan gdags rim pa ni// dug sgra'i mkhris pa ma rul ba// thabs sbyor gyis ni rten byas na// klu yi rgyal po 'jog po yis// gzung ba yang ni thongs par 'gyur// gser chu dngul chu mu zi yi// bcud len la sogs sbyor ba yis// don de bstan par mi 'gyur ro// 'bras bu gsum dang 'bri ga ra// sbrang rtsi mar dang ldan pa dang// sna tshogs pa yi sman rnams kyis// rtag tu goms par byas nas ni// gdon de zlog par 'gyur ba yin// bdud rtsi rdo chu dkar po dang// rtag tu zos na nges par grol// rang byung bdud rtsi chen po ni// bskor bzlog tu ni btul zos la// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub 'byung// bdud rtsi gzhan yang de bzhin no// dug sna dri chen rnyed tshad dang// tsan dan dmar dang mi yi zhun// byug pa byas na gdon las thar// gdung dang rma bya rang byung mchod// bcangs pa tsam gyis bsrung ba'i mchog/ rtsa bshal rtsub bshal rna bshal dang// rngam ru'i thabs sbyor dag dang ni// gtar dang me thur la sogs pa// rig pas bcad la kun nas dgrol// phyag na rdo rje gtum po khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las/ phan gdags pa dang bsrung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas ma hA kA la yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// las mtha' rtsod pa'i dus de ru// tshar bcad pa ni bshad du gsol// bcom ldan khro bos bka' stsal pa// srog dang ser ba drag po'i gtad// tshar bcad pa ni khyod sogs kyi// nga yis bstan pa bsrung phyir gyis// dur khrod ras la 'khor lo bri// gri gug lta bu'i rtsibs bzhi pa// spu gri 'bar ba'i so can ni// mu khyud gnyis ldan dgra snying thub// rtsibs la sngags 'di bri bar bya// da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ dbus su mgon po'i snying po dgod// ka pa la yi kha bcad la// ling ga 'khor lo'i bar du gtum// ra las gri gug bskyed pa ni// rang nyid mgon por bsgom par bya// zhal gcig phyag

gnyis khro gtum can// thod 'phreng gri gug thod pa bsnams// mthing nag me dpung 'bar bar bsgom// sngags 'di rgyun du grang bar bya// oM tsaN+Da ma hA kA la rak+Sha sa ma ya swa ti sa ma ya du dza/ sngags 'di sgrub na dngos grub nye// ting 'dzin gsum dang ma bral bar// rnal 'byor ba yis rtag tu bzlas// gdags pa'i las 'dis su gsad// a mu ka tsa ta rak+ta maM sa ti po ti/ khA hi khA hi/ a nu ka ra mA ra ya mA ra ya/ ha na ha na/ pa tsa pa tsa/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ rbad rbad/ zla ba gcig la thams cad rdzogs byed na// tshes nas nya bar bsnyen pa ste// dgu stong yan chad las la sbyar// stong la bsreg pa'i las bya'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rtags byung na// 'dod pa'i las rnams 'grub pa'o// bskul zhing gtor ma chen po sbyin// sbyor ba yis ni gsad bya ba// rtsa ba khu ba zho yang gnyis// dug sgra'i zas gnyis khal ma tsha// 'o ma dang sbyar rin chen sgrom// spa me'i bu ni kha sbyar der// dong srad nyos byed gsum ni tshad// sdig pa'i mig dang ro yi rtsi// me tog dkar dang rgyam tshwa dang// dri chu sbyor ba'i khrus kyis sel// phyag na rdo rje gtum po khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las/ mgon po gri khug gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas ma hA kA la yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// drag po'i chu 'khyags ji ltar dbab// bcom ldan khro bos bka' stsal pa// skyin thang me rlung 'khrug byed pa'i// klu yi phung ser nag po dbab// zangs sam dur khrod pu pe ru// dur khrod ras ni khru gang la// sum cu rtsa gnyis 'khor lo dang// thog ser dbab pa'i ngan sngags gnyis// spel te rim pa bzhin du bri// dkyil tu khyi nag thod pa la// thun chen til nag mi yi khrag/ re lcags sha chen ra yi dug/ spyang tsher dur khrod drag po'i sol// bdud rtsi lnga dang chang gi phud// btsan dug nya sbal sbrul sha gsal// thod pa yugs sa'i zhabs mas gtum// eg rtse ba nas sngags thun brdeg/ ma smin rgyud spangs dar bar bya// oM badzra kro d+ha ya phaT/ hu ya hu ya/ ru lu ru lu/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ thuM ri li li/ sha ta ka pa la/ ma nu kra pa ri/ pra ti raM/ da ba ni/ bi dza hUM/ ta thA b+ha ba ni swA hA/ g+ha ta sha ni/ ra pha lam/ gu ni hri ta/ ka pa laM/ pa ta tha ra/ ra nu hri a/ laM ni nA ga naN/ sha ka pa la/ ra pe na/ phaT ra do sta/ ga na laM/ nA ga ri naN/ a ba sha ya/ gnyid dang le lo rnam spangs te// zhe sdang chen pos drag tu bzlas// bya khyung phyag rgya rngam pa'i sgras// thog ser rkang pa shar gyis 'ong// de nas thod pa zhabs ma ru// 'khor lo legs par bris nas ni// gar 'bebs gnyan pa'i sa ru sba// thur bstan gzer te chu mig gzhug/ mdze po nal bu gris gsod dang// btsos kyi khrag ni shin tu

gces// khrag sna dug sna rnyed tshad de// dgra yi gang khrus la sogs la// mdze po mon gyi thod par thab// rgya la dur khrod gdol pa'i me// drag tu thab bya cho ngas gdung// klu rnams gzir gyin sngags 'di bzlas// nA ga sarba sa ma ya skrugs krugs// nA ga rA dza shu tri phroM phroM/ nA ga rA dza shar sha lta phob phob/ rang nyid khro gtum nga rgyal gyis// klu yang skad ngan 'don par nges// dus khyad khyad par gsum la ni// khyab 'jug rgyu ba'i dus su bya// bsrung dang bsdu dang gseng ba ni// sham thabs rak+ta phud kyis bya// phyag na rdo rje gtum po khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las/ klu'i phung ser nag po'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas ma hA kA la yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// gdug pa tshar gcad drag po'i gtad// bcom ldan khro bos bshad du gsol// bcom ldan gtum pos bka' stsal pa// gro ga shing shun dag la ni// ling ga sor bzhi tshad byas la// snying khar 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri// dkyil du ming rus sngags 'di gdags// a mo ka tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ rtsibs la phu brgyad dgod par bya// mu khyud nang mar sgra gzhan bri// mjug ma kha bstan shin tu gces// tha mar gsad pa'i sngags yin no// dug dang mdze khrag sbyar ba bri// dri yis bdug la glang rur gsal// zer mo sha dang mdze po'i sha// gu gul mi mthun phyogs kyang blugs// la cas kha bcad re bas gtum// rig sngags khyung gi snying po 'di// 'bum tsho bskyal la klu bdud gtad// gdol ba'i chu mig gnyan sa ru// tsha thur drag po'i btsan thabs gsad// klu bdud gdol ba'i chu mig khar// ngo nas 'gro byed gsum du ni// khru gang ba yi dong brus la// klu gtor btang zhing bka' bsgo la// dong du rang zhugs sngags 'di bzlas// phu las klu brgyad bskyed la gtad// oM nA ga hi li nA ga 'dus 'dus sa ma ya dzA dzA/ gtum po khros pa'i nga rgyal gyis// klu rnams dbang du bsdus byas la// dza yi ting 'dzin drag po yis// dgra yi rnam shes bkug byas la// sngags 'di brjod pas sgrol bar bsam// oM na ga po baM/ tsa tsi rgya grag thur// snying la dgug/ nyags nyags rtsa bzhi skums// shan shan srog la shan// thur sod swA hA/ rigs byed can gyis de nyid bzlas// tsit+ta'i gong na a mo ka/ gsad pa'i gdam ngag shes par gyis// de nas sa yis rdzas byas la// las mkhan rnams la las bcol lo// rgya gram ri rab gling bzhi gnan// rang nyid khro khyung nga rgyal gyis// sngags 'dis drag tu gzir la gnan// oM ta ki tsa ste/ bi dza te// hu ya hu ya/ hu lu hu lu/ sbu ru te spu ru te swA hA/ de nas gom pa bdun phyin la// mthu chen phyogs bcu gtor byas shing// mthe bong gnyis sbrel sor bzhin

brkyang// nam mkha' lding gi ting 'dzin gyis// sngags bzhi dril la mtshams gcad do// de nas rdzas 'di lus la gdags// dug sna mu zi sgog skya dang// gla rtsi gu gul shu thag ste// stag gi sder dang phag gi mche// rma bya'i mdongs dang gzungs mo'i sgro// bdud rtsi lnga yis bya ba'o// rjes rnams rma bya'i sgro yis bsub// phur bus gdab cing tsha tsha bzhag/ phyir mig mi lta drag pos 'gro// ting 'dzin drag sngags rgyun du bya// glang thabs zha grum mdzes nad kyis// dgra bo myur du 'chi bar 'gyur// de ltar drag las gang byed kyang// klu yi thebs zlog 'di dang bstan// dgun zla 'bring po bdun dang nyer bdun thebs par bya// bcu drug nyi shu drug la bzlog/ dgun zla tha chungs phan gnod med// dpyid zla ra ba'i bco lnga zlog/ de ma yin pa las bya'o// dpyid zla 'bring po'i tshes brgyad dang// tshes gsum bzlog pas las mi bya// gzhan la las kyang rab tu bya// dpyid zla tha chungs nyi shu lnga// de la thebs pas gzhan du spang// dbyar zla ra ba'i brgyad la thebs// bco lnga de mthun nyer lnga bzlog/ dbyar 'bring nyi shu gnyis la thebs// brgyad la 'gyangs kyin nya la bzlog/ tha chungs nyi shu lnga la thebs// gzhan yang 'gyangs te bcu gcig bzlog/ ston zla ra ba'i tshes dgu thebs// bco lnga tshes gsum bzlog pa'o// ston zla 'bring pa'i tshes bcu thebs// gzhan la 'gyangs la bcu drug bzlog/ ston zla tha chungs bcu gcig thebs// nyi shu gcig kyang de ltar te// bcu dang dgu la bzlog pa'o// dgun zla ra ba brgyad la thebs// dgu la shin tu bzlog pa yin// dgun zla 'bring po bdun dang nyer bdun thebs// bcu drug nyi shu drug la bzlog/ dgun zla tha chungs phan gnod med// 'di ltar thebs zlog dang ldan na// sngags pa bkra shis phun sum tshogs// 'dod pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// ma ldan mi bde sna tshogs 'byung// tshe la bar du gcod byed do// de phyir shin tu gces pa yin// phyag na rdo rje gtum po khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las/ gdug pa gtad kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das drag po rnam par 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs pa bzhengs te/ bcom rdo rje khro bo la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so legs so// rdo rje khro bo de de bzhin te/ ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de bzhin du/ gtum po khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po 'di/ dbang ma bskur ba la mi bstan zhing/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo brgya rtsa brgyad ma byas pa la mi bshad do// de dag byas shing sdom pa gsum dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa la bshad do// rgyud 'di bcangs pa tsam gyis gdug pa thams cad tshar gcod par 'gyur

ro// sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis rdo rje khro bo las byung ba'i rgyud chen po 'di/ dpal mgon po nag po la gtad do// de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nas/ dpal mgon po la sogs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams na drag cing gtum po'i 'khor de dag thams cad yi rang rjes su yi rang ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// phyag na rdo rje gtum po khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyud yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// phyag na rdo rje gtum po khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhal nas gsungs pa rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya nI laM ba ra badzra pA Ni a hA ya k+Sha se na pa ti badzra sha wa ra nA ma tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje rtse mo zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes rdo rje brjid pa'i
